max jay jun mimek winak xol eb yet yajawilal chi yik José aj Arimatea. Echbanebil yoc Dios Yajawil yuj. C'am jabok chi xiwi, max octok satak Pilato, bet k'anon mimanil Jesús bay.
Caw wal max c'ayaj c'ul Pilato yet max yabeni tol mayal cam Jesús. Yuj tu' xan max bet yak' tit cham yajawil eb soldado, max k'anlen el bay, ta mayal cam Cham.
A yet max yabeni tol mayal cami, axa yalon tu' tol chi je' toj yion aytek José tu' is mimanil Cham.
A José tu', max man jun sábana caw wal watx'. Catatu' max bet yion aytek is mimanil Cham. Max chulon oc jun sábana tu' yin, max bet yaoncan octok yul jun ch'en ch'en olbilxa, cax max makchencan yetok jun ch'en.
A María aj Magdala yetok María txutx José, max yil eb bay max occantok is mimanil Cham.
A yet max aycan c'u yet c'ual xewilal, max man María aj Magdala, yetok xal Salomé, c'al María txutx Jacobo juntzan suk'uk'i jab, yuj toj yaon oc eb yin mimanil Jesús.
Axa yet max sakbi aj yet domingo, max toj eb bay ch'en ch'en bay max mukay octok tu'. A wal yajol c'u, max apni eb.
Axa yalon eb axca ti': —¿Mac ok ion el ch'en makilej bay mukan octok tu' ayon? ẍi eb.
A ch'en makilej tu' caw miman ch'en, palta axa yilontok eb, elnakxa ch'en.
Axa yet max ocapnok eb yul ch'en ch'en bay mukan tu', max yilon eb tol chotan ay jun ángel bay yetc'ulal watx' k'ab eb, axca wal yili junok ach'ej. Ayoc jun jokan sak pichilej yuj. Caw wal max xiw eb ix sic'libil.
Axa yalon bay eb tu': —Manchak ex xiwi. Ayex ti', a Jesús aj Nazaret che sayic'ok, jun max alay oc yin curus. Mayal ictzoj ajok. C'amxa mac ayic' yul ch'en ti'. Ilekto wali bay max ul yacan octek eb ti'.
Asek, alek bay juntzan eb is cuywom, c'al yetok bay Pedro, tol mayal babjitoj e satak bay Galilea. Ok e yil yin bay tu', axca max yut yaloncan ayex, ẍi bay eb.
Max lajwic'al tu xin, axa yeltek eb yul ch'en ch'en tu'. Axa toj eb tu'. Caw wal chi luklon eb yuj xiwilal. C'am junok mac bay max yalil eb, yujtol chi xiw eb. [
A yet domingo yet ayto sakbi, max ictzoj aj Jesús. A bay María aj Magdala max babji tx'oxon aj ba. A ton yin jun ix tu' ibil el ukwan espíritu yob yuj Jesús.
Max bet yal ix bay juntzan eb ec'jablejnak yetok Cham yet yalantok, tol lanan yok' eb yuj cusilal.
A yet max yalon ix bay eb tol mayal ictzoj aj Jesús, cax tol mayal wal yil ix yin, maj wal cha yab eb.
Lajwi tu xin, max tx'oxon aj ba Jesús bay cawan eb cuywom najat bay tiel conob, yet lanan bey eb. Tx'ok yili max yil eb.
Axa meltzoj eb yuj bet yalon eb bay juntzanxa yet cuywomal eb tu'. Palta maj c'apax cha eb yabej.
Axa junelxa, yet lanan low eb cuywom yusluc'wanil, max tx'oxon aj ba Jesús bay eb. Max tzulay eb yuj, yujtol max yak' eb cabc'ulal, cax pit max yut ba eb; ilab maj cha eb yab bay eb maxax ilon yet mayal ictzoj ajok.
Lajwi tu', max yalon bay eb axca ti': Asek bay masanil yulyibank'inal. Alek el k'anejal yet colbanilej xol masanil anima.
A mac ok in yaoc yin c'ul, cax ok yak'on bautizar ba, ok colchajok, palta a mac c'am chin yaoc yin c'ul xin, ok jay yailal yiban.
A eb ok yaoc yin c'ul, ok je' tx'oxon eb juntzan milagro ti': Ok je' yioncan el eb espíritu yob yin anima yuj wikbej; ok k'anjab aj eb yin tx'ok tiejal;
ta chi mitx' eb labaj, ta chi yuc'tok eb junok tzet yetal chi cam anima yuj, c'am tzet ok on eb; ta chi batxbaj oc eb k'ab yiban eb ya'ay, ok watx'jokcan c'ul eb yuj eb, ẍi Jesús.
A yet max lajwi yalon Cham Jajawil Jesús jun ti' bay eb is cuywom tu', max ilay paxaj Cham satcan, cax max ay chotan bay watx' k'ab Dios.
Lajwi tu' bian, axa toj eb yalon el k'anej Dios bay junjun lugar. Max occ'al Cham Jajawil yetok eb. Ayc'al oc is milagro Cham yetok eb, yet watx' chi txecloj elok tol yel jun k'anej chi ec' yalil eb tu'.]
Jayebixto c'u tu', max jay pax Jesús junelxa bay conob Capernaum. Axa max abchaji, tol ayic' bay yatut bayc'alta' chi ayji.
Yuj tu' xan xiwil anima max wajnaj oc bay yatut yet jun bek tu'. Max witz'ay el ti na. Axa c'oli yalon Jesús k'anej Dios bay eb tu'.
Ay jun anima sicbinak el is mimanil, max ilay jay yuj canwan winak.
Palta maj je' yoctok eb bay ayic' Jesús, yujtol xiwil anima. Yuj tu' xan max ajtok eb yiban pananil te na tu', cax max yolon eb jun olan yetc'ulal bay ayic' Cham axa yaon aytok t'ununok eb jun winak tu' yul is wayub, cax max ayapnok sat tx'otx'.
A yet max yilon oc Cham tol chi yaoc eb c'ul yin, max yalon bay nak winak sicbinak el is mimanil tu': —Ach ti', max ak'lay tan a yobtakil, ẍi bay nak.
Palta ay juntzan eb meẍtol yin ley Moisés chotan ec' bay tu'. Max naon eb axca ti':
¿Tzet yuj xan caytu' chi yal jun winak ti' axca ti'? Buchwal k'anej chi yal yin Dios. C'am junok anima chi je' yak'on tan yobtakil; asannej Dios, ẍi eb.
Yojtakxa pax Jesús tzet chi na eb, yuj tu' xan max yal bay eb: —¿Tzet yuj xan caytu' che na' axca tu'?
¿Mactet junok yel suboj yelapnok jalon bay nak sicbinak el is mimanil ti', che na': Ti max ak'lay tan a yobtakil, con chi mi, ma a': Ajan wanok, iaj a wayub cax beyan, con chi?
A tinani xin, ok in tx'ox ayex, tol a' ayin Chekbilintek yuj Dios xol eb jet animail ti', chic'al je' wuj wak'on tan is yobtakil eb anima bay yulyibank'inal ti', ẍi bay eb. Axa yalon bay nak sicbinak el is mimanil tu':
—Ayin chi wal ayach, ajan wanok; iaj a wayub ti', cax paxan bay atut, ẍi bay nak.
Max ajxac'al wan nak yet jun bek tu'. Max yion aj nak is wayub. T'anan oc eb, max pax nak. Toxac'al max c'aycan aj c'ul eb masanil. Max yalon eb watx' k'anej bay Dios axca ti': —Caw c'am bay max jil junok tzet yetal axca ti', ẍixac'al eb.
Max lajwi tu xin, max toj Jesús ti a' mar Galilea junelxa. Max jay pax oc eb anima masanil bay Cham, axa cuywaj bay eb tu'.
Lanan wal bey Cham, max yilon yin jun winak chi yik Leví, c'ajol Alfeo, chotan ay bay chi tekwi el tojlabal bay eb anima. —Tzaklojan cuywok wintak, ẍi Jesús bay. Axa yaj wan tu', max tzakloj yintak Cham cuywok.
Max lajwi tu', max toj Jesús bay yatut Leví tu', max low yetok eb is cuywom bay tu'. Palta ay c'apax juntzan eb tekom el tojlabal max low yetok eb yin meẍa, c'al juntzanxa eb yob c'apax is beybal; yujtol xiwil mac max tzakloj yintak.
A yet max yilon eb meẍtol yin ley Moisés c'al eb fariseo, tol max low Cham yetok eb yob beybal c'al eb tekom el tojlabal tu', max yalon eb bay eb is cuywom Cham axca ti': —¿Tzet yuj xan chi low e Meẍtol yetok eb tekom el tojlabal c'al yetok eb yob is beybal ti'? ẍi eb.
A yet max yaben Jesús axca tu', max yalon bay eb: —K'inalok ta ayic' junok antem anima tinani', tok ay yopiso yuj eb watx' c'ul. Asan eb ya'ay, a eb tu' ay yopiso yuj. Man yujok ul wawten eb watx' is beybal naoni, xan max in jayi, palta yuj ul wawten eb chi yojtaknen el ba tol yobtakwom, ẍi Jesús.
A yet junel, max oc eb cuywom Juan yin c'ajbanc'ulal, c'al yetok eb cuywom eb fariseo, xan ay juntzan mac max jayoc bay Jesús cax max k'anlen eb bay: —A eb cuywom Juan c'al eb cuywom eb fariseo, chi oc eb yin c'ajbanc'ulal. ¿Tzet yuj xan c'am chi oc pax eb a cuywom ach ti' yin c'ajbanc'ulal? ẍi eb bay.
Axa yalon Jesús bay eb tu': —K'inalok ay junok nupayil chi oc tinani'. A eb awtebil, ¿tom ok je' man ok low eb yet ayto ec' nak lanan nupay tu' yetok eb?
Ato yet ok ajapnok tiempoal yilay el nak xol eb, catatu bian ok oc eb yin c'ajbanc'ulal.
K'inalok ay junok an icham pichilej chi olchaj tinani', tok ay mactxel chi aon oc an ac' nip manto labilok yul a' nipilok an. Yujtol a' an ac' nip tu', chi utz' an, cax chi mimanbi nic'chajnakil an icham tu'.
Yetok c'apaxok, c'am junok mactxel chi aon ay vino tolto chi watx'ji yul junok icham tz'um netal vino, yujtol a yet chi sipc'oj aj jun vino tu', chi nic'chaj jun tz'um tu' yuj, toc'al chi etax el vino tu' yetok jun tz'um tu'. Yuj tu' xan asan yul no' ac' tz'um netal vino, a tu' chi ay vino ato watx'ji tu', ẍi Jesús bay eb.
A yet jun c'ual xewilal, max ec' Jesús yetok eb is cuywom yul jun be nan xol juntzan ixim trigo. Max yion el eb is cuywom tu' jayeb jolom ixim, yet lanan bey eb tu'.
Yuj tu' xan max yal eb fariseo bay Jesús axca ti': —¿Tzet yuj xan chi yun eb a cuywom ti' mulnajil tol ay yowalil junen yet c'ual xewilal? Man leyalok chi batzil eb jolom trigo tu', ẍi eb.
Palta max yal Jesús bay eb: —¿Tom c'amto bay che yil yul tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcanok, tzet max yun David junel, yet max tit is wajil yetok eb ajun yetok?
Max octok yul templo Dios, yet ayoc Abiatar sat sacerdoteal. Max loon aytok ixim pan yet Dios yayji, tol asan eb sacerdote ay leyal looni, max yak' c'apax bay eb ajun yetok tu'.
A Dios max aloncanok xan max el yich c'ual xewilal yuj yoc co watx'ilok; man yujok jiken c'ual xewilal, xan max on watx'nelay yuj Dios.
Ayin ti' chi je' waloni tzet chi je' el junen yet c'ual xewilal, yujtol Chekbilintek yuj Dios xol eb jet animail, ẍi bay eb.
A yet junelxa max oc Jesús yul jun nail culto eb yet israelal. Ayic' jun nak winak sicbinak el jun is k'ab bay tu'.
Ay eb max mak yila' ta chi yak'can watx'jok Jesús is k'ab nak yet c'ual xewilal tu', cax chi yak'on queja eb.
Axa yalon Jesús bay nak sicbinak el k'ab tu' axca ti': —Ajan wan, ocan lecan co nan ti', ẍi bay nak.
Max lajwi tu xin, max yalon bay eb anima tu': —¿Baytet ay junok ay is leyal junen yet c'ual xewilal che na'? ¿A mi tzet watx' chi je' el juneni, ma a tzet yob? ¿Chi mi je' jak'oncan watx'jok c'ul junok ya'ay, ma a co bekon camok? ẍi. —Tz'inxac'al, ẍi eb.
Axa yec' t'ananok Cham xol eb tu', max tit yowal. Max cus c'ul yujtol caw pit eb. Axa yalon bay nak winak tu': —Bitok a k'ab, ẍi. Max biontok nak is k'ab, axa watx'jican tu'.
Axa yeltek eb fariseo tu' yina, max lajtinen el ba eb yetok eb partido Herodes, yuj tzet chi yut yak'on cam eb Jesús.
Palta max toj Jesús ti a' mar Galilea yetok eb is cuywom. Xiwil juntzanxa anima max tit yulak is makbej Galilea tu' max toj yetok eb.
Yujtol max yab eb k'umal tol xiwil milagro max yun Jesús, xan xiwil eb max jayoc bay. Ay eb aj Judea, c'al eb aj Jerusalén, yetok eb aj Idumea, c'al eb aj k'axepaltok a' Jordán. Ay c'apax eb max tit cawilal Tiro c'al Sidón.
Yuj tu' xan max yal Jesús bay eb is cuywom, tol ayxac'al ec' junok barco yuj eb, yet watx' c'am chi witz' ba anima yin Cham.
Yujtol xiwil eb maxax jaycan c'ul yuj, yuj tu' xan xiwiltoc'al eb ya'ay max jitzoc ba c'atan Cham yuj mitx'on eb.
A pax eb espíritu yob xin, a yet max yilon eb yin Cham, max ay jajan eb satak, cax max yalon eb yin ipejal axca ti': —Ach ti' C'ajol ach Dios, ẍi eb.
Palta max yak' Jesús yowalil bay eb, yet watx' manchak yal eb mactxel.
Max lajwi tu xin, max toj Jesús bay jun tzalan. Max yawten eb max cha c'ul yawteni, axa yapni oc eb bay tu'.
Lajcawan eb max yaoc yopiso is chekbejok, yet watx' chi ec' eb yetok, c'al yuj chekontok eb toj yalon el k'anejal yet colbanilej.
Max yak'on yopiso eb yioncan el eb espíritu yob yin anima.
Tixtak is bi eb lajcawanil ti': Simón, nak max yikcan aj Pedro yuj Cham,
yetok Jacobo c'al jun yuẍtak chi yik Juan. A cawan eb ti', c'ajol Zebedeo eb. Max yikcan aj eb Boanerges yuj Jesús. A jun biej tu', chi yal elapnok yuninal C'u chi bili.
Ay jun chi yik Andrés, ay jun chi yik Felipe, ay jun chi yik Bartolomé, ay jun chi yik Mateo, ay jun chi yik Tomás, ay jun chi yik Jacobo, nak c'ajol Alfeo, ay jun chi yik Tadeo, ay junxa chi yik Simón. A junxa Simón ti', ayoc yin is partido eb cananista yet yalantok.
Ay junxa xin, a ton Judas Iscariote, nak max aon oc Jesús yul k'ab camich.
Max lajwi tu', max toj Jesús bay jun na yetok eb is cuywom. Xiwil anima max waj pax ba junelxa yin eb, xan majxa je' low Cham, tamwal eb is cuywom tu'.
A yet max yaben eb yuẍtak Jesús, c'al is txutx, max tit eb; t'inanxa chi ul yitok eb, yujtol mayal oc Cham locoal yalon eb.
Ay juntzan eb meẍtol yin ley Moisés max tit bay conob Jerusalén, max yal eb axca ti': A Beelzebú, yajawil eb espíritu yob ayoc yin Jesús ti'. Yuj tu' xan chi je' yion el espíritu yob tu', ẍi eb.
Axa yawtelaytek eb yuj Jesús, max yalontek Cham juntzan abix bay eb: A Satanás tu', ¿tom wal ok yuktej el eb yet espíritual yob tu'?
K'inalok chi yak'lej aj eb anima owal bay junok mimek conob; a jun conob tu', chi lajwi ayok.
K'inalok ta ay junok nail anima chi pojchaj yuj owal, chi etax el jun nail anima tu'.
Cay c'apax ton tu' Satanás xin. K'inalok ta chi pojchaj yetok eb yet espíritual yob, cax chi yak'len owal yetok eb, chi uchchajtok eb, cax chi lajwi yopiso.
K'inalok ta ay junok winak xiwil yip, c'am junok mac comonc'al ok oc yul yatut, cax chi yelk'anentok is tzetak yetal. Asan ta ay junok chi tzakay pixoncan ay nak xiwil yip tu' bian, catam tu', chi je' yelk'anentok is tzetak yetal nak tu'.
Wal yel chi wal ayex, tzanc'al tzet yobtakil anima chi oqui, c'al jantak yobtakil chi yal eb yin Dios, ok ak'lay tan yuj Cham.
Palta tzanc'al mac yob chi yal yin Cham Espíritu Santo, man ok ak'lay tan is yobtakil tu'. Chi oc is mulok yin junelnej, ẍi Jesús.
Caytu' max yut yalon axca tu', yujtol max yal eb tol espíritu yob ayoc yin.
Max lajwi tu xin, max jayoc is txutx Jesús yetok eb yuẍtak. Asan ti na max oc lecan eb. Max yak'on eb awtelay eltek Jesús.
Axa eb chotan ay cawilal Cham max alon bay axca ti': —Ayic' a txutx yina, yetok eb oẍtak. Ach ab chach saylay ec' yuj eb, ẍi eb.
Axa yalon bay eb tu': —¿Mactxel in txutx che na', mactxel eb wuẍtak? ẍi bay eb.
Cax max ec' t'ananok xolak eb chotan ay is cawilal tu', max yaloni: —A ton eb ti', axca in txutx yayji, a ton eb ti' axca wuẍtak yayji.
Yujtol tzanc'al mac chi iken axca wal chi yochej c'ul Dios, a ton eb tu' axca tol wuẍtak, axca tol wanab, axca tol in txutx, ẍi Jesús.
A yet junelxa max cuywaj Jesús ti a' mar. Xiwil anima max wajnaji. Yuj tu' xan max ajtok Cham yul jun barco ayic' ti a' tu', max ay chotan yul. Axa eb anima tu xin, max can eb ti a' masanil.
Xiwil tzet max yak' cuy eb bay tu'. Max yalontek juntzan abix bay eb axca ti':
Abek juntzan ok wal ti'. Ay jun winak max toj tzicoj trigo.
Ay janic' ixim max apnican tz'itlajbok yulak be, palta max ec' sic'aj no tz'iquin ixim.
Ay janic'xa ixim max ayc'ay yiban juntzan ch'en, bay xaxoj tx'otx'. Jun bek max ajolok yujtol xaxoj tx'otx'al.
Palta maxc'al ajol c'u, max takil ixim, yujtol man mimanok xe' ixim aytok yul tx'otx'.
Ay janic'xa ixim, max ayc'ay xol q'uix, palta max ch'ibaj te q'uix tu', axa makay el ixim yuj te tu', xan maj can jolom ixim.
Palta a ixim max ayc'ay bay yax sat tx'otx', max ch'ibaj ixim, max can jolom ixim. Ay ixim jolomej 30 bak' max yak'a', ay ixim 60, ay ixim xin, 100 max yak'a'.
A juntzan che yab ti', naobtanejek sic'libil, ẍi bay eb.
A yet c'amxa ec' eb anima tu' bay Jesús, max k'anlen el eb cuywom lajcawanil bay, c'al eb anima ayic' is cawilal: —¿Tzet wal chi yal elapnok jun abix max al ti'? ẍi eb bay Cham.
Axa yalon bay eb tu': Asan ayex chi tx'ox Dios juntzan tzet yetal tol c'amto mac ojtaknej, yet watx' chi nachaj el e yuj tzet chi yun e yoc yul is k'ab Cham. Palta a bay eb comon anima, asan juntzan abix tx'oxom el cuybanilej chi wal bay eb,
yet watx' c'am chi nachaj el yuj eb. Caxc'al chi yilc'al eb, palta chi can eb axca tol c'am tzet chi yil eb. Yetok c'apaxok, caxc'al chi yab eb, palta c'am jabok chi nachaj el yuj eb. Yuj tu' xan c'am chi meltzojtek eb ayin, tamwal chi ak'lay tan is yobtakil eb, ẍi Cham.
Max yal Jesús bay eb: Ta c'am chi nachaj el e yuj tzet chi yal elapnok jun abix tx'oxom el cuybanilej max wal ti', ¿tzet wal ok yun nachaj el e yuj juntzanxa abix masanil?
A nak tzicom trigo tu', yenel eb chi alon el k'anej Dios.
A ixim inat max ayc'ay ti' be, yenel eb anima chi xew yaben k'anej Dios, cax chi jay Satanás, chi yak'on c'aytok yul c'ul eb.
A ixim max ayc'ay yiban ch'en, yenel eb anima chi cha yab k'anej Dios ayman, yin tzalojc'ulal.
Palta man tec'anok waay eb, axca ixim man mimanok xe' aytok yul tx'otx', xan axa yet chi jay junok yailal, ma yet chi ajc'ulnelay eb yujc'al k'anej Dios, jun bek chi somchaj c'ul eb.
A ixim max ayc'ay xol q'uix, yenel c'apax junxa makan eb chi aben k'anej Dios.
Palta asan wal tzet yetal ay yulyibank'inal ti' chi yochej eb. Chi etax el is nabal eb yuj chi yochej eb chi oc beyomal. Asan yin tzet yetal chi yochej oc eb, chi yaoc eb is nabal. Yuj tu' xan toc'al chi yetnej el ba k'anej Dios yin eb. Lajan wal eb axca ixim trigo c'am watx'il jolom chi yak'a'.
Axa ixim max ayc'ay bay yax tx'otx' tu xin, yenel c'apax eb chi aben k'anej Dios, cax chi yaon oc yin c'ul. A ton eb tu' lajan axca ixim 30 bak' chi yak'a'. Ay pax eb lajan axca ixim 60 bak' chi yak'a', ay pax eb lajan axca ixim 100 bak' chi yak'a', ẍi Jesús.
Max yal c'apaxtek Jesús axca ti': A yet chi jaon oc co tzektebal, tokwal chi jaoctok yalan junok cajón, tamwal yalan junok tx'at. A yiban junok tzet yetal can batxan ajok, a tu' chi jaajtok, yet watx' chi tzektanej masanil yul na tu'.
A jantak tzet ewanc'uan yayji tinani', ok txeclojc'alta' ajok, c'al jantak tzet c'ubabil el tinani', ok ak'lay ojtaknelay elok.
Naobtanejek wal juntzan che yab ti' sic'libil.
Acbajek wal e txiquin yin tzet che yabej, yujtol axca wal che yut e yacban e txiquin tu', axca tu' ok yut yak'on Dios nachaj el e yuj. Toltax ok ajc'al can nachaj el e yuj.
Yujtol a mac chi yochej chi nachaj el yuj, yelc'al ok ak'lay nachaj el yuj eb. Axa eb c'am chi yochej chi nachaj el yuj xin, a jabok tzet ijan chi nachaj el yuj eb, ok ilay ec' bay eb, ẍi Jesús.
Max yal c'apaxtek Jesús axca ti' bay eb: Ok waltek ayex tzet ok yun yeloc eb chi oc yul k'ab Dios. K'inalok a junok winak chi tzicay inat sat is tx'otx'.
Chi lajwi tu' chi way junjun ak'bal, cax chi aj wan junjun k'inibalil. Yak'ban chi ec' tiempo, chi ajol yawoj nak tu', cax chi ch'ibi, palta man yojtakok nak tzet wal chi yun ch'ibi,
yujtol asan yuj yaxil tx'otx' chi ch'ibi. Yin babelal, xakilejixtoc'al. Catatu' chi can jolom, cax chi yak'on sat.
Axa yet chi takilok, cax chi polon ajok, yujtol chi ajapnok tiempoal yaji, ẍi Jesús.
Max yal Jesús: ¿Tzet chi yun yaj can bisil eb anima chi oc yul k'ab Dios che na'? Ok waltek jun abix e yabej, tzet chi yun ch'ib is bisil eb.
Lajan eb axca junok bak' mostaza chi awlay bay junok tx'otx'. A jun an inat tu', caw yaliẍ ch'an an yintak masanil juntzanokxa inat bay yulyibank'inal ti'.
Palta asan yawchaji, cax chi ch'ibi, miman chi yun tinay yintak masanil juntzanokxa itaj. Mimek chi yun lujab k'ablak, toltax a no tz'iquin chi oc no' ewan yalan yenel, ẍi Jesús bay eb.
A yet max yalon el Jesús k'anej Dios bay eb anima, xiwil juntzan abix axca juntzan ti' max yaltek. Asan juntzan chi nachaj el yuj eb max yaltek.
Asanc'al juntzan abix ti' max yak'balnej yet max k'anjab xol eb, axa bay eb is cuywom xin, chi watx' alnej elok.
A yet jun c'ual tu', yet yayc'ualil, max yalon Jesús bay eb is cuywom axca ti': —Tonek bay junxa k'axepal a', ẍi.
Yuj tu xin, max bekcan eb eb anima ayic' ti a' tu', cax max octok eb yul te barco bay ayoc Jesús, axa toj eb tu'. Ay juntzanxa barco max toj c'apax yetok eb.
Palta ay wal jun miman cak'ek' ow max jay yiban a'. Toltax max octok a' yul te' yuj jun cak'ek' tu'. Ijan max nojil te' yuj a'.
Axa Jesús xin, tol chi way chopiltok te barco tu', ayoc is k'an. Axa tenon el eb is cuywom tu' is wayan Cham: —Mamin, ¿tom c'am chach oc il jabok? Ilab lanan co lajwi elok, ẍi eb bay.
Axa yaj wan Jesús, max tenon oc waan jun cak'ek' tu'. Max yalon c'apax bay a' mar: —Numayan, ẍi bay a'. Catatu' max oc wanaj jun cak'ek' tu', cax max numay masanil.
Axa yalon bay eb is cuywom tu': —¿Tzet yuj xan xiwil chex xiwi? ¿Tzet yuj xan c'amto wal che yaoc e c'ul yin Dios? ẍi bay eb.
Toc'al max c'ayaj c'ul eb yuj sic'libil, cax chi yalubtanen eb, chi yalon eb: —¿Tzet laj yayji jun winak ti'? Ilab chi yikej cak'ek' c'al a' mar tzet chi yala', ẍi eb.
Max ec'apnok Jesús yetok eb is cuywom bay junxa k'axepal a' mar, bay jun lugar chi yik Gerasa.
Lanan wal yeltek Cham yul barco, max jayoc jun winak bay, petoj bay mukbanil camnak. A jun winak tu', ayoc espíritu yob yin.
Asan bay mukan eb camnak cajan nak. C'am mac chi tzakay c'alon ay nak yetok cadena.
Tx'ial elxac'al c'al-lay ay nak yetok cadena chi oc yin is k'ab c'al yin yakan, palta coc'xac'al chi yun ch'en tukon cojok. C'am junok mac chi tzakay bay.
Masanil tiempo, c'ualil c'al ak'balil chi ec'jab bay tzalanlak c'al bay mukbanil camnak. Chi el yaw, chi mak'on yasjok ba yetok ch'en.
Axa max yilontek yin Jesús najat, max yak'on nak yip tit bay. Max bekon ay jajnaj ba nak satak Cham yet max jay ocok.
Axa yalon Cham bay: —Ach espíritu yob, elan yin nak anima ti', ẍi bay. Max lajwi tu', max aj yaw yin ipejal max yaloni: —¿Tzet alon et win ach Jesús? Ach ti' C'ajol ach Dios Cham Axac'al Ocok. Yuj wal Dios chin otej, manchak quin etnej, ẍi bay Cham.
Axa k'anlen el Cham bay nak winak tu': —¿Tzet a bi? ẍi bay nak. —Legión in bi, yujtol xiwil co bey on, ẍi nak.
Xiwil max oc tean yin Cham yet watx' manchak chekil Cham eb espíritu yob tu' bay jun lugar tu'.
C'uxan ay pax jun miman bulan no txitam lanan tzukon yac'un bay jun tzalan.
Max oc tean eb espíritu yob tu' yin Cham, max yalon eb: —Chekoncantok on xol no txitam tu', yet watx' axa yin no' chon occanok, ẍi eb bay.
Axa chalaytok eb yuj Cham yin no' tu'. Cax max el eb yin nak anima tu', axa yin no txitam tu' max tojcan eb. Ay mi cabok mil no txitam tu'. Max k'okon el ba no' sat witz bay chi low tu', max ayapnok no' yul a' mar. Pilan wal max jik'bi no' bay tu'.
A eb nak ilom txitam, caw max xiw eb nak sic'libil, axa toj eb elaj tu'. Max ec' yaloncan el eb yul conob, c'al bay najatlak elok, xan xiwil anima max bet ilon tzet max uj tu'.
Max jayoc eb anima bay ayic' Cham xin, max yilon oc eb yin nak anima bay max el eb espíritu yob tu', chotan ec' nak bay tu'. Ayxa oc pichil nak, watx'xa c'ul nak. Yuj tu', caw max xiwaj eb anima tu'.
A eb max ilon juntzan tzet yetal max el yunen Cham, a eb max alon yab juntzanxa eb maxto apni ocok. Max yal eb masanil tzet max uj yin nak bay max el eb espíritu yob tu', c'al tzet max on no txitam tu'.
Yujc'al tu', max oc tean eb anima yin Cham, tol chi el Cham yul is tx'otx'al eb.
A yet lanan yoctok Cham yul barco, a nak bay max el eb espíritu yob tu', max oc tean bay Cham, tol chi toj nak yetok.
Palta maj cha' ajtok Cham nak yetok, max yalon bay nak axca ti': —Paxan bay atut, cax chalon bay a mam c'al bay eb ecan yuj jantakxa tzet max el yunen Dios en, yujtol max ok' c'ul Cham en, ẍi Jesús bay.
Axa toj nak tu', max ec' yalon el nak bay juntzan conob yul yet Decápolis. Max yalil nak jantak tzet max el yunen Jesús yin, xan toxac'al max c'ayaj c'ul anima masanil.
Max lajwi tu', max paxic' Jesús bay junxa k'axepal a' mar bay petojta'a. A yet max ec'apnok tu', xiwil anima max waj pax ba yin junelxa.
Max jayoc jun yajawil nail culto eb yet israelal chi yik Jairo. Maxc'al yil yin Jesús, max bekon ay jajnaj ba satak.
Max oc tean yin Cham, max yalon bay: —Caw toxa chi cam jun in cutz'in. Ton wal wetok, cax chi toj a matxban oc a k'ab yiban ix, yet watx' chi jaycan c'ul ix, cax c'am chi cami, ẍi bay.
Axa toj Jesús yetok tu'. Xiwil anima max toj yintak, toxc'a chi witz'xac'al ba eb yin.
A xol anima tu', ay jun ix ix caw ya'ay sic'libil, lajcawebxa abil c'al c'oli yay a' aej yin.
Xiwil eb aj an bay max bet yetnej ba ix. Pilan max lajwican el tzet ay ix yin eb, palta c'am wal jabok max watx'ji c'ul ix yuj eb. A ti yet, tol chi te'c'al aj can.
Palta max yab ix k'umal Jesús, xan max jitztok ba ix yintak Cham xol anima tu'. Max mitx'on ix ti' pichil Cham,
yujtol max na' ix: Asannejc'al in mitx'on jabok ti' pichil Cham, ok jaycan in c'ul, ẍi ix.
Yet jun bek tu' max oc wanaj a' yel yin ix. Max yab ix watx'jican is yailal tu'.
Max yojtaknej el Jesús tol ay mac max watx'jican yuj is yipalil, xan max meltzojtok acan yintak yilon xol anima tu', max k'anlen bay eb: —¿Mactxel jun max mitx'on in pichil ti'? ẍi bay eb.
Axa yalon eb cuywom tu' bay axca ti': —¿Tom c'am chela' tol chi witz' ba anima en, cax lajwi tu' chito wal a k'anlen paxok mac max mitx'on a pichil? ẍi eb bay.
Palta Jesús xin, chi ec'c'al t'ananok xol eb, yin sayoni mac jun max mitx'on is pichil tu'.
Axa ix ix tu xin, caw chi luklon ix yuj xiwilal. Yojtak ix tol max jaycan c'ul ix yuj, xan max toj ix c'atan, max bekon ay jajan ba ix satak. Max yalon ix masanil bay Cham.
Axa yalon Cham bay ix axca ti': —Ach ix, max jaycan a c'ul, yujtol max aoc a c'ul win. Paxan yin tzalojc'ulal. Ti mayal watx'ji a c'ul yin jun a yailal ti', ẍi bay ix.
Lananto wal yalon Jesús xin, max jay juntzan eb max tit bay yatut cham yajawil nail culto tu'. Max yalon eb bay: —A ix a cutz'in, mayal cam ix. Nabaxac'al mi chi toj yetnej ba Cham Meẍtol ti' toj yiloni, ẍi eb bay.
Palta a yet max yaben Jesús tzet max yal eb tu', max yalon bay cham yajawil nail culto tu': —Manchak ach oc il. Asan tol chaoc Dios yin a c'ul, ẍi bay.
Max lajwi tu', c'am mac max cha' tzakloj yintak. Asan Pedro yetok Jacobo, yetok Juan yuẍtak Jacobo tu', asannej eb max chatok yetok.
Max apni oc bay yatut cham yajaw tu xin, axa max yiloni, xiwil yok' anima. Xiwilxa chi el wek'ek'ok yaw eb yok'i.
Axa yoctok yul na tu', max yalon bay eb: —¿Tzet yuj xan xiwil chex ok'i? A ix unin ti', man camnakok ix, toc'al chi way ix, ẍi bay eb.
Palta toc'al max tzeyelay Cham yuj eb. Axa yuktelay eltek eb yina yuj Cham, cax max yion octok is mam c'al is txutx ix, yetok eb ajun yetok. Axa yoctok eb bay ayic' ix unin tu'.
Max oc mitx'an yin k'ab ix, cax max yalon bay ix axca ti': —Talita Cumi, ẍi. Chi yal elapnok: Ach unin, ayin chi wal ayach, ajan wanok, ẍi.
Max ajxac'al wan ix yet jun bek tu', axa yec'jab ix tu'. Lajcaweb abilxa k'inal ix. A jantak eb ayic' tu', caw wal max c'ayaj c'ul eb.
Max cam c'ul Jesús yalon bay eb tol manchak yalil eb jun ti', axa chekon Cham yak'lay low ix tu'.
Max paxtek Jesús bay jun lugar bay ayic' tu', axa jayoc bay is conob. Ac'al jun eb is cuywom yetok.
Axa yet c'ual xewilal, max cuywaj yul nail culto. Xiwil mac max abxalwi bay; palta toc'al max c'aycan aj c'ul eb yuj, axa yalon eb tu': —¿Baytal-laj max cuy jun winak ti' juntzan ti'? ¿Baytal-laj max yi' is jelanil? ¿Tzetlaj chi yun jeon milagro tu yuj?
Yujtol a jun ti', a ton jun josom te', yune' ix María. Yuẍtak ba yetok Jacobo, José, Judas, yetok Simón. Ayic' eb yanab co xol ti', ẍi eb. Yuj tu' xan c'am yelapnok Cham yul sat eb.
Axa yalon Jesús bay eb tu': —Ayc'alta' yelapnok eb chekbej Dios yul sat anima masanil. Asan yul sat eb yet conob eb, c'al yul sat eb yican eb, c'al yul sat eb junnej nail yayji yetok eb, c'am yelapnok eb, ẍi Jesús.
Maj je' yunen junok milagro bay tu', asan jaywan ya'ay max matxbaj oc k'ab yiban, cax max jaycan c'ul eb.
Max c'ayaj c'ul Cham, yujtol maj yaoc eb c'ul yin. Max lajwi tu xin, max ec' cuywaj bay juntzan aldealak cawilal is conob tu'.
Max yawtentek Jesús eb is lajcawan cuywom c'atan. Max lajwi tu', catakwan max yut chekontok eb. Max yak'on yikbej eb ioj el espíritu yob.
A yet c'amto chi toj eb, max yalon bay eb: —A yet chex toji, c'amc'al tzet che yi'. Manchak e yi' e pa, tamwal e lobej, tamwal tumin. Asan e k'okoch che yi'.
Asanokab e pichil ayocok yetok e xanab.
Tzanc'al tzet nail bay chex apni, ac'al bay tu' che yak' e posada masantac'al chex toj bay junokxa lugar.
Ta ay bay c'am chex chalay yuj anima, cax c'am chi yal c'ul eb chi cha yabej, c'am chex ayji bay jun lugar tu'; che tziccan el pokokal e yakan, yuj e tx'oxoncan elok tol c'amxa e yalon e yet yin eb, ẍi Jesús bay eb.
Max toj eb cuywom tu xin. Max ec' yalon el eb, tol yowalil chi na ba eb anima yin is yobtakil.
Xiwil espíritu yob max yican el eb yin anima. Xiwil eb ya'ay max ec' yacan oc eb aceite yin, cax max jayc'alcan c'ul eb.
Max yabaj cham rey Herodes juntzan tzet chi el yunen Jesús yet jun tiempoal tu', yujtol max pukil yabixal xol masanil anima, yuj tu', max yal axca ti': —A jun tu', a Juan nak ak'om bautismo max ictzoj aj xol eb camnak. Yuj tu' xan ay is yikbej yunen juntzan tu', ẍi.
Ay juntzanxa eb max alon axca ti': —A jun tu', a Elías, ẍi eb. Ay juntzanxa max aloni: —A junok eb chekbej Dios, axca eb yet payxa, ẍi eb.
A yet max yaben Herodes juntzan ti', max yaloni: —A jun chi yal eb tu', a Juan, jun max wak' ilay el jolom. A ton max ictzonelay aj xol eb camnak, ẍi cham.
Tix yuj ti' xan max cam Juan tu' yuj. Ay jun yuẍtak Herodes tu' chi yik Felipe. Herodías bi yistzil. Montebil el yistzil Felipe tu' yuj Herodes tu', axa Juan alnej bay Herodes tu' axca ti': —Caw c'am leyal cha montej el yistzil oẍtak, ẍi bay. Yuj tu', max tit yowal ix Herodías tu'. Axa c'oli yak'on ix c'ul Herodes tu', xan max yak' mitx'lay Juan, max yaoc preso, max pixay yetok cadena. A ix Herodías caw chi chichon oc c'ul ix yin. Chi yochej ix chi yak' camok, palta c'amc'al chi je'.
Yujtol yojtak Herodes tu', tol a Juan, caw watx' is beybal, cax tol yet wal Dios yayji. Yuj tu', max xiwaj yuj. Axa yaon oc taynemal tu', yet watx' manchak ak'lay cam yuj ix Herodías tu'. Ay bay chi yaltek Juan tu' abix bay Herodes. Caxc'al c'am chi nachaj el yuj sic'libil, palta caw chi tzaloj yabxalwi bay.
A yet max chaon Herodes k'inal yabilal, max sayon ix tzetbil chi yut yak'on cam Juan tu'. Ay jun miman loj max oc yuj Herodes. Max yak' low eb yet yajawilal, yetok eb yajawil eb soldado, c'al eb mimek winak yul yet Galilea.
Axa yoctok ix yune' ix Herodías tu' bay lanan yoc loj, axa canalwi ix tu'. Watx'xac'al yec' ix max yil Herodes, yetok eb ayic' low yetok. Yuj tu' xan max yal Herodes bay ix axca ti': —K'an tzet chi yochej a c'ul ayin, ok wak' ayach, ẍi bay ix.
Max loctek bi Dios, max yak'on ti' bay ix, max yaloni: —Tzanc'al junok tzet yetal cha k'an ayin, ok wak' ayach. Caxc'al a nanok bay ayin oc yajawilal ti', ok wak'a', ẍi.
A yet max eltek ix xin, max k'anlen ix bay is txutx: —¿Tzet chochej chin k'ana'? ẍi ix bay is txutx tu'. Axa tak'wi xal txutxej tu': —A jolom Juan, jun ak'om bautismo tu', cha k'ana', ẍi xal.
Axa yoctok ix bay cham rey tu', cax yalon ix bay, axca ti': —Chi wochej a jolom Juan jun ak'om bautismo tu' chak' ayin yul junok plato wal tinani', ẍi ix.
Caw wal max cusaj cham rey tu' yet max yaben cham, palta majxa je' yak'on tac cham ti', yujtol max loctek cham bi Dios, cax max yaben c'apax eb ayic' yetok cham tu'.
Axa chekontok cham jun soldado, max bet tit jolom Juan tu' yuj.
Max toj jun soldado tu' bay preso xin, cax max bet yion el jolom Juan tu', axa yiontek yul jun plato, max yak'on bay ix, axa yak'on ix bay is txutx tu'.
A yet max yaben eb cuywom Juan tu', max jayoc eb, max bet mukoncan eb is mimanil.
Max meltzoj eb chekbej Jesús bay, max yalontek eb jantakc'al tzet max yun eb, c'al tzet max yak' eb cuylaycanok.
Lajwitoc'al yalontek eb xin, axa yalon Cham bay eb axca ti': —Tonek xew jabok co tx'oklil bay c'am anima, ẍi. Max yal axca tu', yujtol c'am jabok colil eb yuj anima. Ay chi jayi, ay chi toji. Toltax low eb, tutun c'am colil eb.
Axa yoctok Jesús yul jun barco yetok eb is chekbej tu', max toj eb tx'oklil bay c'am anima.
Palta xiwil anima max ilon toj eb; toxa max yojtaknej pax el eb Jesús. Yuj tu' xiwil eb aj conob bay juntzan conoblak cawilal tu', max toj eb tilak a', babel max apni oc eb satak Cham.
Axa yeltek Jesús yul barco tu', max yiloni xiwil anima ayxa ec'ok. Axa cusoc c'ul yin eb tu', yujtol lajan eb axca juntzanok no calnel c'am yilomal, xan xiwil tzet yetal max yak' cuy eb.
A yet lananxa toj c'u, max jayoc eb is cuywom bay, max yalon eb axca ti': —Lananxa toj c'u. A bay jun lugar bay ayon ec' ti', c'am anima cajan.
Xan tekan watx' cha chektok eb anima ti' bay ay anima, yetok bay juntzan aldea cawil-lak ti', cax chi manon low ba eb bay tu', yujtol c'am lobej eb, ẍi eb.
—Ak'ek low eb ayex ti', ẍi Jesús bay eb is cuywom tu'. Axa yalon eb bay: —¿Chi mi toj co man 200 denario pan, chi yal tu', cax chi jak'on low eb? ẍi eb.
—¿Jayeb ixim pan ibil oc e yuj? Sayek ila', ẍi bay eb. A yet max lajwi yilon eb, max yalon eb bay: —Asan oyeb ixim jetbi ocok, yetok cac'on no txay, ẍi eb bay.
Max lajwi tu xin, max yalon Jesús tol chi ay chotan eb anima masanil yin bulquiẍtakil bay jun ac'al tu'.
Axa yay chotan eb tu'. Ay junjun bulan yin 50, ay eb yin 100.
Axa yion aj Cham ixim oyeb pan tu' yetok no cac'on txay. Max aj t'anan satcan, cax max yalon yuj diosalil yuj. Max c'oli bijontok ixim. Max lajwi tu' max yak'on bay eb is cuywom, cax max pojon ec' eb xol anima. Max poj c'apax ec' no cac'on txay tu' xol anima masanil.
Masanil anima watx' max yun low sic'libil.
A yet max xew low eb, maxto wajcan aj eb cuywom lajcawebxa motx nojnak yuj ixim bijquiltakil, c'al yetok no txay maxto cani.
A eb winak max low tu', oyeb mil eb.
Max lajwi tu xin, max yalon Jesús bay eb is cuywom tol chi oc eb yul barco, cax chi babji k'axpoj ec' eb satak Cham, chi ec'apnok eb bay conob Betsaida. Axa Jesús xin, maxto can yuj yalon toj ba bay eb anima.
Max lajwi yalon toj ba bay eb xin, max toj bay jun tzalan txajlok.
Ayxa ec' te barco tu' nan a', cax max k'ekbi, axa Jesús xin, aytocan ec' sat tx'otx' tx'oklil.
Axa max yilontok, caw chi el yip eb is cuywom tu' mak'on a', yujtol ow jay cak'ek' satak eb. Axa yet toxa chi sakbi, max beytok Jesús yiban a'. Yochej palanc'al k'okon babjok ba satak eb.
A yet max yilontok eb tol chi bey yiban a', max na eb tol lab jun chi jayoc c'atan eb tu', xan caw max el yaw eb.
Max xiw eb masanil, yujtol masanil eb max iloni. Axa yalon Cham bay eb axca ti': —Manchak ex oc il. Ayin Jesús in. Manchak ex xiwi, ẍi bay eb.
Max lajwi tu' max ajtok yetok eb yul barco tu', axa yoc wanaj cak'ek' tu' yuj. Toxac'al max c'aycan aj c'ul eb masanil.
Caxc'al toxa max yil eb milagro Jesús yin ixim oyeb pan, palta c'amtoc'al chi nachaj el is yikbej yuj eb, yujtol c'amto chi jakchaj nabal eb.
Max k'axpoj ec' eb xin, max ec' apnok eb bay conob Genesaret. Max pixbancan oc eb is barco bay ti a'.
Maxc'al eltek eb yul barco tu', max yilon oc eb anima tol a Jesús.
Xan max ec' eb batxontek masanil eb ya'ay bay jun lugar tu', max ilay jay eb bay Jesús.
Tzanc'al bay max eq'ui, yulak aldea ma yulak conob, ma bay cajan anima najatlak elok, max ilay eltek eb ya'ay yulak calle. Max k'anon eb mitx' jabok ti' pichil Cham, xan a masanil eb max mitx'oni, max jaycan c'ul eb.
Ay juntzan eb fariseo, c'al juntzan eb meẍtol yin ley Moisés max tit bay Jerusalén, max wajbaj oc bulan ba eb yin Jesús.
Max yil eb tol ay jaywan eb cuywom Jesús, tol c'am chi tx'aj eb k'ab yet chi low eb, axca yalon leyalil eb, xan yob max can eb yul sat eb, yuj maj tx'aj eb k'ab. Yuj tu xin, max al-lay eb cuywom tu' yobal yuj eb.
A eb fariseo tu', c'al masanil eb yet israelal, beybalnebilc'al beybal yichmam eb yuj, xan ta c'am chi cam tx'ajon eb k'ab axca yalon beybal eb tu', tutun wal c'am chi low eb.
A yet chi jay eb yet chi bet eb txonbal, masantac'al chi cam tx'ajon eb k'ab, catatu chi low eb, axca yalon ley eb tu'. Xiwiltoc'al juntzanxa tzet yetal chi beybalnej eb, axca tx'ajon eb is vaso, c'al ẍalu, c'al masanil mitx'k'ab eb yet loj, c'al bay chi ay chotan eb lowok.
Xan max yal eb fariseo tu', c'al eb meẍtol yin ley Moisés bay Jesús axca ti': —¿Tzet yuj xan c'am chi beybalnej eb a cuywom juntzan beybal eb jichmam? Yob chi can eb, yujtol c'am chi tx'aj eb k'ab chi low eb, ẍi eb.
Axa yalon Jesús bay eb tu': —Ayex ti' caw wal cabsat ex. Yel ton ta' tzet albilcan yuj Isaías e yin, yet max tz'ibencan axca ti' yul tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcanok: A jun conob ti', yinc'al k'anejal ay is watx' k'anej chi yal ayin, palta a wal yanimail eb, najat tx'uman el win.
Nabac'al chi tz'ak yiay ba eb ayin, yujtol asan juntzan chekbanil anima chi yak' eb cuylayok, ẍi Dios yul tx'an Un tu'.
Ayex ti', max e bekcan chekbanil Dios, axa cuybej eb jichmam che beybalnej.
Yujc'al e beybalnen juntzan beybal eb tu', xan che bekcan e beybalnen chekbanil Dios.
Max yalcan Moisés axca ti': Ayokab yelapnok e mam c'al e txutx yul e sat, ẍi. A mac chi baj is mam ma is txutx, ak'layokab camok, ẍi c'apaxok.
Palta a e yalon ayex ti', tol man yowalilok chi colwaj junok mactxel bay is mam, ma bay is txutx. Ilab ta ay junok mac chi alon bay eb axca ti': C'am chi je' in colwaj ayex, yujtol masanil tzet ay ayin, yet-xa Dios yayji, ta ẍi, xiwil watx'il che yabej.
Ta ay mac chi alon axca tu', manxa yowalilok chi colwaj bay is mam c'al bay is txutx, e yaloni.
Cac'al ton tu' che yut e yintaknen el chekbanil Dios, axa beybal eb jichmam che yak' cuylayok. Cax xiwiltoc'al juntzanxa che beybalnej axca juntzan ti', ẍi Jesús bay eb.
Max lajwi tu xin, max yawtenpaxtek Jesús eb anima tu' junelxa. Max yalon bay eb axca ti': —Abek e masanil tzet ok wala'. Nachajokab el e yuj.
A tzet chi octok yul co ti', c'am chi je' jetax el yuj yul sat Dios. A juntzan tzet chi tit yin co nabal, a' chon etnen el yul sat Cham, ẍi bay eb.
Max lajwi tu xin, max el Jesús xol eb anima tu', max octok yul na yetok eb is cuywom. Max k'anlen el eb bay: —¿Tzet chi yal elapnok jun cuybanil max al ti'? ẍi eb bay.
Axa yalon bay eb tu': —¿Tom c'am chi nachaj c'apax el e yuj ayex ti'? ¿Tom man e yojtakok, tol a tzet chi toj yul co ti', c'am chi je' jetax el yul sat Dios yuj?
Yujtol manak bay co nabal chi apni. A yul co c'ul chi ayapnok, lajwi tu xin chi eli, ẍi bay eb. Caytu' max yut yalon axca tu', tol a jantakc'al tzet chi lojic'alta'a, c'am yowalil yuj Dios.
Max yalon c'apax junxa ti' bay eb: —A juntzan tzet chi tit yin co nabal, a' chon etnen el yul sat Dios.
Yujtol a yin co nabal chi pitzc'oj aj juntzan yob nabalej ti'. Ay mac ayxa yetbi, cax chi yunen mul yetok junokxa mactxel. Ay eb man yetbiok ba, cax chi yunen mul. Ay eb chi mak' cam yet animail.
Ay eb chi elk'ani. Ay eb chi ochen oc tzet ay junokxa. Ay eb c'am watx'il chi yut ba. Ay eb chi yak' lek'tial. Ay eb c'am chi q'uixwi yunen junok tzet yetal q'uixwiltak. Ay eb chi chichon oc c'ul yin junok mactxel yuj tzet ay. Ay eb comonc'al chi buchboni. Ay eb chi maynej ba, ay c'apax mac c'am is nabal.
A juntzan yobtakil ti', a yin co nabal chi pitzc'oj ajok. A' chon etnen el yul sat Dios, ẍi Jesús.
Max lajwi tu xin, axa toj Jesús bay yul makbej Tiro. Max apni bay jun na, maj yochej max abchaj ajok ta ayic' bay tu', palta max abchaj ajok.
A bay tu' ay jun ix ix ay jun yune' ix unin, ayoc espíritu yob yin. Max yab ix txutxej tu' k'umal, tol max apni oc Jesús bay tu', axa toj ix bay Cham, max bet ay jajan ix bay.
A jun ix ix tu', man israelok ix, aj Sirofenicia ix. Max tewi ix bay Jesús, tol chi yiil espíritu yob ayoc yin ix yune' tu'.
Palta max yal Cham bay ix axca ti': —Nojokab c'ul eb uninalej yin babelal. Man watx'ok ta chi tok'lay ec' lobej eb, cax chi ak'lay bay no yune yal tx'i, ẍi.
Axa tak'wi ix bay Cham: —Yel ton Mamin, palta a no yal tx'i', chi sic'aj no' c'ajil lobej eb uninalej chi ayc'ay yalan meẍa, ẍi ix bay.
Yuj tu' xan max yal Cham bay ix axca ti': —A yuj tzet max al ayin tu', chi je' chach pax bay atut, yujtol mayal el espíritu yob yin ix one' tu', ẍi bay ix.
A yet max apni ix bay yatut, max yilon ix, telan aj yune' ix tu' sat tx'at, mayal el jun espíritu yob tu' yin ix.
Max el Jesús bay Tiro bay ayic' tu xin, max ec' bay conob Sidón, c'al bay juntzan conob ay yul yet Decápolis. Max lajwi tu', max jay bay ti a' mar Galilea.
Axa yet ayic' bay tu', max yion jay juntzan anima jun winak c'am chi je' yabeni bay Jesús, c'am wal chi je' c'apax k'anjab jun winak tu'. Max tewi eb bay Cham yuj yaon oc k'ab yiban nak.
Axa yion el Cham nak tx'oklil xol anima tu'. Max yaon octok Cham jun yiximal k'ab yul txiquin nak, max tzubeni. Max lajwi tu xin, max oc matxan yin yak' nak.
Axa yaj t'anan Jesús satcan, max c'oli jay is c'ul. ¡Efata! ẍi, (chi yal elapnok ¡Jakchajokabcanok!)
A wal yet jun bek tu', max jakchajcan txiquin nak anima tu', max watx'ji c'apaxcan yak' nak, axa k'anjab aj yin tx'ijanil tu'.
Max lajwi tu', max cam c'ul Jesús yalon bay eb anima tu' axca ti': —Ayta wal bay che yal jun ti', ẍi bay eb. Palta a yet max yalon bay eb axca tu', yelxac'al max yalil eb.
Caw wal max c'ayaj c'ul eb anima max abeni, max yalon eb axca ti': Caw watx' chi yun watx'nen masanil tzet yetal. Chi jakchaj txiquin eb c'amc'alta' chi je' yaben yuj, cax chi k'anjabcan aj eb c'amc'alta' chi je' k'anjabi, ẍi eb.
A yet jun tiempoal tu', xiwil anima max waj ba yin Jesús, palta c'am jabok lobej eb. Yuj tu' xan max yawtejtek eb is cuywom c'atan, axa yalon bay eb tu':
—Caw chi ok' in c'ul yin juntzan anima ti', yujtol oxebxa c'u yayji ec' eb jetok; a tinani' c'amxa tzet chi lo eb.
Ta c'am chi low eb cax chin chekon pax eb bay yatut, chi mi telc'oj eb yulak be yuj wajil, yujtol ay eb najat cajan, ẍi bay eb is cuywom tu'.
—Palta, ¿tzet wal ok jak' lo eb bay jun tz'inan tx'otx' ti'? ẍi eb cuywom tu' bay.
—¿Jayeb ixim pan ibil oc e yuj? ẍi bay eb. —Ukeb ixim, ẍi eb bay.
Axa chekon ay chotan Jesús eb anima tu' sat tx'otx'. Max yion aj ixim pan tu' yukebal, axa yalon yuj diosalil yuj ixim tu'. Max bijon ec'ok, max yak'on bay eb is cuywom. Axa eb max pojontok xol anima tu'.
Ay c'apax jun cac'on no txay yetbi eb. Max yalon c'apax Cham yuj diosalil bay Dios, cax max yalon bay eb is cuywom tu', tol chi pojic' eb no' xol eb anima tu'.
Max low eb masanil, watx' max yun noj c'ul eb. A yet max lajwi low eb tu', ukebto motx max nojcan yuj ixim bijquiltakil maxto cani.
Ay mi pax canebok mil eb max lowi. Lajwi tu xin, axa yalon toj ba Jesús bay eb tu'.
Max octok yul barco yetok eb is cuywom, axa toj bay yulak yet jun lugar chi yik Dalmanuta.
Ay juntzan eb fariseo max jayoc bay Jesús. Max c'oli teyelen ba eb yetok, yuj yak'on porobal eb, xan max k'an eb yil junok milagro chi tit bay Dios.
Axa c'oli jay c'ul Jesús, max yalon axca ti': —¿Tzet yuj xan che k'an e yil junok milagro ayin? Wal yel chi wal ayex, c'am junok milagro ok tx'oxlay e yila', ẍi Cham.
Max lajwi tu', max el c'atan eb fariseo tu', cax max octok yul te barco tu' junelxa yetok eb is cuywom. Axa k'axpoj ec' eb bay jun pac'xa a' mar tu'.
Majc'al na' eb cuywom Jesús tu' yi' is pan yul te barco. Asan ch'an jun jenan ixim yetbi eb.
Axa yalon Cham bay eb tu' axca ti': —Abek, che yilc'al e ba yuj yich pan eb fariseo, c'al yuj yich pan Herodes, ẍi bay eb.
Axa yalubtanen eb cuywom tu' yuj tzet max yal tu': —Ax pax yuj c'am co pan ibil, xan caytu' chi yala', ẍi eb.
Yojtak Jesús tzet chi yal eb, yuj tu' xan max yal bay eb axca ti': —¿Tzet yuj xan che yalubtanej tol c'am e pan ibil e yala'? ¿Tom c'amto chi nachaj el e yuj? ¿Tom manto e yojtakok, tzet chi yal elapnok jun ti'? C'amtoc'al chi jay e nabal.
¿Tom c'am che yil xin, tom c'am che yabej? ¿Tom c'amxa che natek?
A yet max in pojon ec' ixim oyeb pan xol anima, ¿jayebto motx maxto nojcan yuj ixim maxto cani? ẍi bay eb. —Lajcawebto motx, ẍi eb.
—Axa pax yet max in pojon ec' ixim ukeb pan xol eb caneb mil anima, ¿jayebto motx maxto nojcan yuj ixim maxto cani? ẍi. —Ukebto motx, ẍi eb.
—¿Tzet xan c'amtoc'al chi nachaj el jabok e yuj xin? ẍi bay eb.
Max lajwi tu', max jay eb bay conob Betsaida. Axa yilay jay jun winak c'am chi je' yilwi bay Jesús yuj anima. Max k'anon eb bay, tol chi yaoc k'ab yiban nak.
Axa yoc mitx'an Cham yin k'ab nak tu', max quetzon el Cham ti' conob. Max yaon oc Cham jab tzub yin sat nak tu'. Max yaon oc Cham k'ab yiban nak. Max lajwi tu', max k'anlen Cham bay, ta chixa je' yilon jabok.
Axa yak'len nak yilon tu', max yalon nak bay Cham: —Chixa wil yec'jab anima, asan tol axca te te' chi wila', ẍi nak.
Xan max yaoc Cham k'ab yiban sat nak junelxa. Axa watx'jixac'al yilon nak tu' sic'libil.
Max lajwi tu xin, axa chekon pax Cham nak bay yatut tu'. Max yalon bay nak axca ti': —Manchak ach ec' yul conob, ẍi Jesús bay nak.
Max lajwi tu', max ec' Jesús yetok eb is cuywom bay juntzan aldealak bay Cesarea Filipos. Max k'anlen Cham yulak be bay eb: —¿Mac in txel yalon eb anima, che yabej? ẍi bay eb.
—Ay eb chi aloni, tolab Juan cham ak'om bautismo ach yal eb. Ay eb xin, tolab Elías ach yalon eb. Ay mac xin, tolab chekbej Dios ach, ec'nak ach ab payxa, ẍi eb cuywom tu' bay.
—A pax ayex ti', ¿mac in txel e yaloni? ẍi bay eb. Axa tak'wi Pedro bay axca ti': —Ach ti', ach ton Cristo ach, ẍi bay.
Axa yalon Jesús bay eb tu': —Ayta bay e yalil jun ti', ẍi bay eb.
Axa c'oli yalon bay eb cuywom tu' tzetak yetal ok jayoc yiban. Max yalon axca ti': —Ayin ti', Chekbilintek yuj Dios xol eb jet animail ti', palta yowalil xiwil yailal ok eq'uel wiban. A eb ichamtak winak ay yopiso, yetok eb yajawil sacerdote, c'al eb meẍtol yin ley Moisés, ok in yintaknej el eb. Ok in yak' cam eb, palta a yet cabjial tu', ok in ictzoj ajok, ẍi bay eb.
Jichanc'al max yut yalon Jesús juntzan ti' bay eb. Axa yilay el Cham tx'oklil yuj Pedro, max yak'len tenon oc wanaj yaloni.
Axa toj t'annaj Jesús yin eb is cuywom tu'. Max tenchanen Pedro; max yalon bay axca ti': —Ach Satanás, elan in satak, yujtol manak tzet chi na' Dios cha na'. Asan yin yet anima ayoc a nabal, ẍi bay.
Max lajwi tu xin, max yawten eb is cuywom c'al yetok juntzanxa eb anima. Max yalon bay eb: —Ta ay mac chi yochej chi ec'c'al cuywok wintak, yowalilokab manxa yetok ba yul yet. Yabokab eb yail wuj, caxc'al chi alay oc eb yin curus. Ta bekan c'ul eb axca tu', ec'okabc'al eb cuywok wintak.
Yujtol a eb c'am chi yochej chi cam bay yulyibank'inal ti', chi bekil eb jun k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal. A pax eb chi bekc'ulok cam wuj xin, c'al yuj k'anejal colbanilej, a ton eb tu' ok chaon k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.
K'inalok ta chi ji' masanil tzet ay yulyibank'inal ti', palta c'am pax colbanil janimail, ¿tzet wal chi ji' yin axca tu'?
¿Tzet wal ok jak' manbalok colchaj janimail tu'?
A wal anima yet jun tiempoal ti', manak yin Dios chi yaoc eb is nabal, caw yob eb. Ta ay mac chi q'uixwi aj wuj satak eb, cax chi q'uixwi c'apax aj yuj in k'anej, ok in q'uixwok c'apax aj yuj eb, ayin Chekbilintek yuj Dios xol eb jet animail ti', yet ok in jay yetok yikbej in Mam, c'al eb yángel asan Cham ay yet.
Max yalon c'apax Jesús bay eb axca ti': —Wal yel chi wal ayex, ay jaywan e xol mac ex ayex ec' ti', tol manto ok ex camok okto e yil yoccan Dios yin Yajawilal yetok yipalil, ẍi bay eb.
Obxiixto yalon Jesús juntzan tu', max yiontok Pedro, yetok Jacobo c'al Juan bay jun miman tzalan. Asan eb max toj yetok. Max q'uexpoj yili Cham bay tu' satak eb.
Max tzekeki aj is pichil, saklubinakxac'al axca sakbat. C'am junok tx'ajwom yulyibank'inal ti' chi apni sakbanen pichilej axca wal yet tu'.
Axa max yilontek eb oxwan tu', ayic' Elías yetok Moisés, lanan k'anjab eb yetok Jesús.
Xan max yal Pedro bay Jesús: —Mamin Meẍtol, caw wal watx' jet yujtol ayon ec' cayti'. Tekan watx' chi co watx'nej oxebok lanchu, junok et, junok yet Moisés, yetok junok yet Elías, ẍi bay Cham.
Caw max xiw eb cuywom Jesús tu', xan man yojtakok Pedro tzet chi yala'.
Max lajwi tu xin, max ay boc'naj jun asun yiban eb, axa yeltek jay belan k'anej xol jun asun tu', max al-lay axca ti': A ton in C'ajol bay xiwil chi camel in c'ul ti'. Acbajek e txiquin bay, ẍi.
Axa max yilontek eb, c'amxa mac ayic'ok. Asanxanej Jesús ayic'ok.
A yet lanan bey eb yaytek bay jun tzalan tu', max yalon Cham bay eb: —Ayta mac bay che yalil jun tzet max e yil ti'. Ato yet ok in ictzoj aj xol eb camnak, ayin Chekbilintek yuj Dios xol eb jet animail ti', catatu' ok e yalon elok, ẍi bay eb.
Yuj tu' xan munilc'al ay jun k'anej ti' yul c'ul eb. C'am junok mactxel bay max yal eb. A yet max yalon tol ok ictzoj aj xol eb camnak tu', max c'oli naobtanen eb, tzet chi yal elapnok jun k'anej tu'.
Max lajwi tu', max k'anlen el eb jun ti' bay: —A eb meẍtol yin ley Moisés chi yal eb axca ti': A Elías, yowalil ok babjok jay satak Cham Sic'bil el yuj Dios, ẍi eb. ¿Tzet yuj xan chi yal eb axca tu'? ẍi eb bay.
Axa yalon Jesús bay eb tu' axca ti': —Yel toni, yowalil chi babji jay Elías tu', yuj watx'nen masanil. Palta ¿tzet ẍi tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcan win ayin Chekbilintek yuj Dios xol eb jet animail ti'? Chi yal yul tx'an tol ok wil yailal, cax ok in intaknelaycan el yuj anima.
Chi wal ayex, tol a Elías tu', ulnakxa ec'ok. Ay eb max yak' wal nabal yetnen axca wal chi yochej c'ul. Axca yal-laycan yin yul tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcanok, cayton wal tu' max yut eb, ẍi Jesús bay eb is cuywom tu'.
A yet lanan yapni eb bay ayic' juntzanxa eb cuywom, max yilontok Jesús tol xiwil anima ayic' yetok eb. Axa eb meẍtol yin ley Moisés, lanan teyelen ba eb yetok eb cuywom Jesús.
A yet max yilontok masanil eb ayxa ec' tu' yapni Jesús, caw max c'ayaj c'ul eb, xan max yak' eb yanej toj chaoni.
A yet max apni oc eb c'atan Cham, max k'anlen el bay eb: —¿Tzet che teyelej e ba yin yetok eb? ẍi Cham bay eb.
Ay jun nak max tak'wi aj xol eb anima tu': —Mamin Meẍtol, max witek jun in c'ajol ayach. Ayoc espíritu yob yin, xan c'am chi je' k'anjabi.
Tzanc'al bay ayic' nak cax chi tita', chi telc'oj nak yuj. Chi eltek sukuwal ti' nak yuj, cax chi natx'atx'i ye nak. Caw lanan bakbi nak yuj. Max wal-lej bay eb chi ec'c'al cuywok entak, tol chi yican el eb yin nak, palta maj je' yuj eb, ẍi bay.
Axa yalon Jesús axca ti': —¡A… a wal ayex ti'! ¡Caw c'am che yaoc e c'ul yin Dios! ¡Mimanxa tiempoc'al wayji ec' e yetok! ¿bak'intoc'al ok nachaj el e yuj xin? Chi yab yail in c'ul e yuj. Iektek jun unin tu' ayin, ẍi.
Axa bet yiontek bay tu'. A yet max yilon oc jun espíritu yob tu' tol a Jesús, max caktzaj yin jun unin tu'. Max telc'ojtok nak unin tu', max c'oli yec' telton nak yuj. Max eltek sukuwal ti' nak.
Axa k'anlen Jesús bay is mam jun unin tu': —¿Jantakxa tiempoal michchaj yuj? ẍi. Axa yalon nak mamej tu': —Yintax yaliẍal ayxa oc yin.
Xiwilxa el chi toj yiban k'ak' yuj, c'al yul a', chi yochej chi yak' camok. Palta ta chi je' oj, ok' a c'ul jin. Colwajan jetok, ẍi nak bay.
—¿Tzet yuj xan chala' ta chi je' oj? cachi. Chi je', ta chaoc Dios yin a c'ul. A eb chi yaoc c'ul yin, masanilc'al tzet yetal chi je' yunen bay eb, ẍi bay nak.
Axa yaj yaw is mam nak unin tu' yin ipejal: —Chi waoc yin in c'ul. Ocan wetok, cax chi ajc'al can waon oc yin in c'ul, ẍi nak.
A yet max yilon Jesús tol xiwil wajon ba anima yin, axa tzuon jun espíritu yob tu'; —Ach espíritu yob, ak'om chacaycan anima c'al ak'om membok anima, chi wal ayach, elan yin jun unin ti'. C'amxa chach oc yin junelxa, ẍi Cham bay.
Axa yel yaw jun espíritu yob tu'. Max caktzaj yin jun unin tu' junelxa. Catatu' bian, max el yin; palta jun unin tu xin, toxac'al max cancan jaban yuj. Yuj tu' xan xiwil eb max aloni tol max camxac'al nak.
Palta axa Jesús max oc mitx'an yin is k'ab nak, max tok'on aj wan. Axa yaj wan nak tu'.
Max lajwi tu xin, axa yoctok Jesús tx'oklil yetok eb is cuywom tu' yul na. Max k'anlen el eb bay: —¿Tzet yuj xan maj je' juj jion el jun espíritu yob tu'? ẍi eb bay.
Axa yalon bay eb tu': —A jun makan espíritu yob ti', man comonok chi eli. Asan yuj txaj chi je' yel jun makan ti', ẍi Jesús bay eb.
A yet max el eb bay tu', max ec' eb yulak yet Galilea. Max yochej Jesús tol c'am mac max aben yapni,
yujtol lanan cuywaj bay eb is cuywom, xan max yal bay eb axca ti': —Ayin ti', caxc'al Chekbilintek yuj Dios xol eb jet animail, palta ok in alay oc yul k'ab juntzan winak. Ok in yak' cam eb, palta a yet cabjial, ok in ictzoj ajok, ẍi bay eb.
Palta a eb xin, maj nachaj el yuj eb tzet chi yala'. Max xiw pax eb k'anlen el bay, tzet chi yal elapnok.
Max lajwi tu', max apni oc eb bay conob Capernaum. A yet ayxa ec' eb bay na max k'anlen bay eb: —¿Tzet che yalubtanej yulak be? ẍi.
Palta tz'inc'al ẍi eb, yujtol a yet ayoc eb yul be tu', chi c'oli yalubtanen eb mactxel junok miman yelapnok xol eb.
Xan max ay chotan Jesús. Max yawtentek eb lajcawanil c'atan, max yalon bay eb: —Ta ay junok e xol ti' chi yochej miman chi yun yelapnok, yowalil yaynakil chi yut ba e yintak e masanil. Yowalil chi oc e yak'omalok serbil e masanil, ẍi Jesús bay eb.
Axa yiontek Jesús jun unin xol eb tu', max lacon ajok, axa yalon tu':
—Tzanc'al mac wujc'al chi chaon junok unin axca jun ti', axca tol ayin chin is cha'. Man asannejok in chin is cha eb, chi cha' c'apax eb Cham cheknej intek, ẍi.
Axa yalon Juan bay Jesús axca ti': —Mamin Meẍtol, ay jun winak max jila', lanan yion el espíritu yob yin anima yin ach yak'on binajok. Palta max co tenchanej, yujtol man junnejok chi ec' jetok, ẍi bay.
Max yalon Jesús: —Maj je' e tenon oc wanaj yunen nak, yujtol c'am junok mactxel chi xew yak'on junok milagro yetok wikbej, cax chi yalon pax in k'umal.
Yujtol a eb man ajc'ulok oc jin, a jetok ayoc eb.
Tzanc'al mac chex colon eltek yalan e cawxinakil, yujtol wet ex ayin Cristo in ti', caxc'al a junok vaso siquila' chi ak'lay ayex, yowalil ok cha' paktzil.
Ta ay mac chi ak'on etax el is nabal junok uninto chi yaoc c'ul win, caw ok'bal c'ul. Yel mi watx' chi pixlay oc t'unan junok miman ch'enal molino yin is nuk' babelal, cax chi k'oklaytok yul a' mar, yet watx' c'am chi yak' etax el nabal jun mactxel tu'. Ta a junok e k'ab chi ak'on etax el e nabal, watx' che tzoq'uil jun e k'ab tu', yet watx' c'am chi etax el e nabal yuj junelnej. Yujtol caxc'al junxanej e k'ab, palta ta ok e cha' k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, watx' e yet. Palta ta ok ex tojcan infierno xin, bay c'am is tanub k'ak' k'ak', caxc'al tz'akan masanil yetbeyom e mimanil, palta yobc'alta' e yet. Ta a junok e yakan chi ak'on etax el e nabal, yel mi watx' che tzoq'uil jun e yakan tu', yet watx' c'am chi etax el e nabal yuj junelnej. Yujtol caxc'al junxanej e yakan, palta ta ok e cha' k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, watx' e yet. Palta ta ok ex tojcan infierno xin, bay c'am is tanub k'ak' k'ak', caxc'al tz'akan masanil yetbeyom e mimanil, palta yobc'alta' e yet. Ta a junok e bak' sat chi ak'on etax el e nabal, yel mi watx' che yiiltek, yet watx' c'am chi etax el e nabal yuj junelnej. Yujtol caxc'al junxanej e bak' sat palta ta ok ex oc yul k'ab Dios, watx' e yet. Palta ta ok ex tojcan infierno xin, bay c'am is tanub k'ak', caxc'al tz'akan e bak' sat cabil, palta yobc'alta' e yet. A no patz chi chiontok eb tu', c'am chi camil no'. A k'ak'ej chi ak'on tz'a eb, c'am chi tani.
Axca chi yun yoc yatz'amil junjun xajanbal, axca tu' ok yun yalay oc k'ak'al eb masanil.
A atz'am atz'am, caw ay yopiso atz'am, palta k'inalok ta ay jabok atz'am chi c'ay is c'achial, ¿tzetto wal ok yun c'achibi aj junelxa? Axcaokab yoc yopiso atz'am atz'am tu xin, cayexokab tu'. Ayokab c'apax junc'ulal e xol, ẍi Jesús bay eb.
Ayin Pablo in ti', preso wayji yujc'al chi wak' nabal Cristo Jesús. Ajun juẍtak Timoteo wetok, cax chi jaontok co carta ti' ayach Filemón. Camc'ulnebil ach juj, yujtol jet mulnajwomal co ba yin mulnajil Dios.
Chi wal c'apaxtok bay eb creyente chi wajbaj ba bay atut, yetok bay janab Apia, c'al bay juẍtak Arquipo, yujtol chi yak' yip yin yet Dios jetok.
Yak'okabc'al co Mam Dios c'al Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal c'al is junc'ulal ayex bay tu'.
Caw wal chi wal yuj diosalil bay Dios oj, yet chin txajli,
yujtol chi wab a k'umal cayti', tol caw wal ayoc Cham Jajawil Jesucristo yin a c'ul. Ay ab a camc'ulal yin, c'al yin masanil eb yuninalxa Dios.
Ay eb chi yaoc c'ul yin Cristo oj, yujtol chi yil eb tol ayoc yin a c'ul. Lanan in k'anon bay Dios yuj eb, yet watx' chi nachaj el yuj eb, tol a Cristo Jesús chi ak'on masanil tzet watx' ayon.
Caw wal chin tzaloj oj, yujtol ay ab a camc'ulal bay tu'. Caw wal chi wi' in mimanc'ulal oj cayti', yujtol ach ti' wuẍtak, caw wal chak' tzalojbok c'ul eb creyente bay tu'.
Ayin ti', chekbej in Cristo. Yuj tu', ay walon wet ach wak'on pural yin tzet yowalil chonej.
Palta c'am chach wak' pural. A ti wet tol chin k'an favor ayach, yet watx' chi txecloj el a camc'ulal. Ayin Pablo in ti', icham winak inxa. Preso pax wayji tinani' yujc'al chi wak' nabal Cristo Jesús.
Chin k'an favor ayach yuj Onésimo, nak axca tol max oc in c'ajolok, yujtol max cha' nak Cristo wuj yul preso ti'.
A yet yalantok, c'am jabok yopiso nak ach yak'on serbil. Axa tinani xin, caw wal chi oc yopiso nak oj, cax chi oc yopiso nak wuj.
Yuj tu', ti chin chek pax nak ayach. Matawal cha cha' apnok nak. Axcaok tol ayin chin apni, caytu' chot a chaon apnok nak.
Manak in, chi wochej chi ayji ec' nak wetok cayti' yuj in yak'on serbil. Axcaok tol ach chin ul ak' serbil yul preso ti'. Ilab tol preso wayji, yujc'al chi walil k'anejal yet colbanilej.
Palta c'am chi yal in c'ul chi babji wak'on trato yetok nak, masantac'al chi wab ayach. Yujtol chi wochej tol yin wal a c'ul chi eli, cax chak'on favor ayin yetok nak, cax man yinok ak'bil pural chach wutej.
Yel toni, max el nak entak jun tiempoal; palta yamita caytu' chi yunej, yet watx' chi ayjixac'al ec' nak etok junelnej.
Manxa mosejalok chi yun yayji ec' nak entak tinani'. Mimanxa yelapnok nak yul a sat. Ilab juẍtakxa nak, caw camc'ulnebil nak wuj. Yelokab cha camc'ulnej nak yet ok apnok nak ayach. Man asannejok yujtol jet animail nak, xan ok a camc'ulnej, palta yujtol juẍtakxa co ba yetok nak yin Cham Jajawil.
Ta caw jetbi co ba cha na', cha apnok nak entak junelxa. Axcaok tol ayin chin a cha' apnok entak, caytu' chot a chaon apnok nak.
Ta ay junok mul nak max oc ayach, ma jec nak max oc xin, tz'ibejcantok wiban.
Ayin caw Pablo in ti' ok wak' pax jec nak tu' ayach. Yuj tu' xan tix in bi chin tz'ibejtok ayach ti'. Ojtakxa tol axca tol ay c'apax a jec ayin, yujtol ayin max wal abej, xan max a cha' Cristo.
Yuj tu' wuẍtak, tutun creyente achxa, xan ak' wal jun favor ti' ayin. Yujokab Cristo xan chak' tzalojbok in c'ul.
Chi waltok juntzan ti' ayach, yujtol wojtak tol yikemc'al chot a ba. Wojtak tol man asannejok tzet chi waltok ayach ok ekej oneni, palta ok ec' yiban eken onen juntzanokxa tzet yetal.
Chi wal c'apaxtok ayach, tol cha say jabok bay chi wak' in posada bay tu'. Ta ok el yin c'ul Dios ok in tok ayex tu', axcata' che yut e k'anon yin txajil.
Chi yatok juẍtak Epafras cawil a c'ul. Ay c'apax oc preso wetok, yujc'al tol chi jak' nabal Cristo Jesús.
Chi ya c'apaxtok eb wet mulnajwomal cawil a c'ul, a ton Marcos, Aristarco, Demas, c'al Lucas.
Yak'okabc'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal ayex bay tu'.
Ayin Pablo in ti', yetok Timoteo, yak'omal serbil Jesucristo jayji. Ti chi jatok jun co carta ti' ayex e masanil ex yet-xa Dios aj Filipos, ex junxanej e yayji yetok Cristo Jesús. E yet c'apax yayji jun carta ti', ex anciano c'al ex diácono aj Filipos tu'.
Tx'oxokabc'al co Mam Dios c'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo is watx'c'ulal c'al is junc'ulal ayex.
A yet chex in naontek junjuntak el, chi wal yuj diosalil bay co Diosal e yuj.
A yet chin txajli junjuntak el, chin txajli yin tzalojc'ulal e yuj e masanil.
Yujtol yecheltaxc'al max e chaon Cristo, masantac'al tinani', junxanej mulnajilal chi jun yin is k'anejal yet colbanilej tinani'.
Mayal chail Dios yich mulnaj oc e yin. A tinani', wojtak sic'libil, tol ok mulnajc'al oc e yin, masantac'al yet jun c'ual yet ok jay Jesucristo.
Caw wal chex in camc'ulnej; watx' ton tzet chin na ti', yujtol ayex ti' ayoc e colwal wetok yin wopiso max yak' Dios. Max ex colwajc'al wetok yet bekan wayji yin walon elok tol yel jun k'anejal yet colbanilej; lanantoc'al e colwaj wetok caxc'al ayin oc yul preso ti'.
Yojtak Dios tol caw chex in camc'ulnej e masanil yetok is camc'ulal Jesucristo ak'bil ayin.
Chin k'an bay Dios e yuj, tol chi aj can e camc'ulal, cax chi yak'on is jelanil ayex. Chin k'an c'apax bay, tol chex aj can yin nachaj el masanil is tzetak yetal,
yet watx' che yojtaknej wal elok baytet ay juntzan tzetak yetal watx' yul sat Dios, cax chi tojolbi wal oc e nabal, yet watx' a yet ok jay Cristo, c'amokab jabok e paltail yul sat.
Ok oc Jesucristo e yetok, yet watx' tojolc'al ok e yut e beybal. Ta axca tu', ok txecloj el e yin, tzetbil tol caw xiwil watx'il c'ul Dios, cax ok al-lay watx' k'anej bay Cham.
Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, chi wochej c'apax chi nachaj el junxa ti' e yuj, tol a tzet max jay wiban ti', man yobok wet yuj, palta tol yuj, xan chi aj can pukax el k'anejal yet colbanilej tinani'.
Ilab tol masanil eb soldado c'al eb yajaw, c'al juntzanxa eb anima cayti', maxc'al yab eb masanil, tol asannej yujtol chi waoc in c'ul yin Cristo xan ayin oc preso.
A yet max yilon eb creyente, tol tec'an chi wut in ba yul preso ti', xan xiwil eb chi yi' wal tec'anil wuj. C'amxa chi xiw eb yalon el k'anej Dios cayti'. Caw chi tec'baj ba eb yin Cham Jajawil.
Yel toni, ay juntzan eb chi chichon oc c'ul win. Yujc'al tu' chi yalon el eb yabixal Cristo. Man yinok masanil c'ul eb chi yalon el eb, palta toc'al chi yi' can ba eb. A chi yochej eb tol chi aj can in cusc'ulal yul preso ti'. Palta ay pax juntzanxa eb xin, yin masanil c'ul eb chi yalon el eb, yujtol chin is camc'ulnej eb. Yojtak eb, tol ayin ec' cayti' yuj walon elok tol caw yel jun k'anejal yet colbanilej ti'.
Palta ayin ti', c'am tzet chin na' yuj juntzan ti'. Caxc'al yin masanil c'ul eb chi yalon el eb, caxc'al c'amak, palta chin tzaloji, yujtol a yabixal Cristo lanan yalon el eb. Ok jay wal in tzalojc'ulal,
yujtol wojtak, tol caxc'al chi wab yail tinani', palta watx' ok in elocok, yujtol lanan e txajli wuj. Watx' ok in elocok yujtol ayoc Cham Yespíritu Jesucristo wetok.
Yin masanil in c'ul, chi wochej tol c'am chi wak' in q'uixwilok. Chi wochej, caw tec'anc'al chi wut walon elok, axca tonc'al chi wut in ba ti'. Ta axca tu', caxc'al iquis in, ma chin cami, palta ok txeclojcan el win, tol caw miman yelapnok Cristo.
Yujtol ayin ti', a yet iquis in ec'ok, asan Cristo naan wuj. Axa yet ok in camok, ec'ban watx'il ok in elocok.
Ta iquis into ec' yulyibank'inal ti' jabokxa, chi je' in mulnaj jabokxa yin yet Cham Jajawil, palta ¿ma txequel baytal mi ay junok ec'ban watx'il?
C'am chi nachaj el wuj, baytet ay junok watx'. Chi wochej chin cami, yet watx' chi je' wapni ayman bay ayic' Cristo, yujtol ta axca tu' yelxac'al watx' wet.
Palta yuj e watx'ilok ayex ti', xan yowalil iquis into jabokxa bay yulyibank'inal ti'.
Yuj tu', wojtak sic'libil, tol ok into can janic'okxa e yetok. Ok ex in col jabokxa, yet watx' che yi wal e yip, cax chi jay wal e tzalojc'ulal, yujtol che yaoc Cristo yin e c'ul.
Yuj tu', ok in tok ayex junelxa, yet watx', tol wujc'al che yal e watx' k'anej bay Cristo Jesús.
Palta caxc'al ok in tok ayex, ma c'amak, watx'okabc'al che yut e beybal tol chi cha ba axca yalon Cristo yin is k'anejal yet colbanilej. Ta axca tu', ok wab e k'umal, tol ac'ala' tec'an e waayi, cax tol ac'ala' junnej nabalejal e yayji bay tu'. Ok wab c'apaxok, tol jun lajanc'al e yaon oc e c'ul yin jun k'anejal yet colbanilej tu', cax caw tec'an e waay yin.
Manchak ex xiw bay eb chi chichon oc c'ul jin. Caytu' ok e yut e tx'oxk'abnen elok, tol ok c'aycan el eb yin junelnej. Yetok c'apaxok, caytu' ok yun txecloj elok, tol ayxa co colbanil, yujtol caytu' ok yut Dios tx'oxk'abnen elok.
Yuj is watx'c'ulal Cristo max yak' ayon, tol man asannejok tol ay jalon jet jaon oc co c'ul yin, palta tol ay c'apax jalon jet jaben yailal yetok.
Ayex ti', jun lajan e yak'on e yip e tec'ban e ba wetok. E yilnak in, tol caw tec'an wutnak in ba e nan e xol. Axa tinani', lanan e yabeni, tol ac'ala' tec'anc'al chi wut in ba.
Chon yiptzej Cristo. Chi yak' co mimanc'ulal yuj is camc'ulal jin. Junxanej jayji yetok Cham Yespíritu tinani'. A Cham chi ak'on co camc'ulal yet watx' chi ok' co c'ul yin eb jet animail.
Yuj juntzan ti', xan caw wal junxanejokab che yut e nabal yin Cham. Jun lajanokab che yut e camc'ulnen e ba. Jun lajanokab che yut e naon masanil tzetak yetal. Jun lajanokab che yut e c'ul. Ta che beybalnej axca tu', ok jay in tzalojc'ulal e yuj cayti'.
C'am chi je' jion can co ba, cax chi co luesnen co ba, palta tol yaynakilokab chi jut co ba. Aokab chi jut co nabal junjun on, tol mimanokab yelapnok eb jet creyenteal jintak.
Manokab asannejok on chi co na co ba co tx'oklil, palta yowalilokab chi co na' c'apax tzet yayji oc eb jet creyenteal.
Lajanokab chi jut co nabal axca yutnak ba Cristo Jesús.
A Cristo, caxc'al Dios c'alta'a, palta max el wal yin c'ul, max bekoncan jun bay ay yalon yet yetok Dios. C'am jabok tzet max na' yet max bekoncanok.
Yuj tu', max bekcan masanil yet tu', cax max tita', max ul yuten ba chekbejal. Max ul yak' ba aljok yin animail.
A yet ayic' yin animail tu', caw yaynakil max yutc'al ba, cax yikemc'al max yut ba, toltax max yikej cami. Caw q'uixwiltak max yun cam yin te curus.
Yuj tu', caw mimanbil yuj Dios tinani'. A ak'nej jun is bi tol ec'ban yelapnok yintak masanil biej.
Caytu' yutnak Dios axca tu', yet watx', a masanil eb ay bay satcan, c'al masanil eb ay sat tx'otx' ti', c'al eb ay yul tx'otx', a yet ok yaben eb bi Jesús, ok ay jajan eb masanil satak.
Cax ok yalon eb masanil axca ti': A ton Jesucristo ayoc Jajawilok, ẍi eb. Axca tu' ok yun txecloj elok, tol caw miman yelapnok co Mam Dios.
Yuj tu', ex in camc'ulnebil, yikemokabc'al che yut e ba, axcac'alta' e beybal yet ayin ec' e yetok bay tu', cayokabc'al tu' che yut e ba yet c'am in ec' e yetok. Ayokab e yelapnok yul e sat junjun ex; ak'ek e yip yin yaynakilal, yet watx' chi tz'aknaj el e colbanil.
Yujtol a Dios ayoc jetok, a' chi ak'on jochej junen watx'ilal, cax a' chi ak'on c'apax jip junen is yochwan.
A yet chi ak'lay e yun junok tzet yetal, manokab yinok chichonc'ulal che yunej. Manokab xiwilok che yalubtanej tzet yuj xan chi ak'lay e yunej.
Manchak e yun axca tu', yet watx' c'am mac ok alxok tol ay e mul ma e paltail. Caxc'al ayex ec' nan xol anima yob beybal, cax yob is nabal, axa ayex yuninal exxa Dios ti', c'amxaokab tzet man watx'ok ayoc e yin axca eb tu'. Axca waycan chi joplajbi xol k'ekk'inal, cayokab ex tu' nan xol eb,
yujtol che yalil is k'anej Dios nan xol eb, jun k'anej chi alontek yuj co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal. Ta axca tu' che yutej, caw ok in tzaloj aj e yuj yet ok jay Cristo, yujtol caw wal ok txeclojok tol man nabac'alok max in lajoc wak'on wip in mulnaj e nan e xol.
Caxc'al ayin ti' chin cam tz'akilok e xajanbal che yak' bay Dios, yujtol che yaoc Cham yin e c'ul, chin tzaloji. Chi wochej tol che yab jun tzalojc'ulal tu' wetok.
Cay ex tu' c'apaxok, tzalojanek. Ak'ek wojtaknej el e tzalojc'ulal tu'.
Chi wochej chin chektok Timoteo ti' ayex yet jayeb c'u, ta axca tu' chi el yin c'ul Cham Jajawil Jesús, yujtol chi wochej chi wabej tzetbil e yayji bay tu', cax chi tzaloj aj in c'ul e yuj cayti'.
Yujtol c'am junokxa mac lajan naon axca Timoteo, tol caw wal chi oc il e yuj.
Yujtol junjunc'al mactxel, asan yet eb chi na'. C'am jabok chi na' eb is mulnajil Cristo Jesús.
Palta e yojtakxa, tol a Timoteo ti' caw ojtakbilxa is beybal. Axca junok c'ajolej yetok is mam, axca tu' yak'on Timoteo ti' wetok. Caw chi yak' serbil Cham Jajawil wetok, yin yalon el k'anejal yet colbanilej.
Yuj tu', ato yet ok wiloni, tzet ok yun weloc tinani', chi wochej ok in chektok Timoteo ti' ayex bay tu'.
Yetok c'apaxok, chi waoc Cham Jajawil yipok in c'ul, tol ayin wal caw ok ex tok wil yin aymanil.
Chin na' c'apaxok, tol yowalil ok in chektok pax juẍtak Epafrodito, nak chekbiltek e yuj, yuj quin ul yak'on serbil. Caw tec'an chi yut ba mulnaj wetok yin yet Cham Jajawil.
Caw chi yochej chex toj yilcanok. Chex nalay yuj, yujtol max e yabej tol caw wal ya'ay nak cayti'.
Yel, jabxanej ton maj cam nak, palta maxto ok' c'ul Dios yin nak. Yuj tu', max watx'ji c'ul nak. Man asannejok yin Epafrodito ti' max ok' c'ul Dios, palta max ok' c'apax c'ul win, yuj max jaycan c'ul nak tu', xan c'amxa chi yik ba in cusc'ulal cayti'.
Yuj tu', chi wochej chin chektok nak ayex, yet watx' chex tzaloj ajok, cax che yilon yapni nak ayex junelxa. Ta axca tu', ayinxa ok c'ayaj in cusc'ulal cayti'.
Chaek apnok nak yin tzalojc'ulal e nan e xol tu', yujtol e yuẍtak c'apax e ba yetok nak yin Cham Jajawil. Masanilc'al eb lajan nabal axca Epafrodito ti', ayokab yelapnok eb yul e sat.
A jun juẍtak ti', tutun wal jabxanej maj camok, yujc'al tol lanan yak'on serbil Cristo. Caxc'al ijan max cami, yujtol lanan quin yak'on serbil cayti', palta c'am jabok tzet chi na', caxc'al chi cami. Ayex ti', maj je' quin ul e yak'on serbil. Yuj tu', a' aytek quin ul yak'on serbil e q'uexelok.
A tinani' ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, ak'ek tzaloj e c'ul yin Cham Jajawil. Ay juntzanxa tzet ok waltok ayex, tol man yobok chi wabej tol ac'ala' ok waltok ayex junelxa, yujtol yowalil che watx' ojtaknej elok.
Caw che yilc'al e ba bay juntzan eb caw yob is nabal, axca junok tx'i'. Caw yob chi yut ba eb, yujtol chi yochej eb chi polil jabok tz'umal e mimanil.
Palta ayon ti', ak'bil onxa circuncidar yin yel yul sat Dios, ayon tol chi jal co ba bay Dios yuj Cham Espíritu. Asan yin Cristo Jesús chon tzaloji, axa tzet chi je' juneni c'am chi jaoc yipok co c'ul.
A max wut in naon ayin ti', tol moj chi waoc juntzan ti' yipok in c'ul, yujtol caw yikem wutnak in ba yin juntzan ti'. Tekan ay eb chi naoni, tol moj chi colchaj eb yuj juntzan chi el yunen eb tu', palta ayin ti', ec'ban yikem wutnak in ba yin juntzan tu'.
Jun semana walji max in ak'lay circuncidar, yujtol israel in. Yinatil into Benjamín, hebreo in, yujtol hebreo in mam c'al in txutx. Caw yikem in yin masanil ley Moisés, yujtol fariseo in.
A yet tu' caw chi waoc in nabal yin in religión, yuj tu' xan etnebil eb yet-xa Cristo wuj. Maxc'al wikej masanil tzet chi yal ley Moisés, c'am jabok tzet bay moj in tzulayi.
Masanil juntzan max wal ti', miman yelapnok in naoni, palta a tinani', a chi wut in naoni, c'am jabok yelapnok juntzan tu', yujtol asan yin Cristo chi waoc in nabal.
Masanil juntzan tzet max walej oc yipok in c'ul tu', c'am jabok yelapnok yul in sat tinani', yujtol ay junxa tzet caw watx' chi el wunen tinani', tol chi wojtaknej el Cristo Jesús Cham Jajawil. Yuj Cristo ti', xan max c'aycan el masanil juntzan walejnak oc yipok in c'ul tu'. Axa tinani', axcaxa k'alem yayji yul in sat, yujtol chi wochej chi wi' can Cristo junelnej,
junxanej chi wuncan el yetok. A tinani', chi yal Dios, tol watx' in yul sat, yujtol chi waoc in c'ul yin Cristo, man yujok tol chi wikej tzet chi yal ley Moisés. Asan yuj chi jaoc co c'ul yin Cristo, xan chon occan watx'il yul sat Dios.
Chi wochej chi wojtaknej el Cristo wal sic'libil, yet watx' a ipejal max ak'on ictzoj ajok, a' chi mulnaj oc win. Chi wochej chi wab yail yetok, cax chin ayji axca max yun yayji Cristo yet max cami.
Yujtol chi wochej tol ay c'apax walon wet wictzonelay aj xol eb camnak.
Man lananok waloni ta mayal wak' ganar juntzan chi wal ti', yujtol manto caw tz'akanok in yin masanil; palta ac'ala' wak'on wip tinani', yet watx' chin tz'aknaj el yin masanil. Yuj tu' xan max in sic'lay el yuj Cristo Jesús.
Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, manto tz'akanok in yin juntzan ti' chi wut in naon tinani', palta ok waltok ayex, tzet chi el wuneni. A tinani', c'amxa chin natek juntzan tzet mayal yi ba wuj. Asan juntzan c'amto chi yi ba wuj, a' chin na'. Caw chi wak' wip,
yet watx' ok in cha' is paktzil bay satcan. Yuj is paktzil tu', xan chon yawtej oc Dios yetok, yujtol junxanej chi juncan el yetok Cristo Jesús.
A mac on caw tec'an onxa, yowalil axca tu' chi yun co naon junjun on. Ta ayex man axcaok tu' e naoni, ok oc Dios e yetok, yet watx' ok nachaj el juntzanxa tu' e yuj.
Yowalil chi co beybalnejc'al masanil tzet chi ak'lay nachaj el juj yuj Dios.
Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, beybalnejek in beybal ti'. Ayon ti', tx'oxbilxa jun watx' beybalej e yil juj. Yuj tu' ilek c'apax is beybal eb lajan is beybal jetok, yet watx' che beybalnej c'apax axca tu'.
Ay jun tzet tx'ial elc'al albilxa ayex wuj. A yet chi walontok ayex tinani', caw chin ok'i, yujtol xiwil eb yob chi yut is beybal, xan txequel tol c'am yelapnok is camichal Cristo yin curus yul sat eb.
Palta a eb tu', yowalil ok c'aycan el eb yin junelnej. Asan tzet chi yochej oc mimanil eb, asan yin tu' ayoc nabal eb, axca tol is diosal eb yayji oc juntzan tu'. Ay juntzan tzet chi el yunen eb, caw q'uixwiltak. Asan yin juntzan tu' chi luesnej ba eb. Asan juntzan yet yulyibank'inal ti' chi na eb.
Palta ayon ti', a bay satcan aytok co nabal, yujtol a tu' ay co conobal. Lanan jechbanen c'apax jay co Colomal bay satcan tu', a ton Cham Jajawil Jesucristo.
A' ok q'uexon co yaynakil mimanil ti', yet watx' lajanxa ok yun axca yet, yujtol a is mimanil tu', caw wal watx' sic'libil. Caytu' ok on yut yetok is yipalil, tol ok can masanil tzetak yetal yalan yuj.
Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab camc'ulnebil wuj, caw chi wochej chex toj wila', yujtol in tzalojc'ulal e yayji ocok. E yuj xan ay in paktzil ok in cha'. Yuj tu', ex camc'ulnebil wuj, caw tec'an che yut e ba e yaon oc e c'ul yin Cham Jajawil.
A tinani', chin tewitok bay Evodia yetok bay Síntique, yet watx' junxanejokab chi yut eb nabal, yujtol nuej ba eb yul k'ab Cham Jajawil.
Ach wuẍtak, jet mulnajwomal, chin k'an ayach, tol chach colwaj a watx'nen el is k'anej eb janab bay tu', yujtol a cawan eb janab tu', caw max tec'baj ba eb mulnaj wetok, yet max ec' walon el k'anejal yet colbanilej. Yetok c'apaxok, max mulnaj nak Clemente wetok, c'al juntzanxa eb. A eb tu', tz'ibbilxatok bi eb yul tx'an libro bay tz'ibxa yayji co bi ayon ayxa co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal ti'.
Tzalojokonekc'al yin Cham Jajawil. Chi wal junelxa, tol caw chon tzaloji.
Yowalil caw watx' chi jut co nabal yil masanil anima, yujtol janic'xanej ok jay Cham Jajawil.
Manchak on oc il yuj junok tzet yetal. Jalek masanil tzet chi co na' bay Dios yet chon txajli. A yet chi co k'anon tzet yetal bay Cham, yowalil chi jal c'apax yuj diosalil bay.
Ta axca tu' chi jut co ba, ok yak' Dios is junc'ulal ayon. A is junc'ulal tu' c'am chi nachaj el juj, yujtol c'amxa chi alchaj elok jantak. A is junc'ulal tu', chi taynen janimail c'al co nabal, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok Cristo Jesús.
Axa tinani' ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, jaek oc co nabal yin masanil tzet yel, yin juntzan moj tol ay yelapnok yul co sat, yin masanil tzet tojol, masanil tzet c'am is tacnakil, c'al yin masanil tzet watx', yetok tzet miman yelapnok, yetok c'apax masanil tzet watx' yul sat Dios, yetok juntzan moj yal-lay watx' k'anej yin. A yin juntzan tu' jaokab oc co nabal.
Beybalnejek juntzan cuybanilej yetok juntzanxa tzet e yabnakcan ayin. Masanilc'al tzet max e yabcan oc ayin, c'al tzet max e yil c'apax win, a' che beybalnej. Ta axca tu' chi el e yuneni, ok oc Dios e yetok, Cham chi ak'on co junc'ulal.
A tinani' caw chin tzaloj yin Cham Jajawil, yujtol max quin e natek junelxa, yet max e yaontek e colwal ayin. Wojtak tol toc'alta' naan in e yuj; palta c'am wal bay che yatek e colwal ayin, yujtol maj je' e yaontek.
Toc'al chi waltok juntzan ti' ayex; man yujok majilal xan chi wala', yujtol mayal in cuy in ba wak'on tzaloj in c'ul yin tzet ayin.
Chic'al el wak'len porobal masanil. Ay bay c'am jabok tzet ay ayin; ay bay xin, caw chi yak' pax sobra. Yuj tu', caxc'al nojnak in c'ul, chi yak' sobra tzet ayin, caxc'al chi wak' wajil, c'am jabok tzet chin lo', palta k'aynak inxa, chi techaj wuj.
Tzanc'al tzet yetal chi je' wuj, yujtol chi yak' Cristo yipalil ayin.
Palta ayex ti', watx' tzet max el e yuneni, yujtol max e yatek e colwal ayin, yet ayin oc yin yailal ti'.
Ex aj Filipos, e yojtakxa, tol a yet max in chaon el yich walon el k'anejal yet colbanilej, yet max in tit bay Macedonia, asan ex colwajnak ex ayin. Asan ex anejtek in gasto bay tu'.
Ac'ala' yet max in ec' bay Tesalónica, e yanaktok junel cayel e colwal ayin yuj in gasto bay tu'.
Manak e colwal tu' chin saya', ma chi wochej, xan chi waltok juntzan ti' ayex, palta tol chi wochej chi mimanbi is pak tzet che yak' tu' yul sat Dios.
Ayin ti', xiwil tzet max el in chaoni, toltax chi yak'xac'al sobra ayin tinani'. A jun e colwal max ul yak' Epafrodito ti', k'okbilc'al chi colwaj ayin. Axca wal junok tzet chi ak'lay bay Dios, tol caw suk'uk'i yoc jab, ma axca junok xajanbal caw wal watx', axca tu' jun e colwal ti', yujtol caw wal chi tzaloj Dios yetok.
Yuj tu', ok yak' co Diosal masanilc'al tzet ay chi oc e yuj, atac'ala' is miman beyomal chi yak' ayon yuj Cristo Jesús.
Mimanokab yelapnok co Diosal yin tojbalk'inal, a ton Cham co Mam. Yun okabi.
Chi watok cawil e c'ul e masanil ex yet exxa Dios yuj Jesucristo. Ti chi ya c'apaxtok eb juẍtak ayic' wetok ti' cawil e c'ul.
Yetok c'apax eb yet-xa Dios cayti', mawal eb creyente chi mulnaj bay cham yajaw Roma ti', ti chi ya c'apaxtok eb cawil e c'ul.
Ayokab ec' watx'c'ulal Cham Jajawil Jesucristo e yetok e masanil bay tu'.
A jun libro ti' chi alontek juntzan tzet ak'bil bay Jesucristo yuj Dios, yuj yak'on jojtaknej el mac on yak'omal on serbil. A juntzan chi yaltek ti', yowalil toxa ok yunej. Max chektek Jesucristo jun is yángel ayin Juan in ti', is yak'omal in serbil Cham, yuj ul yak'on wojtaknej el juntzan ti'.
A juntzan ok wal ti', a ton tzet max wila' yetokc'al is k'anej Dios max yak' Jesucristo testigoal ba yin.
A mac chi awten aj tzet chi yal Dios yin jun libro ti', c'al eb chi abeni, caw wal watx' yet eb ta chi yikej eb tzet chi yala', yujtol toxa ok yun tzet chi yal tx'an ti'.
Ayin Juan in ti', ayin ton chin tz'iblitok ayex ex creyente bay ukeb iglesia bay yul yet Asia. Yak'okabc'al Dios is watx'c'ulal ayex, c'al is junc'ulal. Ayic' Dios tinani', ayc'alta' ec' Cham cax t'inan ok jayok. Yak'okab eb ukwan espíritu ayic' satak is trono is watx'c'ulal ayex.
Yak'okabc'al Jesucristo, Cham acaw testigo is watx'c'ulal c'al is junc'ulal ayex. A Cham babel ictzonebil aj xol eb camnak, Yajaw yayji yiban eb rey bay yulyibank'inal ti'. Caw wal ay is camc'ulal Cham jin. Max yiel Cham co yobtakil yetok is chiq'uil.
A Cham max on aon oc yin reyal. Max yak' Cham jopiso junjun on yin sacerdoteal bay Dios, Cham is Mam. Caw mimanbilokab Cham, ayokab is yikbej Cham yin tojbalk'inal. Yunokabi.
Ilabi, toxa ok jay Cristo xol asun. Ok yil masanil anima jayi, toltax eb max tekon cam Cham, ok yil eb jay Cham. A yet ok yilon anima bay junjun conob bay yulyibank'inal ti', ok ok' eb. Wal yel, caytu' ok ujok. Yunokabi.
Chi yal Dios: Ayin ton babel in satak masanil, cax lajub in c'apaxok. Axca yayji letra A, yetok Zeta, cayin tu', ẍi Dios Cham Jajawil, Cham chi je' yuj masanil. Ayic' Cham tinani', ayc'alta' ec' Cham, cax t'inan ok jayok.
Ayin Juan in ti', wuẍtak in ba e yetok. Jetbeyom co ba jaben yail, cax jetbeyom c'apax co ba yul k'ab Dios. Jun lajan chi jut co chaon co tec'anil chi yak' Jesucristo. A yet junel, preso wayji bay jun lugar chi yik Patmos, aycan nan xol aej, yujc'al walon el yabixal Dios, c'al yuj wak'on in ba testigoal yin Jesucristo.
Axa yet c'ual Cham Jajawil, ay tzet max yak' Cham Espíritu wila'. Axa max wabeni, ay jun aw caw ip max oc wintak max wabej, axca yoc nuk' junok trompeta.
Max yalon ayin axca ti': A tzet chel ti', tz'ibejcan yin junok un, cax chaontok bay eb creyente bay ukeb iglesia: bay eb aj Efeso, bay eb aj Esmirna, bay eb aj Pérgamo, bay eb aj Tiatira, bay eb aj Sardis, bay eb aj Filadelfia, c'al bay eb aj Laodicea, ẍi ayin.
Lajwic'al tu', max in meltzojtok acan wintak wiloni mactxel jun chi alon ayin tu'. Axa max wiloni, ay ukeb batxlub candil tol naba oro.
A nan xol juntzan batxlubal tu', ay jun mac lajan wal yili axca anima. Ayoc jun jokan pichilej yuj, chita ayol xol yakan. Ayoc jun miman sat cincho oro yin txam is c'ul.
A is xil, caw wal sak axca sak lana, ma axca sakil sakbat. A is bak' sat, lajan yili axca xak k'ak'.
A yakan, caw wal chi tzekeki axca ch'en bronce mayal niklay el tz'ilal, cax chi tz'a yul horno, toxanej chi tzekeki yili. A yul is nuk', toxanej chi nilili bili axca bil bey mimek aej.
Ibil aj ukeb waycan yuj yul is watx' k'ab. Ayiltek jun espada cab ye caw wal el yul is ti'. Chi jopopi sat axca jopopial yakan c'u yet caw ow yakan.
Axa yet max wilon yin tu', max in ay telnaj bay yakantak, axca junok camnak; palta max yatok k'ab wiban, max yalon ayin axca ti': Manchak ach xiwi. Ayin ton babel in satak masanil, cax lajub in c'apaxok.
Iquis in ec'ok. Caxc'al max in camlej, palta iquis in yin tojbalk'inal tinani'. Ayin ti', yajawil in camich, yajaw in c'apax jun lugar bay wajan ec' pixan eb camnak.
Tz'ibejcan juntzan tzet mayal el ti', juntzan ayic' yet jun tiempoal ti', c'al juntzan tolto ok ujok.
Ok wal ayach tzet chi yal elapnok ukeb waycan max el yul in watx' k'ab, c'al ukeb batxlub candil tol naba oro max ela'. A ukeb waycan tu', yenel eb ukwan in chekbej bay ukeb iglesia. A pax ukeb batxlub candil tu xin, yenel ukeb iglesia tu'.
Max wilon yaytek jun ángel bay satcan, tol xiwil is yipalil, cax max ayol sat tx'otx'. Boc'an oc asun yin axca tol is pichil yayji. Ayaj jun mak'bal nabich yin is jolom. Caw wal chi tzekeki sat axca chaw yakan c'u. Axa yakan, axca xak k'ak'ej chi aj tobobok.
Ay jun tx'an yaliẍ un jakan, ibil aj yuj yul is k'ab. Max wabaj ay is yakan bay is watx' yiban a' mar. Axa is q'uexan max wabaj ay sat tx'otx'.
Max lajwi tu', max awji. Caw yip yawji axca no coj yet chi el yaw no'. A yet max lajwi yawji tu', ukel max bil c'u k'anjabi.
Lajwi k'anjab yin ukel tu xin, cax ijan max in tz'ibej tzet max wab tu', palta ay jun nuk'ej max k'anjab bay satcan ayin axca ti': Toc'al cha c'ubaj yul a c'ul tzet max yal ukeb nilili bil c'u tu', cax manchak a tz'ibej, ẍi ayin.
Axa q'uetxban aj jun ángel lecan oc yiban a' mar tu' c'al sat tx'otx' tu' is watx' k'ab satcan.
A yet max k'anjabi, max locontek bi Cham iquis yin tojbalk'inal, Cham watx'nenej satcan, sat tx'otx', c'al a' mar, c'al masanil tzet ay bay junjun, max yaloni:
