Caxc'al israel on, caxc'al mayon israelok, lajan on yul sat Dios co masanil. Yujtol a Cham Jajawil, Yajaw yayji jiban co masanil. Tzanc'al mac on txel chi jal co ba bay, xiwil is watx'c'ulal chi yak' ayon.
Axcata' chi yal yul tx'an Un: Masanil mac chi yal ba bay Cham Jajawil xin, ok colchaj el eb, ẍi.
Palta a eb manchak yaoc c'ul yin Cham Jajawil, ¿tzet ok yut yalon ba eb bay? ¿tzet ok yut yaon oc eb c'ul yin, ta manchak yab eb yabixal? Yetok c'apaxok, ¿tzet ok yut yaben eb yabixal, ta c'am mac chi alon yabixal bay eb?
Palta, ¿tzet ok yun toj eb aloj abix, ta c'am mac chi chekontok eb? Yuj tu' xan chi yal c'apax tx'an Un tu' axca ti': Xiwil watx'il yili yet chi jayoc eb chi alon watx' abix, ẍi.
Palta man masanilok eb chi iken jun k'anejal yet colbanilej ti'. Axcata' yaloncan Isaías: Mamin, ¿mactxel max yaoc c'ul yin k'anej max al-lay can elok? ẍi.
Asan tzet chi jabej chi jaoc yin co c'ul. A jun abix tol yowalil chi al-laycan elok, a ton yabixal Cristo.
Palta, ¿tzet quex chi? A eb israel, ¿xin ta maj yab eb jun k'anejal yet colbanilej ti' che na'? C'amak, max yab eb masanil, yujtol caytu' yalaycan yul tx'an Un axca ti': Chi beytok yabixal yiban tx'otx' masanil, cax chi apni oc masantac'al bay lajub yulyibank'inal ti', ẍi.
Palta majc'alta' yaoc eb yin c'ul. ¿Tzet quex chi yin eb? ¿Xin ta maj nachaj el jun abix tu' yuj eb israel che na'? Max nachaji. Ilab a Moisés alnejcan tzet max yal Dios bay eb: Ok in tx'emtek e yowal yuj jun conob che yala' tol man conobok yayji. Ok wak' pax tit e yowal yuj jun conob c'am is nabal, ẍi Dios yul tx'an Un tu'.
Ilab c'apax Isaías, max tec'baj ba yalon tzet max yal Dios yin eb man israelok. A eb c'am chin k'anlen ec'ok, max quin ilchaj yuj eb. Yetok c'apax bay eb c'am chi yal ba ayin, max in tx'ox in ba bay eb, ẍi Dios.
A Isaías tu', max yal c'apaxcanok, tzet max yal Dios yin eb yet israelal: Masanil tiempo batxanc'altok in k'ab yin wawten jun conob c'am jabok chi yikej, yelxac'al pit, ẍi Dios.
Tzanc'al junok on chi co beyc'ulnej junokxa mactxel, maj je' jaloni, tol c'am co mul. Yujtol a yet chi co beyc'ulnen junokxa mactxel, lanan jiontek yailal jiban. Yujtol lanan co beyc'ulnen junok mactxel lajan tzet chi el junen yetok.
Jojtak, ta ayon axca tu' chi jut co ba, a Dios ok on beyc'ulnen yin bayc'al ijanilal, cax ok yak'on low jin.
Xan a ayex che beyc'ulnej eb chi unen tzet man watx'ok tu', ¿tom ok je' e colon el e ba yalan yowal c'ul Dios ok jay e yiban e naoni? Palta cay tu' che yut c'apax e ba axca eb tu'.
A Dios caw wal miman is watx'c'ulal. Caw wal ay is mimanc'ulal. Man comonok chi tit yowal. Palta tekan ayex c'am yelapnok juntzan ti' yul e sat. ¿Tom man e yojtakok, tol chi tx'ox is watx'c'ulal ayon yet watx' chi yak' na ba co c'ul?
Palta ayex ti' pit ex. C'am che na e ba jabok. Yuj tu', lanan e wajbanc'al yowal c'ul Dios e yiban. Axa yet ok jayoc jun c'ual yailal, e yetc'al ocok. A yet jun c'ual tu', ok txecloj el beyc'ulal Dios yin bayc'al ijanil.
A yet tu' junjun on ok co cha paktzil, atac'ala' tzet max el juneni.
Ok yak' Dios k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal ayon, tatol tec'an chi jut co ba junen watx'ilal, yujtol chi jochej ay jalon jet yin is watx'ilal Dios. Chi jochej tol ay jelapnok yul sat Cham. Chi jochej tol chi co cha co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.
Palta ay eb, a yowal c'ul Dios ok yak' bay, cax ok yak'on yailal eb. A ton bay eb chi yochej tol asannej oc miman yelapnok. C'am chi yikej cuybanilej caw yel. Asan yin tzet c'am watx'il ayoc is nabal eb.
Masanilc'al eb chi unen tzet man watx'ok, caw ok yab eb yail sic'libil. Caw cusc'ulal ok yun yeloc eb. Babel ok yab eb wet israelal yailal, palta ok yab c'apax yailal eb man israelok.
A masanil eb watx' max yut ba, a watx'ilal Dios ok yak' bay eb, cax miman yelapnok eb yul sat. Junc'ulalxac'al ok yun yayji ec' eb yetok. A eb wet israelal watx' max yut ba, babel ok yun juntzan ti' bay eb, cax ok yunen c'apax bay eb man israelok.
Yujtol a yul sat Dios, lajanc'al jelapnok co masanil.
Masanil eb man ojtaknenok ley Moisés, tatol c'am watx'il beybal eb, ok alaycantok eb bay camich yin junelnej; caxc'al man yujok jun ley tu', xan ok alaycantok eb. Palta masanil eb ojtaknen jun ley tu', cax max oc pax yobtakil eb, ac'al oc jun ley tu' ok ak'balnelayok, cax ok beyc'ulnelay eb.
Yujtol a eb toc'al chi aben ec' tzet chi yal jun ley tu', man watx'ok eb yul sat Dios. A eb chi iken tzet chi yala', a ton eb tu' watx' yul sat Cham.
A eb man israelok, man yojtakok eb is ley Moisés, palta ay bay munilc'al chi beybalnej eb axca wal yalon jun ley tu'. Caxc'al man yojtakok eb jun ley tu', munilc'al ayoc yin is nabal eb.
A is beybal eb chi tx'oxon elok, tol ayoc jun ley tu' yin is nabal eb. A yikbomal is nabal eb chi tenchaneni. Axca tu' chi yut tx'oxon el ba eb, tol ayoc jun ley tu' yin is nabal eb. Munilc'al chi ak'lay yojtaknej el eb yuj yikbomal is nabal, ta watx' tzet chi el yunen eb, ma yob.
A yet ok jay jun c'ual, ok on beyc'ulnej Dios co masanil yuj tzetak ewanc'uan yayji juj, a Jesucristo ok on beyc'ulnenok axca yalon jun k'anejal yet colbanilej chi wal ti'.
Palta ayex che maynej e ba yujtol israel ex, cax asan ley Moisés che yaoc yipok e c'ul, caw wal che yi' aj can e ba yujtol conob ex Dios.
E yojtakxa, tzet chi yochej Dios. E yojtak c'apaxok baytet ay watx' tzet chi el juneni, yujtol cuywinak ex yin ley Moisés.
Ay eb man ojtakbilok Dios yuj, axca tol c'am chi je' yilwi eb. Cax ay exxa chi je' e tx'oxon Dios bay eb e naoni. Yetok bay eb axca tol k'ekk'inalto ay yanimail, chi je' e yak'on sakk'inal bay eb e naoni.
A e naoni tol chi je' e cuyon eb c'am tzet yojtak, cax chi je' e yak'on nachaj el yuj eb c'am chi nachaj el yuj, e naoni. Yuj ley Moisés, xan caw chi nachaj el juntzan cuybej tu' e yuj. E yojtakxa baytet ay cuybanilej yel.
Caw cuywajwom ex bay juntzanok mactxel, palta ¿tzet xan c'am che cuy pax wal e ba? Che yala' tol c'am chi je' jelk'ani, palta elk'om ex paxok.
Che yala' tol c'am chi je' co beybalnen ajmulal, palta che beybalnej pax ajmulal. Caw wal che yajil juntzan tzet chi al-lay oc diosal, palta elk'om ex pax bay templo.
Yujtol e yojtak ley Moisés, xan caw che maynej e ba. Palta c'am che yikej pax tzet chi yal jun ley tu'. Yuj tu' caw wal chi buchlay el Dios e yuj.
A yul tx'an Un chi yalcan axca ti': Yuj e beybal xan chi buchwaj eb man israelok yin Dios, ẍi tx'an.
Yel toni, ay yopiso jun yechel trato chi yik circuncisión ta che yikej masanil tzet chi yal ley Moisés. Palta ta c'am che yikej jun ley tu', axca wal tol c'amoc circuncisión tu' e yin yul sat Dios.
A pax eb c'amoc yechel yin xin, ta caw chi yikej eb tzet chi yal jun ley tu', axca wal tol ocnak jun yechel eb tu' yin yul sat Dios.
Ay ton eb axca tu'. C'am jun yechelej tu' ocnak yin, palta caw chi yikej eb jun ley tu'. A eb ok ex beyc'ulnenok. Caxc'al ocnak e yechel, caxc'al ay jun ley tu' tz'ibbilcan ayex, palta tutun c'am che yikej.
Manak eb chi yik judío yujc'al yinatil, manak eb tu' yel wali judío yul sat Dios. Manak eb ayoc jun circuncisión tu' yin, manak eb tu' yel wali ayoc yechel yul sat Dios.
Palta a eb caw yel ayoc nabal yin Dios, a ton eb tu' caw wal yel judío yul sat. Yujtol a jun acaw circuncisión yul sat Dios, a ton jun ayoc yin co nabal. Man leyok tz'ibbilcan chi aloni, xan chi oc jin, palta a Cham Espíritu chi ak'on ayon. Yuj tu', man animaok chon alon watx'il, palta a Dios chon alon watx'il.
Palta ¿xin ta man watx'ok yet eb wet israelal che na' tinani'? Yetok c'apax jun circuncisión tu', ¿xin ta c'am yopiso che na'?
C'amak. Ok waltek ayex, tzet yuj xan miman yelapnok. A ayon israel on ti' yak'nakcan Dios is k'anej.
Ay ton eb man yanakok oc c'ul yin, palta ¿tom yuj tu' man ok yun tzet yalnakcan Dios?
C'amak, caw wal ok yunej. Caxc'al c'am chi yun tzet chi yal junjun anima, palta chic'al yun Dios tzet chi yala'. A tx'an Un chi alon axca ti': A xan watx' ach yin in ak'on cuenta. C'am chi je' yal-lay yob en yet chach beyc'ulnelayi, ẍi tx'an.
Ayon ti', man tojolok on, xan a co c'am tojolal tu', chi ak'on txecloj elok, tol asan Dios tojol. Palta ¿tzet quex chi? ¿Tom man tojolok Dios, xan ok yak' yailal ayon yuj co c'am tojolal tu'? (Ay anima caytu' naon axca tu'.)
¡Palta caw wal man axcaok tu'! K'inalok ta man tojolok Dios tinani', maj mi je' con beyc'ulnen Cham ayon aj yulyibank'inal on ti'.
Ay eb chi naon axca ti': A yet chi wak'on lek'tial, lanan in tx'oxon elok, tol asan Dios yel chi yala'. Tatol chi ilay can Dios yuj lek'tial chi wak' tu xin, ¿tzet xan a yet chin beyc'ulnelayi, chin al-lay yobtakwomal? ẍi eb.
Ay eb chi tz'ak alon win, tolab chi wal axca ti': Watx' chi jun yobtakil, yet watx' chi aj can watx'ilal, quin chi ab yal eb. A eb chi alon juntzan tu', caw moj ok tokcan eb bay yailal.
¿Tzet quex chi xin? ¿tom yel watx' on ayon israel on ti' yintak eb man israelok? C'amak, lajan onc'al el yetok eb. Yujtol toxa max wala', tol co masanil, caxc'al israel on, caxc'al c'amak, yobtakwom on.
A tx'an Un chi alon axca ti': C'am junok mactxel watx', tamwal junok.
C'am junok mactxel chi nachaj el yuj. C'am junok mactxel chi naon Dios.
Masanil eb, max bekcan watx' beybalej, jun lajan max yun yetnentok ba eb. Tok aytowal mactxel chi unen watx' beybalej, tutun c'am mactxel, tamwal junok.
Yuj tzet chi yal eb tu', xan chi toj anima bay cambal. Toc'al chi yet k'anenej eb yet animail. A is k'anej eb, axca wal venenoal no txutx labaj.
Asan catab k'anej yin sawenal chi yal eb.
Ayman chi toj mak' cam eb junok yet animail.
Tzanc'al bay chi ec' eb, chi etax el masanil yuj eb. Chi occan cusc'ulal yuj eb.
Man yojtakok eb beybalej yet junc'ulal.
C'am jabok yelapnok Dios yul sat eb, ẍi yul tx'an Un tu'.
Jojtak, tol a masanil tzet tz'ibbilcan yul ley, a' chi alon bay eb ayoc yalan ley tu', yet watx' c'am junok mactxel ok je' colon ba; chi nachaj el juj co masanil tol ay co yobtakil satak Dios.
C'am junok mac watx' yul sat Cham asan yuj chi yikej tzet chi yal jun ley tu'. Yujtol a yopiso ley tu', tol chi tx'ox ayon tol yobtakwom on co masanil.
A tinani', mayal txecloj elok, tzetbil chi yun joc watx'il yul sat Dios. Man yujok jiken ley Moisés, xan chon oc watx'il yul sat Cham, palta a yul tx'an Un bay tz'ibbilcan ley tu', a tu' chi yala', tzet chi yun joc watx'il. Yalnak c'apaxcan eb chekbej Dios payxa yin jun ti'.
Asan yuj chi jaoc co c'ul yin Jesucristo, xan watx' on yul sat Dios, yujtol tzanc'al mac chi yaoc Cham yin c'ul, chi oc eb watx'il yul sat. Lajan onc'al co masanil ayon anima on ti' yul sat Dios.
Yujtol max oc co yobtakil co masanil bay Cham, xan c'am jalon jet yin is watx'ilal.
Palta asan yuj watx'c'ulal Cham, xan watx' onxa yul sat tinani', yujtol colchajnak onxa yuj Cristo Jesús.
A Cristo ocnak xajanbalil yuj Dios. Elnak is chiq'uil, yuj yion el co yobtakil, ta chi jaoc co c'ul yin is camichal Cham. Caytu' chi yun txecloji, tol caw wal tojol Dios yin yak'on mimanc'ulal yin eb ocnak yobtakil bay yet payxa.
Chi txecloj c'apaxok, tol ac'ala' tojol Cham tinani', yin yaloni, tol watx' on yul sat, mac on chi jaoc co c'ul yin Jesús.
A tinani', ¿xin ta chi je' co maynen co ba che na'? Tutun wal c'am chi je', yujtol man yujok chi jikej ley Moisés xan chon colchaji, palta asan wal yuj chi jaoc co c'ul yin Jesús, xan chon colchaji. Yuj tu xin, maj je' co maynen co ba.
Yuj tu', jojtak tol asan yuj chi jaoc co c'ul yin Cham, xan watx' on yul sat Dios, man yujok jiken tzet chi yal jun ley tu'.
A Dios, tokwal co Diosal ayon israel on ti' co tx'oklil; is Diosal c'apax eb man israelok. Wal yel co Diosal co masanil.
Yujtol junnej Dios ay. Tzanc'al mactxel, caxc'al israel, caxc'al c'amak, tatol chi jaoc co c'ul yin Jesús, watx' on yul sat Dios.
Yel toni, asan yuj chi jaoc yin co c'ul, xan chon colchaji, palta ¿tom yuj tu' chi je' jaloni tol c'amxa yopiso ley Moisés tu'? C'amak, maj je' jalon axca tu'. A ti' jet, tol chi co tx'oxo' tol ay yopiso jun ley tu'.
A cham jichmam Abraham, ¿tzet max yun yeloc cham yul sat Dios che na'?
Watx' cham yul sat Dios, palta man yujok tzet watx' max el yunen yul yet, xan watx' cham yul sat Dios. K'inalok ta yuj tu', tekan chi je' maynen ba cham. Palta tinani' maj je' maynen ba satak Dios.
Yujtol chi yal yul tx'an Un Tz'ibbilcan axca ti': Axa yaon oc Abraham yin c'ul tzet max yal Dios bay, xan watx' max yun cancan yul sat Cham, ẍi yul tx'an.
A tinani', k'inalok ta chon mulnaj bay junok anima, cax chi co chaon co tojol, a co tojol tu', man sabalok, palta tol jecxa nak aj mulnajil tu'.
Palta a Dios, caxc'al c'am tzet chi jun bay, tatol chi jaoc yin co c'ul, watx' on yul sat. Caytu' chi yun junjun yobtakwom yul sat Dios, tatol chi ya wal oc eb yin c'ul.
A cham rey David, max yalcan elok, tol watx' yet eb mac bay chi al-lay yuj Dios tol watx' eb yul sat. Man yujok tzet watx' chi el yunen eb, xan chi yal Dios axca tu'.
Max yalcan cham David tu' axca ti': Tzalojc'ulal yet mactxel max jolayc'ay is yec'nakilal cax max tancan el is mul yiban.
Tzalojc'ulal yet mactxel c'am chi oc is yobtakil mulok yuj Cham Jajawil, ẍican cham David tu'.
A jun tzalojc'ulal chi yal ti', man asannejok eb ayoc circuncisión yin ay yet. A jun tzalojc'ulal tu' yet c'apax eb man ocnakok jun yechelej tu' yin. Mayal wal ayex, tol a Abraham max yaoc Dios yin c'ul. Asan yuj tu' xan yalnak Dios tol watx' yul sat.
Palta naektek, ¿bak'ini yalnak Dios axca tu'? ¿Tom ak'bilxa circuncidar Abraham tu' yet tu'? C'amak, manto ak'lay circuncidar yet tu'.
Palta c'ojanc'ulalto ocnak jun circuncisión tu' yin. A jun tu' chi tx'oxon tol watx' cham yul sat Dios yet manto ak'lay circuncidar, asan yuj max yaoc Dios yin c'ul. Yuj tu', mamej yayji cham bay jantak eb man ak'bilok circuncidar, tatol chi yaoc eb c'ul yin Dios. A ton eb tu', watx' eb yul sat Dios axca Abraham tu'.
Yetok c'apaxok mamej yayji cham bay eb ak'bil circuncidar. Chi yal elapnok, eb c'am chi yaoc jun circuncisión tu' yipok c'ul. Palta chi yaoc eb c'ul yin Dios, axca max yun Abraham tu' yet manto ak'lay circuncidar.
Yak'nakcan Dios ti' bay Abraham, yetok bay eb yinatil, tol ok yak' yulyibank'inal ti' bay eb. Man yujok max yikej cham ley Dios, xan max yak' ti' bay, palta asannej yuj max yaoc Dios yin c'ul, xan watx' cham yul sat.
K'inalok ta asan bay eb ayoc yin ley tu' ok yak' Dios yulyibank'inal ti', nabac'al mi chi jaoc co c'ul yin chi yal tu', cax mi chi tancan el tzet albil yuj tu'.
Yujtol a jun ley tu', chi awi oc yailal yiban anima. K'inalok ta c'am jun ley tu' tinani', c'am mac chi oc yobtakil bay ley tu'.
Yak'nakcan Dios ti' bay Abraham, yujtol max yaoc Dios yin c'ul. Axca ton tu' chi yun txecloj elok, tol asan yuj is watx'c'ulal Dios, xan yak'nakcan is ti'. Yuj tu', a ayon yinatil on Abraham on ti', ay c'apax jalon jet co masanil yin yetok. Man asannejok eb chi yikej jun ley tu' ay yalon yet yin, palta ay c'apax jalon jet yin co masanil ayon chi jaoc co c'ul yin Dios axca Abraham tu'. Yujtol axca tol co mam yayji Abraham tu' yul sat Dios, yujtol a yin Dios max yaoc c'ul.
Axca yaloncan Dios yul tx'an Un: Ok ach wacan oc is yichmamok xiwil nacionlak, ẍi Cham bay Abraham. A Dios chi ak'on ictzoj aj eb camnak. Asan tol chi yala' cax chi pitzc'oj juntzan tzet yetal tol c'amtac'a.
A yunnak Abraham junel, c'am junok tzet yetal max je' yak'on yip is c'ul, palta max yaoc Dios yin c'ul. A tzet yalnak Dios bay, a' max yaoc yipok c'ul. Yuj tu', max oc yichmamok xiwil nacionlak axca max yut yaloncan Dios bay, yet max yalon axca ti': Axca ton waycan tu' ok yun bisil eb enatil, ẍi bay.
A Abraham tu', janic'xanej man 100 abilok max yila'. Yojtak tol caw wal ichamxa. Yojtak c'apaxok tol caw wal ixnamxa xal Sara. Axca wal tol c'amxa bak'in ok aljok junok yuninal eb, palta ac'ala' yaon oc cham yin is c'ul tzet max yal Dios bay.
A yet max yak'on Dios ti' bay, cax man cabc'ulaltakok max yut yabeni. Caw wal tol max yaoc yin c'ul. Caw wal tec'an is nabal. Max yal watx' k'anej bay Dios,
yujtol yojtak cham sic'libil, tol chic'al je' yuj Dios yunen axca yalon bay.
Yuj wal tu' xan watx' max yun cancan Abraham tu' yul sat Cham.
Tz'ibbilcan yabixal yul tx'an Un, tol watx' cham yul sat Dios, yujtol max yaoc cham yin is c'ul. Palta man asannejok yuj cham xan max tz'ibelaycanok.
Palta tol ayon jun chon al-lay c'apaxok. Yuj tu' xan chi yal Dios tol watx' on yul sat, tatol chi jaoc co c'ul yin. A Cham ak'nej pax ictzoj aj Cham Jajawil Jesús xol eb camnak.
Max alay oc Jesús yul k'ab camich yuj co yobtakil. Lajwi tu', max ictzoj pax ajok, yuj joccan watx'il satak Dios yuj.
A tinani', toxa mayal yal Dios, tol watx' on yul sat, yujtol chi jaoc co c'ul yin. Yuj tu', junc'ulalxa ayon yetok, yujc'al Cham Jajawil Jesucristo.
Yuj Cristo xan ay jalon jet co chaon watx'c'ulalil Dios, yujtol chi jaoc co c'ul yin. Yuj tu', xiwil is watx'c'ulalil chi tx'ox ayon tinani'. Caw wal chon tzaloji, yujtol chi jaoc yipok co c'ul, tol ay jalon jet yin is watx'ilal Cham.
Man asannejok yuj tu' xan chon tzaloji, palta tzalojokonek c'apax yet chi jaben yail yuj. Yujtol jojtak, tol a juntzan yailal tu', a chi texac'al ak'on co tec'anil.
Yuj co tec'anil tu' xan chi tzaloj Dios jetok. Yuj tu', chi je' jaon oc Cham yipok co c'ul.
Maj el co q'uixwil yet chi jaon oc Cham yipok co c'ul, yujtol tz'akaki max yut yak'on Cham is camc'ulal yin janimail yet max yak'on Cham Espíritu Santo ayon.
Maj je' juj yul jet jak'on tzalojbok c'ul Dios, axa yet max ajapnok tiempoal xin, max cam Cristo juj, ayon c'am Dios yul co sat ti'.
K'inalok ay junok mac watx' is beybal tinani', tekan c'am mac chi yak' ba cam yuj. Asan ta ay junok mac caw wal watx' is nabal, ay mi junok ayman chi tec'baj ba cam yuj.
Palta tx'oxnak Dios camc'ulal ayon, yujtol a Cristo max yak' cam ba juj yet caw wal yobtakwom onto.
Axa tinani', watx' onxa yul sat, yujtol jujc'al max cam Cristo. Yuj tu' xan ok on colchaj el bay jun miman yailal tolto ok jay yuj yowal c'ul Dios.
A yet yalan, caxc'al ajc'ul on oc yin Cham palta max on oc yin watx'c'ulalil yetok, yujtol jujc'al xan max cam is C'ajol. A pax tinani', watx'xa jak'on yetok, yuj tu' xan ok on colchaj yuj yiquisal is C'ajol tu'.
Man asannejok yuj juntzan ti' chon tzaloji, palta caw chon tzaloj c'apax yin Dios yuj Cham Jajawil Jesucristo. Yujtol yuj Cham xan watx'xa jak'on yetok Dios tinani'.
Yuj ch'an jun winak a ton Adán, xan max el yich yobtakil yulyibank'inal ti'. Yuj yobtakil tu', xan elnak yich camich, xan ayoc camich jiban co masanil, yujtol max oc co mul co masanil.
A yet manto ak'lay ley Moisés, ayxac'alta' yobtakil anima chi oqui. Palta a is yobtakil eb tu', maj oc is mulok eb, yujtol c'amto ley.
Palta yecheltaxc'al yul is tiempoal Adán, masantac'al max eltek is ley Moisés, ayc'alta' oc camich jiban co masanil, caxc'al man lajanok co yobtakil axca yet Adán tu' tol maj yikej tzet max al-lay bay. A Adán tu', yenel Cham t'inan jayi.
A jun is yobtakil Adán tu', caw wal man lajanok axca co colbanil chi yak' Dios. Yuj is yobtakil jun winak tu', xan max ijbelaycan oc camich jiban co masanil, palta jun colbanilej, toc'al wal chi el yin c'ul Dios yak'oni, yelxac'al miman yelapnok, yujtol yuj ch'an jun mactxel, a ton Jesucristo, xan xiwil on chi co cha' watx'c'ulalil Dios.
A is yobtakil jun winak tu', caw wal man lajanok axca jun co colbanil chi yak' Cham ayon. Yuj wal ch'an jun is yobtakil jun winak tu', xan max jaycan yowal c'ul Dios jiban co masanil. Palta caxc'al xiwil co yobtakil max oc bay Cham, palta chi yak' Cham co colbanil yin toc'al chi el yin is c'ul, xan watx' on yul sat tinani'.
Asan yuj is yobtakil ch'an jun winak, xan max ijaycan camich jiban co masanil. Palta yuj ch'an junokxa mactxel, a ton Jesucristo, xan ok co cha' k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, c'al joc yajawilal yetok, yujtol caw miman is watx'c'ulal Dios tx'oxnak ayon, xan max yala' tol watx' on yul sat.
Yuj is yobtakil Adán, xan ijancan oc yailal jiban co masanil, palta ay wal jun tzet caw wal watx' yunnak Jesucristo. Yuj wal jun tu', xan chi yal Dios, tol watx' on yul sat, cax chi yak'on co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.
Yuj wal tenomtakil jun winak maj iken tu', xan ocnak on can yin yobtakwomal co masanil. Palta ay pax jun mac max ikeni. Yuj yikemal jun tu', xan xiwil on chon oc watx'il yul sat Dios.
Jaynak ley Moisés, yet chi txecloj el yobtakil sic'libil. Caxc'al max texac'al aj can yobtakil tu', palta yelxac'al max aj can watx'c'ulalil Dios yintak jun tu'.
Ayon oc co masanil yul k'ab yobtakil. Yuj yipalil yobtakil, xan chon cami, palta a is watx'c'ulalil Dios, ay c'apax is yipalil. Yuj xan, watx' on yul sat tinani'. Axca tu' max yut yak'on co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal yin Cham Jajawil Jesucristo.
¿Tzet con chi che na' xin? ¿Tom mi watx', ta ac'ala' junen yobtakil, yet watx' chi yak'c'al Dios mimanc'ulal jin, cax chi texac'al txecloj el is watx'c'ulalil axca tu'?
C'amak, caw wal maj je'. A yul sat Dios, camnak onxa, c'amxa yalon yet yobtakil jin. Yuj tu', ¿tom ac'ala' chi je' co beybalnen yobtakil?
E yojtakxa, tol a yet max on ak'lay bautizar junjun on, max txecloj elok, tol junxanej max juncan el yetok Cristo Jesús. A tu' max txecloj elok, tol a yet max cam Cham, max on cam c'apax yetok.
A yuj co bautismo tu' max txecloj elok, tol max on cami, cax junxanej max yun co mukay yetok Cristo. Yuj tu' xan axca c'apax max yun yictzoj aj Cristo xol eb camnak yuj is miman mayk'ak'al co Mam Dios, axca c'apax tu' max yun jictzoj aj c'apaxok. Chi yal elapnok, a wal junok ac' beybalej chi co beybalnej tinani'.
Junnej max yun co cam yetok Cristo yet max cami. Yuj tu' xan axca max yun yictzoji, axca tu' ok yun jictzoj c'apaxok, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok.
Jojtak, tol a tzet jayji yet yalan, a yul sat Dios, max curusnelay yetok Cristo yet watx' chi ilaycan el yikbej co yob nabal. Axca tu' max juncan elok, yet watx' manchakxa jak' serbil yobtakil tinani'.
Yujtol a mac camnakxa, c'amxa oc yul k'ab yobtakil.
Ayon ti', camnak onxa yetok Cristo yul sat Dios. Yuj tu', chi jaoc yin co c'ul, tol ok on iquisbok yetok yin junelnej.
Yujtol jojtak, tol yecheltaxc'al max ictzonelay aj Cristo xol eb camnak, c'amxa bak'in ok cam junelxa, yujtol c'amxa yalon yet camich yin.
Yujtol a yet max cami, max cam yuj tojolok yobtakilal yin junelnej. Axa tinani', iquis yin junelnej, yuj yak'on serbil Dios.
Cayokab on tu', nachajokab el juj, tol camnak onxa, c'amxa yalon yet yobtakil jin. Co naek c'apaxok, tol iquis on, yuj jak'on serbil Dios, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok Cristo Jesús.
Yuj tu', manchakxa co cha' yajawbok yobtakil yin co mimanil tol cambejal yayji. Caw manchakxa jikejek junen juntzan yobtakil chi jochej ocok.
Manchakxa co bek co mimanil yul k'ab tzet man watx'ok, cax chi junen yobtakil. Yowalil asan yul k'ab Dios chi jaoc co ba, yujtol camnak onxa yul sat, cax max on ictzonelay pax ajok. Yuj tu', jak'ek co mimanil bay Dios, yet watx' asan tzet watx' chi el junen yetok.
A yobtakil c'amxaokab yalon yet jin, yujtol c'am onxa oc yalan yikbej ley Moisés. A yalan yikbej watx'c'ulalil Dios ayon oc tinani'.
A tinani', ayon oc yalan watx'c'ulalil Dios, manxanak yalan ley Moisés ayon ocok. Palta, ¿tzet ẍi e c'ul? ¿Tom yuj tu', xan chi je' tol ac'ala' junen yobtakil? C'amak, caw wal c'amxa chi je'.
Jojtak, tatol ay junok mactxel chi yak' ba yak'omalok serbil junokxa mactxel, asan jun tu' ay yalon yet yin yin junelnej. Yowalil chi yikej tzet chi yal is patrón tu'. Cayon ton tu xin. Tatol chi jak' serbil yobtakil, chi jikej tzet chi yochej, tutun tol asannej ayon yet. Axa co cam yuj tu' yin junelnej. Palta tatol a Dios chi jak' serbil, chi jikej tzet chi yochej; tatol axca tu', asannej ayon yet. Axa watx'ji oc co nabal yuj tu'.
Palta chi wal yuj diosalil bay Dios e yuj. Yujtol caxc'al max e yak' serbil yobtakil yet yalan, palta axa tinani', lanan e yiken yin masanil e c'ul juntzan cuybanilej bay max ex alaycan ocok.
Max ex colchaj el yul k'ab yobtakil, manxa yak'omalok serbil e yayji tinani', palta tol yak'omalxa serbil watx'ilal e yayji.
A juntzan chi waltok ayex ti', axca tol comon abixc'al chi wut walontok, yujtol c'am wal chi nachaj el juntzan cuybanilej ti' e yuj. A yet yalan, max jak' co mimanil yak'omalok serbil tzet man watx'ok, c'al jaj can yin yobtakil. Axa tinani', yowalil axcaokab tu' chi jut jak'on co mimanil ti' yak'omalok serbil watx'il, yet watx' asan yin Dios chi jaoc co nabal.
A yet max jak' serbil tzet man watx'ok yet yalan, c'am yalon yet watx'il jin yet tu'.
Palta, ¿ay mi jabok tzet max ji' yin juntzan max jun tu'? Caw chon q'uixwi yuj juntzan tu' tinani'. Yujc'al juntzan tu', xan chi tojcan eb anima bay camich yin junelnej.
Axa tinani', colbil onxa el yul k'ab juntzan tzet man watx'ok tu'. C'amxa yalon yet jin. Max on oc yak'omalok serbil Dios. Yuj tu' caw wal ay tzet chi ji' tinani', yujtol a' chi ak'on jaoc co nabal yin. Cax ok co chaon pax co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.
Tatol a yobtakil chi junej, ok co cha is tojol, a ton camich yin junelnej. Palta a jun is sabal Dios chi yak' ayon, a ton co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok Cristo Jesús, Cham Jajawil.
Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, e yojtakxa ley Moisés, tol a jun ley tu', ay yalon yet yin junok mactxel yet iquisto ec'ok.
K'inalok junok ix ay yichamil. A yet iquis ec' yichamil tu', mojan ix yetok yuj jun ley tu'. Tatol chi cam yichamil ix tu', cax bekanxa ix yuj jun ley tu'.
K'inalok ta iquisto yichamil ix tu', cax chi toj ix bay junokxa winak, chi toj ix yin ajmul ixal axca tu'. Palta tatol chi cam yichamil ix xin, chi bekchaj el ix yalan jun ley tu'. Caxc'al chi yi ix junokxa winak, man ajmulok chi yun ix axca tu'.
Ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, a tinani', junxanej jayji yetok is mimanil Cristo yet max cami. Yuj tu', a yul sat Dios, camnak onxa el bay ley Moisés. Yuj tu', ay junxa mac axca tol jajawil yayji, a ton Cham max ictzoj aj xol eb camnak. Axca ton tu' jak'on yetok, yet watx' ay jopiso yul sat Dios.
A yet yalan, asan co yob ochwanilal chi co beybalnej. A ley Moisés max pitzc'onej aj juntzan tzet man watx'ok chi yochej oc co mimanil ti'. A juntzan tu' chon iontok bay camich yin junelnej.
A yet yalan tu', a jun ley tu' ay yalon yet jin. Axa tinani xin, camnak onxa el bay yul sat Dios. Yuj tu', bekan on tinani', yet watx' asan Dios chi jak' serbil. Yuj tu', lanan co beybalnen jun ac' beybalej max yak' Cham Espíritu ayon. Axa jun icham ley tz'ibbilcan tu', c'amxa yalon yet jin tinani'.
Palta, ¿tzet quex chi? A ley Moisés tu', ¿tom yob che na'? C'amak toni. Yuj jun ley tu' xan max wojtaknej elok, tol yob tzet max el wuneni. A yet max wochen oc junok tzet yetal, max wojtaknej elok, tol man watx'ok tzet chi el wuneni, yujtol chi yal ley axca ti': Manchak e yochej oc junok tzet yetal, ẍi. K'inalok ta c'am tzet chi yala', man wojtakok ta yob jun tu'.
Palta yuj juntzan chekbanilej tu', xan max texac'al pitzc'oj aj tzet man watx'ok win. Yuj tu', xiwil tzet man watx'ok max wochej ocok. K'inalok ta c'am jun ley tu', c'am mi yelapnok yobtakil.
A yet manto wojtakok jun ley tu', iquis in yul sat Dios in naoni. Axa yet max wojtaknej el jun ley tu', max nachaj el wuj, tol c'am jabok in watx'il. Catatu bian, max wojtaknen elok, tol camnak in yul sat Dios yuj.
A ley tu', ay yopiso yak'on k'inalej, palta a' max iontek camich wiban.
Yuj jun ley tu', xan max texac'al pitzc'oj aj yobtakil win. Caw wal max in etax yuj juntzan tu'. A yobtakil tu' max iontek camich wiban yuj jun ley tu'.
A jun ley tu', c'am jabok is paltail. Cac'apax tu' masanil is chekbanil tu', caw wal tojol, caw watx'.
Palta, ¿tzet quex chi? ¿Tom a jun tzet watx' tu' max iontek camich wiban? C'amak, manak. A yobtakil ayoc win, a' max iontek wiban. Xan tix wal max yun txecloj el tu', tol c'am ton watx'il juntzan tu'. A juntzan tu' max iontek camich wiban yuj jun ley watx' tu'. Axca ton tu' max yut tx'oxon el jun ley tu', tol a tzet man watx'ok tu', caw wal yob.
Jojtak tol a Cham Yespíritu Dios anejtek jun ley tu'. Palta ayin ti', ac'ala' ibilc'al oc jun in yob ochwanilal ti'. Axca tol txonbil in oc yak'omalok serbil yobtakil.
Yujtol a tzet chi el wuneni, man watx'ok chi wila'. Ay tzet watx' chi wochej chi wunej, palta c'am chi wun paxok. Axa juntzan tzet man watx'ok yul in sat, axa chi wunej.
Ta chi wabej tol yobtak tzet chi wun tu', caytu' chi yun nachaj el wuj tol a ley watx' toni.
Yujtol mayin wal nak acaw chi el wunen juntzan tu'. A yobtakil toc'alta' ayoc win, a' chi uneni.
Wojtak, tol c'am jabok tzet watx' win, a ton yin jun in yob nabal ti'. Yujtol a tzet yetal watx' chi wochej chi wunej, palta c'am chi je' wuj.
C'am chi wun tzet watx' axca wal chi wochej tu'. A tzet man watx'ok, c'am chi wochej tu', a chi wunc'al.
Palta ta chi wun tzet c'am chi wochej tu', chi yal elapnok, tol mayinnak lanan wuneni. A yobtakil toc'alta' ayoc win tu', a' chi uneni.
Xan tix ton wal chin on ti'. Tol a yet chi wochej chi wun junok tzet yetal watx', axa chi wiloni, a tzet man watx'ok lananxa wuneni.
A in nabal, caw wal chi tzaloj yetok ley Dios.
Palta wojtak, tol ay junxa chi yajawbi yin in mimanil ti', a ton yobtakil. A chi yak'lej owal yetok tzet chi yochej in nabal tu'. Yuj tu', axca wal tol preso wayji yuj yobtakil chi yajawbi yin in mimanil ti'.
Caw ok'bal c'ul chi wun yuj. A jun in mimanil ti' chin iontok bay camich yin junelnej. Palta, ¿mac chi je' yuj on colon el yul k'ab co mimanil ti'?
Asan Dios, yin yak'balnen Cham Jajawil Jesucristo. Yuj tu', caw wal chi wal yuj diosalil bay Dios tinani'. Ti pax yetok wal in nabal chi wak' serbil Dios, palta axa in yob ochwanilal ti', ayoc yak'omalok serbil jun chi yajawbi yin in mimanil ti', a ton yobtakil.
A tinani', junxanej jayji yetok Cristo Jesús, xan c'amxa yowal c'ul Dios jiban.
A Yespíritu Dios chi ak'on co k'inal yin junelnej, yujtol junxanej jayji yetok Cristo Jesús. Yuj yipalil Yespíritu tu', xan max on colchaj el yul k'ab yobtakil, c'al yul k'ab camich.
Yuj co yob ochwanilal ti', xan c'am chi je' jiken tzet chi yal ley Moisés. Yuj tu', c'am yopiso jun ley tu' on is coloni. Palta a Dios chon coloni, yuj yanaktek is C'ajol yuj ul yuten ba yin animail. Lajan is mimanil Cristo axca jet ayon anima on ti', yuj tu' max je' cam yuj co mul. A yet max cami, tz'akan max yi' lowbanilej yailal mulej yin is mimanil, tol lajan axca jet.
Axca tu' yutnak ba, yet watx' tojolxac'al chi jut co ba axca chi yal ley. Yujtol ayon ti', c'amxa chi co beybalnej axca chi yochej co yob ochwanilal. Lanan co beybalnen axca chi yochej Yespíritu Dios.
A eb chi beybalnen yob ochwanilal, ac'al yin chi yaoc eb is nabal. Asan yin tzet man watx'ok chi yaoc eb nabal tu'. Yuj wal tu', chi tojcan eb bay camich yin tojbalk'inal. Ayon tol lanan co beybalnen axca chi yochej Yespíritu Dios, asan yin chi jaoc co nabal. Yuj wal tu', xan ok co cha' co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, cax chon oc yin junc'ulalil yetok Dios.
Palta a eb chi beybalnen yob ochwanilal xin, toc'al chi yajc'ulnej aj ba eb yetok Cham. C'am chi yochej eb chi yikej ley Cham, tamwal chi je' yuj eb.
Yuj tu', a eb chi beybalnen yob ochwanilal, caw c'am chi je' yunen eb axca chi yochej Cham, xan c'am chi tzaloj Cham yetok eb.
Palta ayon ti', manchakxa co beybalnej co yob ochwanilal. Asannejokab tzet chi yochej Yespíritu Dios chi co beybalnej, yujtol a' ayoc jin. A eb c'am oc Yespíritu Cristo yin, man yetok Cristo eb.
Palta ayon ti', ayxa oc Cristo jin. Yuj tu', caxc'al camnak co mimanil ti' yuj yobtakil, palta iquisc'al janimail, yujtol watx' on yul sat Dios tinani'.
A Dios ak'nej ictzoj aj Jesucristo xol eb camnak. Tatol ayoc Yespíritu Cham jin, ok yictzonej pax aj Cham co mimanil cambejal yayji yuj Yespíritu ayoc jin.
Yuj wal tu', ex wuẍtak, ex wanab, ayoc jiban co beybalnen axca tzet chi yochej Yespíritu Dios. C'amxa oc jiban co beybalnen axca chi yochej co yob ochwanilal.
Ta ac'ala' co beybalnen tzet chi yochej co yob ochwanilal, ok on cam yuj yin junelnej. Palta ta yetok yipalil Yespíritu Dios chi co bekoncan junen yob ochwanilal ti', ok co cha' k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.
Tzanc'al mac chi beybalnej tzet chi tx'ox Yespíritu Dios bay, a ton eb tu' yel yuninal Dios.
A Cham Espíritu chabilxa juj, maj on yaoc Cham yak'omalok serbil yin xiwc'ulal, palta max on yaoc Cham yuninalok Dios. Yuj Cham Espíritu ti', xan chi je' yaj jaw bay Dios axca ti': Mamin, con chi bay.
Jojtak junjun on yin janimail, tol yel yuninal onxa Dios. Yetok c'apaxok, acaw Espíritu chi ak'on jojtaknej elok.
Yujtol yuninal onxa Dios, yuj tu' ok co cha' co satak ok yak'a'. Ac'al oc jet ok co cha' yetok Cristo. Tatol chi jab yail yetok Cham, junnej ok on ayjok yetok xol is watx'ilal.
Ayin ti', chin na', tol a juntzan yailal lanan jaben ti' tinani', caw wal c'am chi apni yintak watx'il Dios ok txecloj el jin yet yajtok tu'.
Masanil tzetak yetal watx'nebil yuj Cham, caw chi maka' bak'in ok on txeclonelay aj ayon yuninal on Cham ti'.
Yujtol a juntzan tzet watx'nebil yuj Cham, majxa eloc axca naon Cham yin. Man yulok yet juntzan tzet yetal tu' xan axca tu' max yunej; palta a Cham max uteni. Palta ay jun tiempoal makbil jayi.
Yujtol masanil juntzan tu', ok colchaj elok, yet watx' c'amxa tzet chi oni. Axca tu' ok yun co colchaj el ayon yuninal onxa Dios ti', axa joc yin watx'il tu'. Axca tu' ok yun colchaj c'apax el juntzan tu' jetok.
Jojtak, tol masanil juntzan tzet watx'nebil yuj Cham yettax payxa, ayoc yalan yailal. Axca junok ix ix lanan yaben yail unin, axca tu' yaben yail juntzan tzetak yetal tu' tinani'.
Man asannejok juntzan tu' lanan yaben yail. Palta cayon c'apax tu'. Ayxa oc Cham Espíritu jin, yet watx' txequel, tol ay tzet ok yak' Dios ayon. Caxc'al mi axca tu', palta lanan jaben yail tinani'. Lanan co makon bak'in ok on oc yuninalok Cham sic'libil. Cax a yet tu' ok colchajcan el co mimanil ti'.
Yettax max on colchaji, max jaon oc yipok co c'ul, tol ok co cha co colbanil sic'libil. K'inalok ta mayal co cha' jun tu' tinani', manxa yowalilok chi co mak jayi, yujtol a tzet mayal jilocok, c'amxa chi co mak jayi.
Palta ta chi jaoc yipok co c'ul tzet c'am chi jiloc yin, yowalil tec'an chi jut co ba co makon jayi.
Ac'ala' c'apax Cham Yespíritu Dios, caw wal chi oc Cham jetok bay man tz'akanok co nabal. Yujtol man jojtakok tzet chi jut txajlok co ba axca chi yochej Dios. Ay bay toc'al chon sik'son aj jay co c'ul, yujtol c'am chi nachaj juj tzet chi jut jalon co ba bay Dios. Palta axa Cham Espíritu chi txajli juj yin co k'akawil tu'.
Axa Dios chi ilon tzet ay bay janimail junjun on. Chi nachaj c'apax el yuj, tzet chi yal Yespíritu, yujtol axca wal chi yochej Dios, caytu' chi yun txajli Yespíritu tu' juj ayon yet onxa ti'.
Jojtak tol a Dios chi yak'balnej masanilc'al tzet chi jay jiban, yuj co watx'ilok, ayon ay co camc'ulal yin ti', ayon awtebil on yuj ti', yuj jelapnok axcatac'a naoni.
Yojtakxa Dios yet payxa, tol yet on. Atax yet tu' sic'nej on can elok, yet watx' lajan chi juncan el axca is C'ajol. Max con yut Dios axca tu', yet watx' a is C'ajol tu' chi oc babel winakil co xol ayon yuninal on Dios ti'.
A mac on sic'bil on el yuj, awtebil on c'apax yuj. A' c'apax chi alon juj ayon awtebil on yuj ti', tol watx' on yul sat, cax chi yak'oni tol ay jalon jet yin is watx'il.
Yuj juntzan chi wal ti', xan caw c'amxa tzet chi co na' tinani'. Caw wal ayoc Dios jetok. Yuj tu', ¿xin ta ay mac chi tzakay on yaoncan yalan?
A Dios max yacan oc is C'ajol yul k'ab camich jujc'al co masanil. Caxc'al is C'ajol, palta maj colo'. Yujtol yanaktek is C'ajol tu', xan jojtak, tol ok yak' masanil tzet watx' ayon.
A mac on sic'bil on el yuj Dios, ¿xin ta ay junok mac chi je' con yak'on queja bay? A Cham chi aloni tol watx' on bay.
Yuj tu' ¿xin ta ay junok mac ok je' yaon oc jiban? Yujtol a Cristo max cami, max ak'lay ictzoj pax ajok. Axa tinani' ayic' bay is watx' k'ab Dios, lanan tewi juj.
C'am junok tzet yetal chi tx'oxo' tol man camc'ulnebilok on yuj Cristo. Caxc'al yailal, caxc'al junok miman cusc'ulal, caxc'al ay mac chi aon oc junok tzet yetal jiban, caxc'al chi jay wajil jiban, caxc'al c'am co pichil, caxc'al mi ay junok tzet yetal ayxamay, caxc'al chon mak'lay camok, ac'ala' con camc'ulnen Cristo.
Axca yaloncan tx'an Un: Oj wali, xan chon yak' cam eb yin junjun txolan axca calnel chi ilaytok yet chi cami, caytu' chon yut eb, ẍi yul tx'an Un tu'.
Caxc'al ok jay juntzan ti' jiban, palta yelxac'al chi uj juj yuj is yipal Cham chon camc'ulneni.
Yuj tu' wojtakxa, caxc'al ay tzet yetal, ac'ala' caw camc'ulnebil on yuj Dios. Caxc'al camich, caxc'al co k'inal, caxc'al junok ángel, caxc'al junok ay yikbej, caxc'al junok tzet yetal ayic' tinani', caxc'al tzet toxa ok jayok,
caxc'al junok ayic' bay satcan, caxc'al junok ay yalan tx'otx' ti', tzanc'al junok tzet yetal watx'nebil yuj Cham, tutun c'am chi je' chi yiay co nan yetok co Mam Dios, ac'ala' caw camc'ulnebil on yuj Cham yuj Cristo Jesús, a ton Cham Jajawil.
Tutun ayoc Cristo yin in c'ul e yetok, xan a juntzan ok waltok ayex ti', caw yel, man lek'tialok. A yikbomal in nabal chi ak'on wojtaknej elok, tol yel juntzan ok waltok ayex ti', yujtol a Cham Espíritu Santo chi ak'on in na'.
Caw chi cus in c'ul. Pitz'anc'al oc eb wet israelal yin in c'ul, yujtol caw wal chi wochej chi colchaj eb.
K'inalok ta chi colchaj eb wet conob tu' yuj chin k'antek yowal c'ul Dios wiban, c'al wel yin Cristo, chin k'antek, cax chin el yin, yujc'al eb.
Yinatil israel eb wetok. A Dios max on ion oc yuninalok on. Max tx'ox is tzekekial ayon on. Ay juntzan is trato max yak' jetok on. Max yak' c'apax is ley ayon. Yalnak c'apax ayon tzet chi jut jion ay co ba bay. Ay juntzan tzet yetal max yak' Dios is ti' yak'on ayon.
A eb jichmam, a ton eb mimek yelapnok yul sat Dios yet payxa. Ocnak Cristo jet conobok on yet max oc animail. A Cristo Dios toni, Yajaw yayji yiban masanil tzetak yetal. Al-layokab watx' k'anej yin Cham yin tojbalk'inal. Yunokabi.
Caxc'al maj colchaj eb wet israelal masanil, palta maj je' jaloni, tol maj yun juntzan tzet bay max yak'can Dios ti' ayon on. Yujtol a eb wet israelal tu', man masanilok eb yel israel yul sat Dios.
A ayon yinatil on Abraham ti', man co masanilok yel yuninal on Abraham yul sat Dios. Yujtol yalnak Dios bay Abraham tu' axca ti': A yin nak Isaac, a tu' ok beyc'altoj enatil, ẍi Dios bay.
A jun ti', chi yal elapnok tol c'am junok mac tol yujc'al yichmam chi je' yoc yuninalok Dios. Ayon yinatil on Abraham ti', pitzc'ojnak on el yuj yak'oncan Dios ti' bay, asan on tu' caw yel yinatil Abraham on tu' yul sat Dios.
Tix tzet yalnak Dios bay Abraham tu' yet max yak'on is ti' bay: Ok in jay yet jun tiempoal txequel yayjicanok. A yet tu' ok jay junok yune' Sara, tol winak unin, ẍi Dios bay.
Chi wal c'apaxtok ayex yabixal Isaac jichmam on. A Rebeca ocnak yetbiok. Ay cawan yune xal junnejc'al max yun yalji. Yet Isaac tu' eb cawanil.
A yet c'amto chi alji cawan unin tu', c'amto junok tzet watx', ma junok tzet yob chi el yunen eb, max yal Dios bay Rebeca tu' axca ti': A nak babel, ok can nak yalan is chekbanil nak tzunan, ẍi bay. A jun ti' chi chalej ba yalon yetok juntzanxa tzet tz'ibbil c'apax can yul tx'an Un bay chi yal axca ti': Max in camc'ulnej Jacob, axa Esaú max in cabc'ulnejcan elok, ẍi Dios yul tx'an Un tu'. A ton juntzan k'anej ti' chi tx'oxk'abnen elok, tol ay yalon yet Dios sic'on el junok mac chi yochej. Man yujok tzet chi el juneni, xan chon yawtej oc Dios yetok.
Palta, ¿tzet con chi che na'? ¿Xin ta man tojolok chi yut Dios axca tu'? C'amak, tojol toni.
Yujtol yalnak axca ti' bay Moisés: Ok wak' in yabenc'ulal bay mac chi yal in c'ul, cax ok ok' in c'ul yin mac bay chi yal in c'ul, ẍi Dios.
Caxc'al chi jochej chon colchaji, caxc'al caw chi jak' jip, man yujok tu' chon colchaji, palta asan yuj chi ok' c'ul Dios jin.
Tz'ibbilcan ay yul tx'an Un tzet yalnak Dios bay faraón, cham yajaw bay Egipto. Max yal axca ti': Max ach waoc reyal bay jun conob ti', yujtol wochwan chin tx'ox in mayk'ak'al en, cax ay is may in binaj bay masanil yulyibank'inal, ẍi Dios bay.
Yuj tu xan a Dios chi ok' is c'ul yin mac bay chi yal is c'ul, chi yak' c'apax pitbok c'ul mac bay chi yal c'ul.
Palta tekan ayex ok e yal axca ti' ayin: Ta axca tu xin, ¿tzet yuj xan chi yal pax Dios tol ayon yobtakwom on xin? ¿Mac junok chi je' tenon oc wanaj tzet chi yochej Dios? tekan quex chi.
Palta c'am chi je' jalon axca tu'. C'am junok mac chi je' teyelen ba yetok Dios. A junok tx'otx' tol tz'akbil, xin ta chi je' yalon tx'otx' bay is tz'akomal axca ti': ¿Tzet yuj xan caytu' chin otej? ¿xin ta ẍi tx'otx'?
Yujtol a jun tz'aklom tu', chi je' tz'akon junok tx'otx' axca chi yochej c'ul. Caxc'al junnej bay chi tit is tx'otx' chi k'ana', palta chi je' watx'nen junok tx'otx' yuj k'anlay yin watx'il, c'al junokxa yuj k'anlay yin comonc'al.
Xan caytu' Dios yetok eb anima. Ay eb moj chaon yowal c'ul Dios, moj eb tojcan bay yailal yin junelnej. Caxc'al chi yochej Dios chi tx'oxk'abnej el yowal c'ul yin eb, yuj tx'oxon el eb is mayk'ak'al Cham, palta caw miman chi yut c'ul, chi yak'c'al techaj yobtakil eb.
Axca ton ti' max yun tx'oxon el Dios tol caw miman yelapnok is watx'c'ulal ayon, yet max ok' c'ul jin. Yujtol payxatax max on yacan oc yetok, yet watx' ay jalon jet yin is watx'il.
Caxc'al ayon israel on, caxc'al ayon mayon israelok, awtebil onxa yuj joc yetok.
Yuj tu xan max yal Dios yul libro Oseas axca ti': A juntzan eb man in conobok yet yalantok, ok wak' yik eb tol in conob eb. A eb c'am in yabenc'ulal yin yet yalantok, axa tinani', ok in yabenc'ulnej eb.
A bay max wal bay eb axca ti': Man in conobok ex, quin chi, a bay tu' ok al-lay e yin: Tol yuninal ex Cham Dios iquis, ẍi, ẍi tx'an Un tu'.
Albilcan yuj Isaías yabixal eb jet israelal, max yalcan axca ti': Caxc'al tol c'amxa chi bischaj eb conob axca yarenail ti' a' mar, palta jaywannej eb ok colchajcanok.
Yujtol majxa mayjok tiempo beyc'ulnen Cham Yajaw yulyibank'inal ti' yin tz'akanil, ẍi.
Ac'al ton oc Isaías tu' alnej c'apaxcan axca ti': Tolok wal maj el yin c'ul Cham Jajawil, Yajaw yin masanil, max yak'can jaywanokxa jinatil, axca mi wal max yun c'aylay el conob Sodoma, c'al Gomorra max juncanok, ẍi.
Ti chi waltok tzet chi yal elapnok juntzan chi wal ti' ayex. A eb man israelok, c'am chi ec' nanon c'ul eb tzet chi yun yoc eb watx'il yul sat Dios, palta chi yal Dios tol ay eb watx' yul sat. Chi yal Dios yin eb axca tu', yujtol chi yaoc eb c'ul yin.
Yak'ban pax eb wet israelal, caw chi yaoc eb nabal yin ley Moisés, yet watx' chi oc eb watx'il yul sat Dios yuj, naoni. Palta maj yun axca tu'.
¿Tzet yuj xan axca tu' chi elol yiban eb? Yujtol c'am chi yaoc eb c'ul yin Cristo. A naon eb tol chi je' yoc eb watx'il yul sat Dios yuj juntzan chi el yunen eb tu'. Yuj tu', axca junok ch'en ch'en bay chi chipil eb yakan, caytu' Cristo yul sat eb.
Yalnak Dios yabixal Cristo yul tx'an Un axca ti': Ayin wal max wacan oc jun ch'en ch'en bay conob Sión, jun ch'en bay chi chipil eb yakan, cax chi telc'ojtok eb yuj. Palta a mactxel ok yaoc c'ul yin, c'am bak'in ok somchaj el c'ul eb yuj, ẍi Dios yul tx'an Un tu'.
Ayin Pablo in ti', yak'omal in serbil Dios, chekbej in c'apax Jesucristo, yuj wiontek eb sic'bilxa el yuj Dios, yin yaon oc eb c'ul yin. Ay wopiso in cuyon eb yin jun cuybej acaw yel, tol chon cuy yin watx'il.
Cayton tu' wopiso axca tu', yet watx' chi yaoc eb yipok c'ul, tol ok co cha' k'inalej tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal. A Dios c'am bay chi yak' lek'tial junelok. A yet manto watx'nej yulyibank'inal ti', max yak'on is ti' tol ok yak' co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal tu'.
Mayal jay tiempoal tinani', yak'on ojtaknelay el is k'anej. Yuj tu', a Cham co Colomal Dios, a Cham max ak'on walil is k'anej ti'.
Ti chi watok jun in carta ti' ayach Tito. Wal yel axca tol in c'ajol ach, yujtol ayin max wal abej, xan max a cha' Cristo wetok. Yak'okabc'al co Mam Dios c'al Jajawil Jesucristo co Colomal is watx'c'ulal c'al is junc'ulal ayach.
Max ach wak'can bay Creta tu', yuj a watx'nen oc juntzan tzet ayto watx'ji, c'al yuj a sic'on oc mac chi oc ancianoal xol eb creyente bay junjun conob. Cha sic'oc eb axca max wut waloncan ayach.
Ti ok waltok beybal eb moj yoc ancianoal abej. A junok anciano, c'amokab bay chi say junok tzet yetal yobtak, yet watx' c'amc'al queja chi aj yin. Junnejokab yistzil. Creyenteokab yuninal masanil, cax man comonok chi say yun eb junok yobtakil. Manokab tenomtakok chi yut ba eb, palta tol yikemokab chi yut ba eb yuninal eb tu'.
Yujtol a eb chi oc yilomalok eb jet creyenteal tu', yowalil caw wal watx' chi yut eb is beybal, yujtol yak'omal cuenta mulnajil Dios yayji eb. Maj je' tol asanxanej eb chi yochej chi yal yet. Maj je' tol c'un chichon aj c'ul eb. Manokab uq'uemanok eb. Maj je' tol mak'wajwom c'apax eb. Yetok c'apaxok, maj je' yion tumin yin yobal.
A eb ay yopiso tu', ak'om posadaokab eb. Yowalilokab a tzet watx' chi yun eb, c'amokab chi ec' eb yiban. Tojolokab chi yut eb is beybal. Asannejokab yin Dios chi yaoc eb nabal. Yowalilokab chi mitx'oc wanaj eb mimanil yin tzet man watx'ok.
Yowalilokab chi yaoc eb nabal yin cuybej acaw yel, jun cuybej ak'bilxa cuy eb, yet watx' chi je' yiptzen eb juntzanokxa mactxel yetok jun cuybej yel tu', cax chi je' c'apax yak'on eb yojtaknej el eb anima chi tenton ec' bay co cuybej.
Yujtol xiwiltoc'al anima tenomtak chi yut ba. Toc'al chi comon alnej junok tzet yetal c'am yelapnok, caw iom aytek satej eb. Mawal axca eb ayoc nabal yin circuncisión, xiwil eb caytu' chi yut ba.
Yowalil chi tenlay oc wanaj eb, cax c'amxa chi yal eb, yujtol tzanc'al nail bay chi ec' eb, chi ec' yak' somchaj eb c'ul eb creyente tu'. Chi ec' yak' eb cuylay tzet man watx'ok, yet watx' chi yi' eb is tumin yin eb.
Ay jun nak aj Creta tu', aj nabal yayji xol eb, max yal nak axca ti': A eb wet aj conobal bay Creta ti'; toc'alta' lek'ti' eb. Caw wal lajan eb axca junok no no' caw wal ow. Isaj eb, toc'al chi yochej eb chi lowi, ẍi nak.
Yel ton chi yal nak. Yuj tu' xan yowalil cha tenchanej eb sic'libil, yet watx' chi yaoc eb jun cuybanilej acaw yel yin is c'ul.
Chal bay eb, tol manchak yacbaj eb txiquin bay juntzan comon abix chi yal eb wet israelal. Chalon c'apax bay eb, tol manchak yikej eb tzet chi yal eb c'am yelapnok cuybej yel yul sat.
A yul co sat ayon watx'xa co nabal ti', watx' masanil tzet yetal; palta a eb c'am chi yaoc c'ul yin Dios, eb yob is nabal, c'am junok tzet yetal watx' yul sat eb, yujtol a is nabal eb man watx'ok. C'am jabok chi mitx' waay ba eb yetok is nabal tu'.
Chi tz'ak yal eb tol yojtak eb Dios, palta a is beybal eb chi tx'oxk'abnen elok tol man yojtakok eb Cham. Man watx'ok eb yul sat Dios, yujtol c'am chi yikej eb jabok tzet chi yala'. Yuj tu' xan c'am junok tzet watx' chi je' el yunen eb.
Axa ach ti', aokab tzet moj cuylayi, aokab chak' cuylayok, wal juntzan cuybanilej caw wal yel.
Chal bay eb ichamtak winak, tol bayc'al ijan chi yut eb is nabal. Watx'okab chi yut ba eb, yet watx' ayokab yelapnok eb yul sat yet animail. Aj nabalokab chi yut ba eb. Cawokab chi yaoc eb c'ul yin juntzan cuybanilej yel. Ayokab camc'ulal eb yin yet animail. Tec'anokab chi yut ba eb yet chi yilon eb yailal.
Ac'ala' c'apax eb xal ixnamil ix, chal bay eb, tol watx' chi yut eb is beybal, axca wal chi yochej c'ul Dios. Man comonok chi yal eb k'umal yet animail. Manokab uq'uemanok eb. Meẍtolokab eb xal yin tzet watx',
cax chi cuywaj eb xal xol eb ix k'opoj ixto yin tzet chi yut camc'ulnen ba eb ix yetok yichamil, c'al tzet chi yut camc'ulnen eb ix yune'.
Cax aj nabalokab chi yut ba eb ix, tojolokab beybal eb ix. Ya'ilnejokab eb ix yatut. Watx'okab chi yut eb ix c'ul bay yet animail. Yikemokab eb ix bay yichamil, yet watx' c'amokab buchwal k'anej chi al-lay yin k'anej Dios.
Yetok c'apaxok, chi cam alon bay eb ach'ejtak winak, tol aj nabalokab chi yut ba eb.
Watx' chot a beybal yin masanil yil eb. Aokab yet chach cuywaj xol eb, chach cuywaj yin masanil a c'ul, c'al yin c'am ejmach'il.
Tojolc'al chot cuywaj a ba bay eb, yet watx' c'amokab mac chi alon tol man watx'ok juntzan chak' cuy eb tu'. Yuj tu xin, caxc'al ay eb chi tit yowal en, palta ok q'uixwok aj eb, yujtol c'am junok tzet yob ok je' yalon eb jin.
Chal bay eb creyente ayoc yin mosejal, tol yikemokab chi yut ba eb bay is patrón. Watx'okab chi yut ba eb axca chi yochej c'ul patrón eb tu'. Manchak tak'wej eb is ti',
tamwal chi elk'an eb bay. Tojolokab chi yut ba eb tx'oxon el is watx' beybal. Axca ton tu' ok yut tx'oxk'abnen el eb bay eb anima, tol caw watx' cuybej co Colomal Dios.
A Dios, max tx'ox is watx'c'ulalil ayon, a' inej oc colbanil masanil eb anima bay yulyibank'inal ti'.
Yuj is watx'c'ulal tu', xan chi nachaj el juj, tol yowalil chi co bekcan masanil tzet man watx'ok chi jochej oc bay yulyibank'inal ti', cax tol aj nabal chi jut co ba, c'al watx' chi jut co beybal. Asan yin Dios chi jaoc co nabal.
Jechbanejek jay jun c'ual tzalojc'ulal, yet ok jay Cham co Diosal caw miman yelapnok, a ton Cham co Colomal Jesucristo.
Max yak' cam ba Cham juj, yuj on is colon el yul k'ab yobtakil. Max yiel Cham masanil co mul, yet watx' asan Cham ay yalon yet jin, cax asanokab tzet watx' chi jochej chi junej.
Al juntzan ti' xol eb creyente bay tu'. Cheptzej eb, cax cha tenchanen eb yob is beybal, yujtol opiso yayji. Watx'c'al chot a ba, yet watx' c'amokab mac chi aloni tol c'am opiso.
Cha jek na eb creyente tu', tol yikem chi yut ba eb bay masanil eb yajaw. Yowalil chi yikej eb bay chi yal eb. Tzanc'al tzet mulnajilal tol watx', bekanokab chi yut eb c'ul watx'neni.
Manokab comonok chi buchwaj eb yin yet animail. Manokab comonok chi yak'lej eb owal yetok junok mactxel. Watx'okab chi yut eb is nabal, mansookab chi yut ba eb bay masanil anima.
Yujtol a yet yalantok, c'am c'apax co nabal ayon ti'. Pit on bay Dios. C'aynak on tok yet tu'. Max jak' serbil tzanc'al tzet yobtakil max jochej ocok. Caw wal yob co beybal yet tu'. Chi jak' sawenal yin eb jet animail watx' ay. Yajbejtak jili yul sat eb jet animail, yetok c'apaxok, ayonxac'al oc max co yajlej aj co ba.
Palta max tx'oxaj Cham co Colomal Dios is watx'c'ulal, c'al is camc'ulal bay masanil anima.
Yuj tu', max on colchaj el yuj. Man yujok junok tzet watx' max el juneni, xan max on is colo'; palta asan yuj max ok' c'ul Cham jin. A yet max tx'ajon el co yobtakil jin, axca wal tol max on alji yet cayelal. A Yespíritu max q'uexon co nabal.
Yuj co Colomal Jesucristo xan max yatek Dios Yespíritu ayon yin masanil is c'ul.
Xan watx' on yul sat, yujc'al is watx'c'ulal. Yuj tu' xan ok yak' c'apax co k'inal tol ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal, jun ayc'al oc yipok co c'ul.
A juntzan chi wal ti', yel. Xan chi wochej tol yayjic'al alubtanen sic'libil juntzan cuybanilej ti', yet watx' a eb chi yaoc c'ul yin Dios, chi yaoc eb yin c'ul yunen tzet watx'. Caw watx' juntzan cuybanilej ti'. Caw chi oc yopiso juj co masanil.
Manchak aoc a ba yetok eb comonc'al chi teyelej ba yin tzet nabac'al, c'al xol eb asan yabixal eb ichmamej chi yaltek. Manchak a c'apax oc a ba yetok eb comonc'al chi yak'lej owal, c'al yetok eb chi teyelej ba yin ley Moisés. C'am tzet chi yi' eb yin juntzan chi yalubtanej tu'. Nabac'al chi yetnej ba eb.
Ta ay eb chi ochen chi pojchaj eb creyente, cha tenchanej eb junel cayelok. Ta c'am chi yikej eb, che yiel eb e xol.
A eb caytu' chi beybalnej, ojtaknej elok tol etaxnakxa el eb. Munilc'al yojtakxa eb tol lownakxa yin eb yuj is yobtakil.
Ok in chektok juẍtak Artemas ayach, ma xin, a juẍtak Tíquico ok tok. A yet chi apni ocok, chak' ep a toj bay conob Nicópolis. Ata bay tu' ok on k'anjabok, yujtol chi wochej a tu' ayin ec'ok yet chi ec' nabil k'inal.
A yet chi toj nak juẍtak licenciado Zenas yin is viaje yetok juẍtak Apolos, colwajan yin yet mimanil eb. Jantakc'al tzet chi k'anabax yuj eb yulak be, ak' bay eb, majaxta' aj eb.
Cha cuy eb jet creyenteal bay tu', tol chi yun eb tzet watx', cax chi colwaj eb bay eb ay is majilal, yet watx' ay yopiso eb yul sat Dios.
Chi yatok masanil eb ayic' wetok cayti' cawil a c'ul. Chak' cawil c'ul masanil eb creyente chon camc'ulnen bay tu'. Yak'okabc'al Dios is watx'c'ulal ayex e masanil bay tu'.
NAJ TXITX YETOJ NAJ OOJ
Haxka yet q'o gikan txitx yetoj naj ooj.
Apni naj txitx b'ey hun ch'en miman naa ch'een, ha'tu' etax naj ooj yuu naj txitx.
Q'eyanoj naj yin ch'en ch'centu' yapni naj ooj.
-- ¿Tzet chawun cha wuxhtaj? -- xhi naj ooj tet naj txitx.
-- Kaw cha wuxhtaj, cyman, lalan stit satkan qib'an -- xhi naj txitx tet naj ooj.
Okan q'eyanoj ij kan aj, toj wi' hunoj kote' kak yuloj, xhiab' naj txitx tet naj ooj.
-- Ye xin -- xhi naj ooj, yok naj ya'on naj yip yijon aa naj.
Naj ooj suk naj tuk'al sije naj tzet chi yal naj txitx.
Too naj txitx yion te' te' tuk'al chi yal pax. Too naj yokan naj ooj yijon aa k'amk'al chul naj txitx.
-- ¡Kaw cha wuxhtaj! -- xhi naj ooj -- xtib'i eloj yalil hun ch'eenti' wuuan.
K'amk al chul naj txitx.
Yilxa eloj hintojan, titoj hawi' satkan qib'an.
X'eltoj naj ooj xin, x'eltoj hininoj.
Too naj sat ch'een naj ooj.
Max too naj txitx xin, max k'eytoj naj ooj, max too naj seyon naj txitx huncl xa.
X'apni naj b'cy naj txitx, lalan naj txitx slo'oni hun te' pechaj.
—- ¿Tzet chalo? cha wikan?
-- Kewaach cha wuxh -- xhi naj txitx -- Ha' kob'a' hantaj wal sloi kob'a'ti'.
Hinxwi' cltejan, ab'to hasloi hinb'a'ti'an -- xhi naj txitx, haxa hawet mimej hawettu'.
-- Haa, ¿tzet chi qute eltej?
-- Chi kochak eltej yuu ch'een, hinseyon hunoj koch'ecnan.
B'et naj txitx seyon ch'een.
Hul naj xin yetoj hun ch'cen:
-- Ha' hunti' ha' chaokoj yib'an hab'a'tu', hitzintojan -- xhi naj txitx.
-- ¿Tzet yuu? -- xhi naj ooj.
-- Tol naat chi too hiriroj, xhi pax naj txitx.
Yapni naj txitx yich hun te'.
-- Ak xin, hoj wilan b'ey chi toi.
Xyakoj naj hun ch'cen yib'an sb'a'.
Yaa, yaw naj ooj yuu sya'il sb'a', kam el naj yuu sb'a'.
Too naj txitx, yapni naj txitx bey hun ha' k'oa', yilon eytoj naj yechel ix kotxitx yul ha' ha'tu'.
Naj txitx xin peena naj ek'al ok naj yetne naj ooj.
Naj kewa ooj tz'ajank'al pax naj, k'am chi sna' naj tatol chi ctax naj yuu naj txitx.
Yapni pax naj ooj b'ey naj txitx b'ey ha' koa'.
Yil naj txitx chi apni naj ooj yok naj txitx yuk'en aatcj ha' k'oa'.
Yapni naj ooj:
-- ¿Tzet chawun cha wuxh? -- xhi pax naj ooj.
Ta'wi naj txitx:
-- Kaw cha wuxh, xhi pax naj txitx. Eywal hun lo'b'e.
-- ¿Tzet lob cal?
—-Il to ab'i la -- xhi naj txitx tet naj ooj.
Yeytoj t'anan naj ooj yib'an ha' ha'.
-- Tita'a, ¿tzet yetal? -- xhi naj ooj.
-- Késo eytoj yul ha'ti' -- xhi naj txitx tet naj ooj.
Ta chi laawi aatej hun ha'ti' chi gi' késoti'.
Uk' hachti', Mimanach hoj laaoj aatej hun ha'ti' hawuu.
-- Ye xin cha wuxh -- xhi naj ooj, yok naj yuk'cn ha' ha'.
-- Toj hin paxhalan -- xhi naj txitx, xtoo naj xin.
Max uk' ha' ha' naj ooj, haxa xtoi naj txitx.
Naj ooj xin tit sya'il sk'ul naj ooj, ok ck'ul yin naj ooj.
K'amk'al chi laawi ha' ha', sb'ejon kan naj ooj ha' ha'tu', xtoo naj.
PEDRO RIMARES YETOJ NO' TXITAM
Naj Rimares max apni naj ilo txitam b'ey hun naj ey stumin.
Ha' naj chi ya'on low no' txitamtu'.
Chi b'et naj staynen no' b'eyhun ak'al b'ey ey ha' ha' b'ey yax tx'otx'laj.
Wal ha'tu' max yutenaa naj peenail yin spatróntu'.
Haxka naj spatrón naj chi tzala najyetoj naj k'amxa chi xiw naj spatrón najtu'.
Ya'ontoj naj ilotxitamtu' naj Rimarestu'.
Ha tu' xin max apni wan eb' naj manomtxitam. Max xonon el naj no' txitamtu' tet eb' naj manom txitamtu'.
-- Chi wa' no' exan, asan xin ta chi yal hek'ul chi wi' kan elsnee no'an. Ha' hoj hintx'ox yil naj hinpatréntu'an -- xhi naj Rimarestu' tet eb' naj manom txitamtu'.
Max laawitu' xin, max too eb' naj manom txitamtu' yetoj no'txitam. Maasanil ha' snee no' xin ib'il kan aa yuu naj Rimarestu'.
Tol naj Rimarestu' kaw tx'itaj naj max sejon eytoj snee no'txitamtu' naj yul tx'otx'. Max eytoj snee no' yul tx'otx'tu' yuu najxin. Max awi naj tet spatrén, max el yaw naj:
-- ¡Patrón! -- xhi naj.
-- ¡Patrón! -- xhi naj.
K'am chi yab' najpatrón.
-- Patrón! -- xhik'al naj, ek'al clk'al max el yaw naj.
Max toonaj xin, naj Rimares x'apni naj b'ey snaa naj patron, max yalon naj:
Patrón, chin el waw.
¿Tumi k'am chawab'e hantaj wal elmax el waw no' txitam?
Max too no' yul tx'otx', haxak al snee no'txekel.
¿Tzet chi qute chana'?
Chi too hawil wetoj b'ey max tooyul trotx'tu'.
-- Toj hin xin, toon eyman -- xhi naj -- max too naj. Max apnieb' naj xin b'ey skolal no' txitamtu' b'ey snce no'tu'. X'apni eb'naj b'ey snee no'tu'.
Ti ha' snee no'ti' txckel patrón. 
¿Tzet chi qute aatej no'?
Too aatej no' -- xhi naj patróntu' -- too aatej no' yin sneetu'.
Okan mitxan yin snee no'tu'.
Cha to'on aatej no' xin.
-- Patrón, wa'le to hawil xin.
Max ok mitxan Rimarestu' yinsnee no' txitamtu'.
Max sto'on aatej xin, max aatej snee no'txitamtu',
-- Ee -- xhi Rimarestu' -- max el Vin aa naj snee no' -- xhi Rimarestu' tet spatróntu'.
-- As a'le yin hunxatu' yin sneetu'.
Max too Rimarestu' xin.
Sto'on aatej hunxatu' xin. Hak' ala max yun xin, x'el xin aaoj sneehunxatu',
-- Eyman chi too aa to'tej hunxatu' -- xhi patréntu' tet.
Max tooyin hunxa hak'ala keyk'altu' max yune.
Tuk'al chi el xin aa sneewan txitamtu'.
Nani' xin patrón, k'am chi aatej no' haxkati'.
Tol chikohotatej no' yetoj piocha.
¿Ey mi ch'en piocha b'ey hanaatu'?
-- Ey ch'en, asi' i' ch'en eyman -- xhi patróntu' tet Rimarestu', max yalon.
X'apni Rimarestu' bey snaa patrón xin. Tol Rimarestx'itaj xin, max apni kan b'ey snaa spatrón.
Ha' patrón xin tekankan okoj b'ey max too no' txitamtu' yul tx'otx'tu'. Ha'tu' max apni Rimarestu' bey yistil patróntu'. Ey kaawan skutzin patróntu'.
Maxyalon Rimares xin:
Ha' no' txitamtu' max laawitoj no' yul tx 'otx' maasanil, xantol max yal hinpatrón tol chin wey heyetoj heyoxwanil.
¿Tzet chawala?
-- ¿Tumi ey haya'b'il? -- xhi ix patrona.
¿Tzetxanoj yal wichamil tol chach wey wetoj?
-- Haachti' tol eyhaya'b'il -- utele Rimares yuu ix patróna.
-- K'amaj, tol keytu' yuuxanoj aatej no' txitam yul -- xhi Rimarestu'.
Hakala patrón xin chi awi'toj patrón tet Rimares:
-- ¡Eyman! ¡Eyman! -- xhi patróntu' tet Rimarestu'.
Chi yab'enix patrona xin:
¿Ab' chi yal patrón xin?
Eyman, tol chin wey heyetoj xhi patréntu'. 
¿Chim heyab'eheyoxwanil? -- xhi Rimares tet eb' ix ixtu' yoxwanil.
Ha' yet k'amchi sqe' eb' ix wey yetoj Rimarestu', max hawi'tcj Rimarestu' b'eyspatrón:
-- ¿Yoxwanil mi? -- xhi pax Rimarestu'.
-- Haa', yoxwanil -- xhi pax patróntu'.
-- Ab' xin, heyoxwanil xhi patróntu' -- xhi pax Rimarestu'.
-- Ye xin -- xhi patronatu'.
Chi howi tol yuu max wey hun Rimarestu' yetoj hun ixnamtu', yctoj kaawan yune'.
Ha' pax yalonpatróntu' man keyojtu' yaloni tol max yal oxeb' piocha, manajoxwan ixtu', chi yal patróntu'.
Tuk'al max yetne patróntu' hun Rimarestu'. Xlaawi xin, max wey yetoj oxwan ixtu'.
Max yi'ontej piochatu'.
Echmanein, tol chin too tz'aoj, ti chin huli yet hun txolanti'.
Ha'tu' xin max kan kan patróntu' yetoj oxeb' piochatu'.
Max xlaawi xin, max too Rimarestu'.
Tol patrón xin manyootajoj tzet chi yun sq'uletoj hun tx'otx'tu', tuk'al max okan tekanoj, xyechmaneni Rimarestu'.
Maaxa apni Rimares xin maxtooi. Max q'cjb'i eyoj max paxtoj patróntu' b'ey snaa. Max apnib'ey snaa xin, max yaloni:
Ha' hun Rimarestu' kaw chin yetne, tuk'al max hinxhej kanok tekan b'ey max too no' txitamtu' yul tx'otx'tu'.
Ti chin huli tolchin too tz'aoj xhi, tolta yel chin na'a.
Max too paxoj k'amk'al chihuli.
-- Yuuxan max hinmeltzutej -- xhik al patróntu'.
K'am chi ta'wiyistiltu' tet.
Chi howi, max yalon xin.
-- ¿Tzet xan chach howi? -- xhi patróntu' tet yistiltu'.
¿Tzet xan man hinhowoj?
Texan chachejtej hun txitajtu'win yetoj wune'.
Ila tinani', max wey wetoj yetoj eb' ix qune'ti'. 
Haxhton chacha' txitaj hun winajti'.
Max ta'wi patron xin:
¿Tumi ey hun tx'itajtu' chin chejtej wey hawetoj xin?
¿Tzetmax hach yute?
Max hinlaawi el yuu, keytu' max yun pax eb' ix q'opoti'yuu oxwanil.
Max kolaawi el yuu on, yuuxan chin howi -- xhi ixpatrona tet yichamil.
-- Aja -- xhi naj patrón.
¿Tumi ey tzet chin chejtej e in xin?
Tolha' oxeb' ch'en piocha max hinchej hul yi' naj, tol ha' chi kohotatejno' txitamtu' yetoj.
Walon yul hink'ul man wootajoj ta keytu' chiyun xijon pax aa naj.
A' hex miman k'ulal xin.
¿Tzet chi qute?
Manajin e in mul.
PEDRO RIMARES YETOJ NAJ ILOM CHEE
Hata naj Rimarestu' ha' naj ey kan hun sq'aneti'.
Haxka ta historia tol naj Rimares puch tx'itaj max yute sb'aa yet peyxatu'.
Haton yet hun q'aneti'oj wal nioj tinani'an xin haxka max yute sb'aa Pedro Rimarestu' yet peyxatu'.
Ey wan no' chee mula chi stayne, chi ya' lowoj.
Max sna'on aa tx'itajal, max spol el xaj sti' no' mulatu' yetoj nawax.
Max yalon b'ey patróntu' b'ey naj peyxatu':
Patrón, tzimi ye no' cheeti', tuk'al chi see ok no' winan.
Il to ab' no' kaw chi sce no' -- xhi Rimarestu' tet spatrón.
Kakaltu' xin max chejletoj yuu yan cheetu' hunelxa.
Max sna'on el xin tol ha' max kupon el xaj sti' no' cheetu', max el aa xin, maaxa huloj.
Wan ilom cheetu' xin wan cb' xhectu' max too eb' b'ecl, max apni eb' b'ey sti' ha? miman paam ha'.
Lalan slow cb' max apni pax Rimarestu' xin yetnen cb' hunclxa.
Max q'anon wey sb'aa tet wan ilom cheetu' wan ey smulatu'.
-- Weyoj hin hek'atan -- xhi Rimares.
-- Ab'tuc weyan, weyan, k'am chatak hak'ul, ta k'am hatxow haach cytoj yul koxhtalti' la -- xhi wan ilom cheetu' tet Rimarestu'.
-- Ye xin, hoj hin eytoj -- xhi Rimarestu'.
Max eytoj yul koxhtal xin, xyetzen wey aa sb'aa yet huslujeb' ora yet a'balil.
Tuxa chi ok chuman a'b'al max yalon wan ilom cheetu' xin:
-- Ha' hun Rimaresti' haxa ian chi qa' kan tan el tinani' -- xhi wan ilom cheetu', ti max wey aaoj -- xhi cb'. Chi yab'en eb' yel yaw xaam:
-- Max wey aa cha, qi' el yisail -- xhi wan ilom cheetu'. Kopix ey sti' hun koxhtalti' katu' chi koq'ojontoj yib an ha' miman paam ha'ti' -- xhiab' wan ilom cheetu'.
Max spixon ey eb' sti' hun koxhtaltu' max slakon aa eb' sq'ojontoj cb' yib'an ha' miman paam ha'tu'.
T'ey xin, Pedro:
Xawil hab'aa, Pedro.
¿Tzet xan max hakup el xaj sti' kochee?
Ha' tinani' chawa' tan hawet, tinani'xa qil kob'aa -- xhi wan ilom cheetu'.
Chi sna' eb' tol ha' Pedrotu' max sq'ojtoj eb' yul koxhtaltu' yib'an miman paam ha'tu'.
Qil xin Pedro.
Max ta'wi Rimares xin:
-- Qil wej xin maasanil yetoj hetx'ix yetoj hesojb'al -- xhi paxtej Pedro skaxeb'al ha'.
Xyab'tej eb' yul snuq'tu' tol a max ta'wi paxtu'.
Max xiw aa eb' xin wan ilom cheetu' max seyon yil eb' slo'b'ctu'.
K'amxa xyil eb' eytoj yul slugar b'ey kugan yuu eb' slobe' eb'tu' yetoj sojb'al eb'tu' chik'alon ok yijatz yib'an cheetu'.
Maasanil max q'oj kantoj cb' yul ha' miman paam ha'tu', max xiw aa eb' xin.
Pedro xin tuk'al chi sce eb' ej pakantu'.
¡Ay horiros!
Ha' kolo'b'e ha' max koq'oj toj yul ha'tu'.
Hun Rimaresti', k'amxa yanil, maaxa kam quu.
Ila tinani' hon ok kan yin wail yuu.
Max see el eb' xin yuu Rimarestu'.
PEDRO YETOJ NO' CHEE CHI EK' SATKAN
Ey hun no' kamom chee ok spixan yuu Rimarestu', haxak'al s'umal no' hotxan kan eyoj.
Ey oktoj no' mij yul s'umal no' cheetu' smajchen ey xin tz'ison eyoj katu' xhaali ok yin, yok spixan no' kamnaj cheetu' yuu.
Ey kan oktoj no' mijtu' yul s'umal no' kamnaj cheetu'. Chi ek' satkan yetoj no' cheetu', haxka ta awyon ye yuu.
Yilontej sb'aa yctoj hun txonwomtu', miman stumin hun txonwomtu' yetoj yijatz.
Tew ok hun txonwomtu' yin hun xheetu' xin.
Sa'al ch'an hun hacheeti' cha Pedro.
-- ¿Tzet xan k'am chatxonel e inan? -- xhi hun txonwomtu' tet Pedrotu'.
Tumi hoj teecha stool hinchec, hawuu miman stool.
Ta chawoche a' hatumin maasanil yetoj haq'ap maasaniltu', chi wa' kantoj e ach hun cheeti'.
-- ¿Asan tzet chi yun gaa pax satkan? -- xhi pax txonwomtu'.
-- Kotx'ox hawila keyti' -- xhi hun kaxkati'.
-- Tol hoj hatek ok hawajan yin sk'ulti' katu' chamitxontej snee b'ey solom haxik'ti' -- xhi Rimaristu' tet tronwomtu'.
-- Ye xin -- xhi tkonwom.
Max laawi xin, max too kan Pedrotu' yetoj stumin yetoj ijatz.
Chi tzala tkonwom xin.
-- Ti eyxa hinawyon tol hoj hinek' satkan -- xhi txonwomtu'.
Xlaawi xin, max too hururoj satkantu' kaw naat xyaa eytoj. Max tit yul sk'ul xin kawxa sb'ey hun hincheeti':
-- Wa'le haxka max yal Pedro e inan. Hinto' sneeti', yuuxanoj slak s'beyi -- xhi txonwom.
Haxka txonwom xin yelk'al sk'ul ip, max yun sikon snee hun cheetu'. Max eltej tuknaj snee cheetu' yuu txonwomtu' xin.
Max tit huyuyoj satkantu' xin. Max kam xin.
Max kam txonwomtu' yetoj hun awyontu'. Max eltej hururoj no' mij, xlaawi eltej no' xin.
Keytu' max yun stit kan huyujoj satkantu'. Max b'ej chi aatoj txonwomtu' yey key sat tx'otx'tu'.
Keytu' yun stan kan hunxa smaxil q'ane yet naj Pedro Rimaristu'.
NAJ TXITX YETOJ NAJ ME'
Ha' q'o qikan txitx cy hun smc' q'o cy hun naj icham me'. Max too naj paxhal xol yaxk'ultaj yetoj hun sme'tu'. Ha' yib'an hun sme' najtu' max oki, ha' ey ok xhecoj naj. Max too naj xin, max apni naj b'cy hun naj txonom ixim. B'ey naj txonom ixim xin max apni q'o qikan txitx yetoj hun sme'tu', ha'tu' max wey naj.
Max sajb'i xin, max too pax naj xin, x'apni naj xin b'ey hun miman naa ch'cen.
Ha"tu' max sq'an wey sb'aa naj tet hun naj icham b'alam.
Max aatoj naj yul kaan max wey aa naj xin.
Yet hantaj aab'al xin max cl sweyan naj sme' najtu', max yalon naj sme' naj xin:
-- Cha wikan, chi yab' hintxulan -- xhi naj me'tu'.
¿Tzet chi yun intxulan?
Ila wan winaj ey ok yul hun naa. Ta chin eytojan chin xhi' eyloj cb an.
-- Aa -- xhi naj txitx, k'am chaxh xiw xin -- xhi q'o qikan txitx, tol chach aa pakanoj katu' chach txuli yuuxanoj k'ey aa hatxultu' xol haxil.
¿Yelton chawala?
Chi koxhi' eytoj eb'.
Txulan.
-- Ye xin -- xhi naj icham me'.
Max aa pakan naj max txuli naj.
Ha' yet max xcw xuli naj haxka sti' hun yul kaantu' eltej naj. Maa swa'ne ey sb'aa naj xin yul sweyub' chi yute yalon xin. Max tit k'cy sanna najme'tu', max cyol naj xol cb' naj icham b'alam.
Max xiw aa cb' naj icham b'alam.
Max too cb' naj, max el aa eb' naj b'alam: -- Max tit satkan qiban -- xhi naj icham b'alam.
Haxka ha' naj me' xin, ha' naj x'awi yeyol sanna naj xol eb' naj, max xiw kantoj cb' naj b'alam xin, max sb'ej kan eb' naj snaa.
Max yalon q'o qikan xin cyman max eyol q'o sk'atan naj icham me': -- Cha wuxhtaj ¿k'am b'eyxawab' sya'il -- xhi q'o qikan tet naj icham me'.
-- K'amaj, cha wuxhtaj, asan yib'an hinchopti' ya' walan -- xhi naj me'tu' tet q'o qikan.
-- K'am chi tak hak'ul xin, cha wuxhtaj tol ha'ti' hoj kokaeyoj.
Qetxa hun naati'.
K'amxa chon toi -- xhi q'o gikan tet naj icham me'.
Ye xin -- xhinaj, tatol ya' yib'an hachopti' ti chi wantean. Asan wan b'alam ha' hintza'an. Ha' hoj wa' yanilojan, yuuxan hoj wa"xoj.
Xal hun naati' qet xaon.
-- K'amaj cha -- xhi naj me' -- ¿tumi man hinhul xhi' eytoj eb' wan icham eb' snaati' -- xhi naj me' tet q'o qikan.
-- K'amxa chi hul eb', xiwtoj kan eb', tol chon mulnai tinani'
-- ¿Tzet chi qun xin? -- xhi naj me'.
-- Ha' wan sb'ajil solom no'ti' ha' eb' chi kolokb'a ok yinlaj xikin hun naati', tol chi kosey qute chi koma' oktoj yulaj hun naati'.
Ha'ti' chi kolokb'a ok sb'ajil wan noq'ti'.
-- Ye xin cha wikan -- xhi naj me' -- ta k'am chi hul eb' koxhi'.
-- K'am chul eb'. Max ok lokan sb'ajil wan mimej noq' yinlaj hun naatu' xin.
Ha' wan icham b'alam xin chi b'et eb' t'anle ek' snaatu', haxa chi yilon eb' xin wan b'ajtu' wan lokan ok yuu naj txitxtu', ha'tu' chi xiwte sb'aa eb' tet wan bajtu'.
-- Cha wuxhtaj -- xhi wan icham b'alamtu' tet yetb'i -- Max b'et wil ek' konaa ma'iti'an -- xhi naj icham b'alamtu'. Yapni naj b'ey yistil.
Hantaj eb' naj qetb'i max slaawi el kanoj yet max tita' hun tzetaltu' qib'an.
Haxak'al sb'ajil eb' naj qetb'i loklom wakan ok yin konaa. Yuuxan tinani' k'amxa chon toi, ta chon too hunelxa chi kokam paxoj.
Tol ha' q'o qikan ha' max koetneni, tol ha' hun stiltik ib'il ok yuu, ha' chon chi'on eytoj.
¿Tumi maa heyila ey yuk'a hun ib'il yuu q'o gikantu'?
Ha' max ok smul qin, ha' tejan tol ha' max apni kan yul konaatu' hunelne, ha' max xhi'on eytoj eb' naj getb'itu'.
Yuuxan k'amxa chon too xin.
-- Ye xin -- xhi yistil naj icham b'alam. -- Hain kaw chi wa'le wapni b'ey konaatu'an.
Chin lamb'ane wip yetoj hun tiltiktu'an. Chin too oktoj weyan bey sat kotx'attu', chi wilon walan xin tzet chin yutean.
Chin lamb'ane wip yetojan.
-- K'am chaxh toi -- xhi yistil naj tet.
-- K'amaj, chin toi, chin took'al wil konaatu' -- xhi naj.
Max apni naj xin katu' x'aaton naj wey sat tx'at. Haxka q'o qikan txitx kaw ha'yan sna'b'al qo, max yil naj yapni naj b'alam yul snaa hunel xa, max too q' qikan yul kaan xin yetoj sme' hunel xa.
Max apni naj yul kaan max seyon naj tzet chi yute naj hunel xa.
-- Xal tinani' cha wuxh haach eltoj wey sti' yul kaanti'.
Keytu' hoj qute haxka qute hunel, taxak'al k'am chi yab' hatxul. Ha' b'ey eytoj hab'aa yib'an hun icham b'alamti', hain hoj el wawan yuuxan no' xiwtoj hun icham b'alamtu'. Chawila kaw yib'an chach ey apnoj hululoj.
Yet kaw lalanxa sweyi hoj wal e achan hanik'.
Asan ta chin smitxan cha, k'am chach xiwi, qetxa okoj hun naati'. Ila max eltoj eb' maasanil eb' yet huneltu', xal tinani' la hunxane chan hun icham b'alamti'.
Hawila eyman hoj xiwtoj.
Ha' yet hoj hach hintenon eytojtu'an kat wa' yawan kaw miman hoj wute yul hinnugq'ti'an yuuxan no' xiwtoj.
-- Ye xin -- xhi naj me' tet q'o qikan txitx.
Max okk'al aab'al xin ikisk'al hun icham b'alamtu': -- Hawal tinani' hoj hinchi' eytoj hun tiltiktu' -- xhi hun icham b'alamtu'. Chi smajk'al yet chi ok laoneb' óra i huslujeb' ora. -- Tuk'al chin xiwi k'am maj ek' b'ey hinnaati' man to hul ok win. Toj hinweyan.
Max wey aa naj icham b'alam yet chi ok huslujeb' óra majb'il yuu q'o qikan xin hanik' chi wey aaoj.
Max yil q'o qikan xin hanik' chi wey aaoj.
-- Hal tinani' cha wuxh, max wey aa hun icham b'alam; ha' wa'ne hab'aa. ¿K'am mi wal chi yab' hatxul?
-- K'am chi yab' hintxul -- xhi naj me'tu'.
-- Tinani' xin ti max wey aaoj; eyantoj hululoj yib'an, kaw yib'an chach tekanoj yuuxan no' yab' sya'il -- Haxa max ey b'ejontoj sb'aa xin hun icham me'w', ha' yib'an sb'a' icham b'alamtu'. X'ey apnoj tckan hun icham me'tu', max aa yaw icham b'alam xin.
-- ¡Man hachi'toj hinb'a'an! ¡Hajin elan!
Ha' pax q'o gikan xin: -- Eyman chon ey wejtoj, ti max micha yuu naj getb'i.
Ya' yaw naj me':
-- Me-e-e-e-e -- xhi naj me'.
Max xiwtoj naj icham b'alam xin max eltoj hininoj naj yul snaa.
Ha' q'o qikan yetoj naj me' ck'al xa'al chi yute yul snug' eb' naj. Chi yab'en naj icham b'alamtu' tol kaw ek'al eb' naj, hak'al ch'an eb' naj kaawantu' q'o gikantu' yetoj naj me'tu'.
Haxa max apni naj icham b'alam b'ey yistil, max o' aa naj tet yistil.
-- Kaw ian ix hinlaawi elan -- xhi naj tet yistil.
-- ¿Tumixa wab' sya'il? -- xhi yistil naj.
-- Ha' wal hinb'a'ti'an kaw ya'an, ta chawante hinb'a'ti'an -- xhi naj tet yistil.
Max kan q'o qikan b'ey naa xin. X'ok hun q'in b'ey snaa q'o qikan yetoj naj me'.
Max yawten eb' naj naj wakax yetoj naj chee yetoj naj k'ultajil chee. Max yawte naj tol chi ok hun q'in. Max yion eb' naj snaa naj me' yetoj naj txitx, tzub'il tol max eltej naj b'alam yul snaa.
Yujten q'o qikan yetoj sme'.
Asan ch'an eb' naj kaawan ya' yetoj eb' naj mimej noq'tu'. Kaw chi tzala sk'ul eb' naj yet xtan kantoj hun q'ane'ti'.
NAJ TXITX YETOJ AN SANDÍA
Ey hun ix ixnamil ix kaw sa'al chil-le sb' aa yctoj naj pale.
Yet hunun k'u chi b'et ix ya' sandía naj pale, chi tzala naj. Haxa pax yok naj txitx yetnen ix o nawal yin ix ixnamil ix.
Max slo' eltej yul an sandía naj txitx max ya'on oktoj naj sa' yul an sandía.
Max q'inib'i xin max too ix ixnam b'ey awb'il sandía.
Haxka ix ixnam man yootaj ix tzet yc an sandía max b'et ix ya'on hun an sandía bey naj pale.
Max xha' naj pale an sandía, meltzu ix ixnam.
Max laawitu' xin, max yochen an sandía naj pale, max pol naj sandía, haxamax yil naj pale sa' naj txitx ey oktoj yul an sandía.
Max howi naj yin ix ixnam. Max yalon naj pale tet ix ixnam:
-- ¿Tzet xan chin hawetnean? -- xhi naj pale.
—- ¿Tzet yuu? -- xhi ix ixnam.
Max tx'oxle:
Ila chin hawute.
-- Sa' txitx ey oktoj yul an hasandía -- xhi naj pale tet ix ixnam.
-- ¡Chikab' sat! chin yetne naj txitx -- xhi ix ixnam.
NAJ TXITX YETOJ MAASANIL WAN NOQ'
Max ilchab'ey ey hun ch'een bey chi weyi yuu maasanil wan noq'tu': hun laab'atu' yetoj hun xulem, hun mij yetoj hun k'ultajil chee yetoj hun b'alam yetoj hun pay yetoj hun ooj.
Ha'tu' max ok eb' syamb'aey sb'aaeb' sma'on kam alkal txitxtu' chi yute yaloni.
Ha' paxoj hun alkal txitxtu' xin tz'ajan b'aa sk'ul, max sey pax tzet max yun yel paxoj.
Max ok eb' staynen b'ey ey snaatu' tol hoj sma' kam eb' chi yute yaloni. Maa kam pax yuu eb'.
Max yochele ta eb' sk'ok tin eytoj.
Tz'il wej eltej cha tol chi kam tinani'.
K'amxa chi kohaj eloj, puchk'al chon yetne hun isa alkalti'.
Xal tinani' xin tol kaw chi tani, chi ga' tan kan hunelne.
Tinani' wa'ne wej ok heb'aa chael ta toj heyuu.
Tinani' xin cha hoj eltej sti' xh'eenti' hoj k'ok ok Vinentoj, ila ck'alon.
Nixhtej ye qin kolon ch'an, tzetoj ok qin mimanon tet.
Ha'ti' hoj stoolane eloj tinani', hantaj smul max ya' qin hununon komaasanil.
Yuuxan tinani' tol chi kam kanoj.
Hawil yeltej cha xulem ta chi eltej, cha k'ultajil chee eyman chach too lemna yin.
Haxka haachti' jelan hab'eyi kaj hun alkaltu' chi tz'ajlo hab'eyi yintaj.
Wa'ne wej ok heb'aa.
-- Ye xin -- xhi cb'. Hawil yelol cha laab'a, chi kook wej nilna yin. Awte eltej cha laab'a.
-- Elantej cha. Eyman -- xhi eb' naj konob'ti'.
-- Echmane wej -- xhi naj txitx -- tol chi wi' eltej hinxanab'.
-- Eyman xin -- xhi naj laab'a.
-- Echmane, hoj hinelk'al toj, echmanein titu', hoj hineltoj.
-- Eyman xin -- xhi eb' naj konob'ti'.
-- Elantej -- xhi naj laab'a tet naj txitxtu'
-- Oj hineltoj, echmane -- xhi naj txitx.
-- Eyman xin -- xhi eb' naj konob'.
-- Ye xin, xta'wi naj txitx.
Ti chin eltoj xin, hachi o' hek'ul cha' wej eltoj hun hinxanab'ti' hinq'ana.
Xta'wi eb' naj konob':
-- Cha' wej eltej hun xanab'tu' cha, q'oj wej toj keytu'. ¿Tumi hemam naj ho hex ek' pacha choj yalan xanab' naj?
Ye xin cha alkal, eltej haxanab'tu'.
Max ya'on eltej naj xulem hun xanab'etu', max ya'on toj b'ey hun k'ultajil chee, haxa hun k'ultajil chee haxa max q'ojontoj. Keytu' tol chi sna' eb' xin tol ha' xhanab'tu' chi hawi' aatoj eb' yul hun ch'centu'.
Man yootaj eb' ta ha' pax hun alkaltu' max q'oj kantoj eb'tu'.
-- Elantej cha -- xhi pax hun laab'atu' b'ey yul hun ch'eentu' xin -- eyman chaxh eltej cha.
Haxa max yab'en eb' xin k'am maj chi ta'wi tet eb', max kus aa sk'ul eb' xin.
Max xhejtoj eb' hun laab'atu' yul hun ch'eentu', haxa max awi eltej hun laab'atu':
K'am naj cha, k'am naj.
Q'oj eltej naat cha.
-- K'am naj cha, k'am naj. Tejan x'eltoj naj xin -- xhi naj laab'atu'.
K'am naj keyti' la, tejan ha' naj xq'oj eltojtu'.
-- ¿Tzet xan ma hawila tatol xhanab' najxa q'oj eltu'? -- xhi naj b'alamtu' tet naj k'ultajil cheetu'.
Elantej cha laab'a.
Ye xin.
Max eltej naj laab'a xin.
Haxak'al ok eb' naj sma'le kam sb'aa sya'iloj naj alkal txitx.
Max too naj xin, k'amxa maj chi seyon ek' naj. Naatxa eytoj naj, chi tzcewitej naj:
-- Oj heyaq' toolanc el hemultu' b'a'in e in, hain alkalinti'an.
Che yoche chin hema' kamoj, ti maa hinkam heyuu. Yuuxan echmanc heyet b'eel.
NO' B'ALAM YETOJ NO' PAY
Ha' hun icham b'alamtu' yetoj hun ixnam pay.
Ey hun yune' hun ixnam paytu' xin, max yion el sb'i icham b'alamtu' xin. Ha' x'ok skumale hun ixnam paytu'.
Ha' hun icham b'alamtu' ha' max yion el sb'i hun yalixh paytu', skumpare sb'aa yet hun ixnam paytu' xin.
Max yalon hun icham b'alamtu' xin tol chi too sey hunoj slo'b'e. Max hul b'ey snaa hun ixnam paytu'.
Nanik' kumpare.
¿Tzet cha sey ek'ooj?
-- ¿Tzet chul hawune? -- xhi hun paytu' tet hun b'alamtu'.
-- Kumale, tol ey chi hul wune tol chin toi sey hunoj hinlo'b'e -- xhi hun icham b'alamtu'.
-- Ah -- xhi hun ixnam paytu' xin
-- Haxka hinxaan unin tol chi too naj wetoj tol chi Key naj -- xhi naj icham b'alamtu'.
-- Tejan k'am chi too naj xaan uninaltu', yalixh to naj, ta ey chi yion naj -- xhi hun ixnam paytu' -- K'am chi too naj, kumpare -- xhi hun ixnam paytu'.
Max ta'wi naj yalixh pay xin:
K'amaj, chikay, tol chin toj.
-- Yel chi yal naj hinxaan mamtu', tol hink'ey paxoj hinkuy hinb'aa b'eki -- xhi naj paytu'.
-- Ta chaxh too xin, haachk'al naat tak'al haach toi -- xhi ix ixnam paytu'.
-- Toj hin, toj hin, toon xin -- Xtoo eb' xin.
Max b'eytoj eb' xin, xb'eytoj eb'.
Nanik' xin chon toi yata to b'ey hun ha'.
-- Ha' tatu' apnoj -- xhi naj icham b'alamtu' tet hun yalixh paytu', b'ey xhaan uninaltu'.
-- ¿Hanik' wal hoj hon apnoj? -- xhi hun yalixh paytu'.
-- Kawilxa xin, tz'ajan haxhk'al haxh k'ey ta kantoj -- xhi hun icham b'alamtu'.
-- Ye xin -- xhi hun yalixh paytu', xtoo eb'.
Xlaawi xin, x'apni cb' b'ey hun ha'tu'.
-- Haton titi' xin la ha'ti' hoj hon low titi' -- xhi hun icham b'alamtu' tet hun yalixh paytu'.
-- Ye xin -- xhi hun yalixh paytu'. Max xlaawi xin.
-- Ha'ti' hoj kooktoj, chi wi' aatej ye hinnawax -- xhi pax hun icham b'alamtu'.
-- Ye xin -- xhi hun yalixh paytu', t'anan ok yin hun xhaan mamtu' xin.
Max yion aatej ye snawax, ha' pax yisk aj hun icham b'alamtu'. Ha' max chi yal snawax xin, max yaatej ye hun nawaxtu'.
-- Xyaatej ch'en nawaxti', tinani' xin hoj hach hatayne tol chin weyi -- xhi hun icham b'alamtu'.
-- Hach hoj hawil sul eb', weyoj hin, hatenele weyan hanik' hul eb' -- xhi hun icham b'alamtu'.
-- Ye xin -- xhi hun yalixh paytu'.
Ye xin xaan mam.
Max laawi xin, max yalon hun icham b'alamtu':
-- Manchaj el hawaw, tuk'al chapultoj hink'ulti' yetoj ul eb'tu'. Hain k'ulti' chapultoj, ta k'amaj, hoj xiw paxtoj eb' -- xhi pax hun icham b'alamtu' tet hun yalixh paytu'.
Manchaj haten el hinweyan yet chi hul wan komon k'am yuk'a, asan hun kaw miman yuk'a ta ha' hoj uloj, kat hatenon el hinweyan xin.
-- Ye xin -- xhi hun yalixh pay.
Max apni hun miman yuk'a xin, max ten el sweyan naj icham b'alam.
Max pul-letoj sk'ul naj icham b'alam, max x'oxon ok naj yuu sq'ab' xin. Max too naj icham yin hun miman yuk'a xin, xb'ct naj syachontej.
Max laawi xin, max michai.
Tinani' xin cha xaan, lowoj hon.
-- Chi kochi' kochib'e -- xhi naj b'alam.
-- Ye xin -- xhi naj yalixh pay.
Max xlow eb' naj xin, xlow eb' naj.
-- Tinani' xin hoj qi' hantaj wan ek'b'anti'. Ta chi noo kok ul hoj kotoj qitoj yet ix hatxutx. Chi xhi' pax ix xhib'c kaj chi yun kochi'on getti', chi qi'toj tet ix hatxutx -- xhi naj b'alam Max tit eb' xin.
Xlaawi, max hul cb' b'ey ix pay xin max hul eb' xin.
Max a'le tet ix ixnam. 
Nani' xin, t'ey halo'b'e la.
Ila chi walan max hul helo'b'e komitxon on.
-- Chi' hachib'c kumale -- xhi icham b'alam tet ix ixnam pay. 
-- Ye xin -- xhiix pay, max low ix. Max xhi'on xhib'c ix. Xlaawi xin. 
-- Max noo hink'ul -- xhi ix.
-- Ye xin ta xnoo hak 'ul -- xhi naj icham b'alam -- Hin toj paxoj, xa xwil, hunelxa hintooti' -- xhi naj b'alam tet ix ixnam pay -- Oj hintoj -- xhi naj b'alam.
Xtoo naj xin.
Max too naj b'alam xin, max kan naj yalixh pay yetoj xutxtu'.
Yet max laawi el xhib'e ix paytu', max yalon ix paytu' tet naj yuné'tu': 
Cha wune', max laawi kochib'eti'.
-- Ah, xlaawi chib'etu' -- xhi naj.
-- Hainxa chin too wi' hunojxa kochib'etwan hainti'an chikay -- xhi naj yalixh paytu'.
Le'tiach, cha wune ¿tumi puchach hun xin?
Yalixh ch'anach.
-- ¿Tumi manoj hach kam yuu eb'? -- xhi ix ixnam paytu'.
-- K'amaj chikay, wootaj xaan, x'ox naj hinxaan mam wilan -- xhi naj yalixh paytu'. 
Toj hinan.
Xtoo naj xin, chi tak sk'ul ix ixnam pay.
Xtoo naj, yapni naj b'ey ha' ha'tu' xin, b'ey tab'etyi' xhib'etu' yetoj xhaan mamtu'. Ha'tu' apni hunel xa.
Key tati' yute naj hinxaan mamtu'an.
-- ¿Tzet man sge' wuuan? -- xhi naj yalixh pay.
-- Keyti' chi yun yaatej ye ch'en nawaxti' -- xhi naj yalixhtu'.
Yion aatej naj ye snawax.
Ha' tinani' haxka yute naj hinxaan maman.
Mantu' ha'oj hinmitx wan koqtu'an, hawal hunoj kaw miman yuk'atu' chin mitxan. Haxka hun hinchi' yctoj naj hinxaan maman, keytu' hunoj wet mitxan.
Ti ey hinnawaxan, weyoj hinhunoj txolan. Max ey naj wey xin.
Xlaawi xin, max el swevan naj valixh paytu'. Max smajon naj xin, max apni xin hun miman yuk at'.
Max likwo naj yin xin, chim sna' naj keytu' vip naj kaj yip naj xaan mamtu'. Max too ok lokan naj yin snuq' hun miman yuk'a tu' xin. Tuk'al max kan Vunan yisk'a naj yin s'umal hun miman yuk'a tu'.
Max too naj xin Cunan ok naj yin snuq' hun miman yuk'a. Naat max too naj max el kan t'cbna naj pakan yekan aa naj. Nisan kan eltej ye naj. 
K'amk'al chi hul naj b'ey xutx tu', max yalon ix txutxe pay:
¿Tzet chi yun naj wune'?
¿K'amk'al chi hul naj?
B'ey ta tzet yion naj.
Tejanoj hintoj wil najan.
Max too ix ixnam pay xin, max apni ix b'ey sti' hun ha'tu' xin.
Max seyon yil ix b'ey ey yune'tu', k'am chi chax yune' ix yuu xin.
Lalanxa yo' ix, max chax sb'ob'en b'ey max ek'toj hininoj hun miman yuk atu'.
-- Ha'ti' max ek'toj cb' keyti' la -- xhi ix ixnam paytu'.
Max took'al tz'ajan ix yintaj sb'ob'en eb'tu'.
Max apni ix bey ey kan eyoj hun yune'tu' pakan kanoj.
Max yilontoj ix xin, max yil ix xin tol txekel eltej ye, max awitoj ix tet.
-- Cha wune' -- xhi ix tet. 
¿Tzet chatzee?
Tuk al nisan eltej hawe -- xhi ix yet k'am to chi apni ix kaw sk'atan.
Haxa max apni sk'atan xin:
-- Ptej haq'ab' tol ha' haach chahul wi', tuk'al chatzee yin hinsat.
